aṃśumat kāśyapa āgamaḥ
aṃśumadāgamaḥ
śukla ambara dharam viṣṇum śaśi varṇam catur bhujam
prasanna vadanam dhyāyet sarva vighna upaśāntaye
śaśi dharam mahādevam sarva loka eka nāyakam

original: mahendra madhyagaṃ śāntaṃ pārvatī sahitaṃ param || 2 ||
analyzed: mahendra madhya gam śāntam pārvatī sahitam param
deva dānava siddha ādyaiḥ sevitam sura pūjitam

original: praṇamya caraṇau deva saṃghaissaha tu kāśyapaḥ || 3 ||
analyzed: praṇamya caraṇau deva saṃghaiḥ saha tu kāśyapaḥ
śuce parama sadbhāva praśāntam sṛṣṭi kāraṇam
jagatām abhivṛddhi artham yoginām upakārakam
devānām ca hita arthāya śiva jñāna samudbhavam
mahārtham alpa grantham ca karṣaṇa ādi jñāna sīmakam

original: aṃśumāniti tantraṃ ca tvayoktaṃ hi purātanam |
analyzed: aṃśumān iti tantram ca tvayā uktam hi purātanam
tantram tava ca devānām yantrāṇām adhikāriṇām
alpa āyuṣya ādi dharmāṇām narāṇām ca adhikāriṇām
anugraha antam tat teṣām saṃkṣepāt vada me prabho
sādhu sādhu mahā vipra yat tvayā paricoditam
durlabham tat aham vakṣye śṛṇuṣva ekāgra mānasaḥ
puṣya māsa ādi ṣaṣ māsāḥ māgha māsa itarāḥ śubhāḥ
dakṣiṇe ca āśvayuj māsam śrāvaṇī kṛttikā tathā

original: p. 2) pūjitā dakṣiṇādīnāṃ śeṣā māsā vivarjitāḥ |
analyzed: pūjitāḥ dakṣiṇa ādīnām śeṣāḥ māsāḥ vivarjitāḥ
pauṣṇa āditya maghā svātī sāvitrī tvaṣṭṛ maitrakaḥ
śravaṇa ārdrā prajā īśaḥ tiṣya aśvayuj ca traya uttarāḥ
dineṣu pūjitāḥ tu etāḥ pratipad ṣaṣṭhi saptamī

original: tṛtīyā paṃcamī caiva dvitīyā ca trayodaśī |
analyzed: tṛtīyā paṃcamī ca eva dvitīyā ca trayodaśī
daśamī tithayaḥ śastāḥ śuklapakṣe viśeṣataḥ
pratipad paurṇamāsī ca dvitīyā paṃcamī tathā
tṛtīyā madhyamā khyātā kṛṣṇa pakṣe dvijottama

original: ṣaṣṭhī ca daśamī kṛṣṇe kaniṣṭhā caiva garhitāḥ |
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhī ca daśamī kṛṣṇe kaniṣṭhā ca eva garhitāḥ
sita saumya śaśī jīvavārāḥ śreṣṭhatamāḥ śubhāḥ  /
teṣām aṃśa udayam horā drekkāṇāḥ ca eva darśitāḥ
śubham eva iti vijñeyāḥ tatra śaśi udayam vinā

original: kaṭakaṃ taulyamakaraṃ meṣaṃ ca dhanuṣaṃ vinā |
analyzed: kaṭakam taulya makaram meṣam ca vinā
meṣa rāśi udayam śastam sarva saṃpad samṛddhi dam
ucca sthāna gataḥ candraḥ saukhyaḥ mitra gataḥ tathā
śatru kṣetra gataḥ candraḥ nīca sthaḥ api dhana kṣayam
bhauma āditya indu rāhuḥ ca saurī vā lagna saṃsthite

original: āyuṣyaṃ dhanadhānyaṃ ca kartṛnāśaṃ na saṃśayaḥ || 18 ||
analyzed: āyuṣyam dhana dhānyam ca kartṛ nāśam na saṃśayaḥ
dhana sthāna gatāḥ krūrāḥ dhana dhānya vināśanāḥ
tathā eva candra saṃyuktam dhana dhānya vivardhanam
bhrātṛ sthāna gatāḥ sarve sarva saṃpad samṛddhi dāḥ
bandhusthāna gatāḥ pāpāḥ sarva duḥkha bhaya āvahāḥ
putra sthāna gatāḥ krūrāḥ mṛtyu pīḍā bhaviṣyati
śatrusthāna gatāḥ sarve sarva duḥkha bhaya āvahāḥ
bhāryā sthāna gatāḥ jīva candra bhārgāḥ ca vai tathā
āyuṣyam dhana dhānyam ca sarva siddhi pradāḥ sadā
nidhanam saṃgatāḥ sarve kartuḥ nidhanam ādiśet
śubha grahaḥ nava sthāne sarva saukhya dhana āvahaḥ  /
karmasthāna gatāḥ krūrāḥ
śubha grahāḥ ca karma sthāḥ sarva vitta āyuṣa pradāḥ
aśubhāḥ ca śubhāḥ ca eva valasthāna gatāḥ śubhāḥ
dvādaśa sthaḥ budhaḥ jīvaḥ vitta vṛddhim samāvahet
nakṣatra ante ca māsa ante pakṣa ante vedhita ṛkṣake
vyatīpāte parigha śūle vai ghṛte kālakaṇṭhake  /

original: kaṇṭake ca tathā sthūlaṃ pariveṣe ca durdine |
analyzed: kaṇṭake ca tathā sthūlam pariveṣe ca durdine

original: ulkāpāte ca bhṛguje vṛddhyā ca viṣanāḍike || 27 ||
analyzed: ulkā pāte ca bhṛguje vṛddhyā ca viṣa nāḍike  /
ṣaḍaśīti mukhe ca eva māsa śūnye tathā eva ca
karṣaṇa ādi pratiṣṭhā antam sarva karma vivarjayet
martyānām āyuṣa chedam kṛṣṇa pakṣe tu candra vat
tasmāt yuktena śīghram ca kartavyaḥ dharma saṃgrahaḥ

original: p. 4) alpadoṣaguṇādhikyaṃ dinaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca saṃgrahet |
analyzed: alpa doṣa guṇa ādhikyam dinam vṛddhim ca saṃgrahet

original: anekakoṭi doṣāḍhyaṃ dinaṃ lagnaṃ ca meva ca || 30 ||
analyzed: doṣa āḍhyam dinam lagnam ca ca
doṣa hīnatamam yāti jīva dṛṣṭyā dvijottama
aneka koṭi doṣaḥ tu jīva ekena vināśanam
tamasā parivṛtau rātrau khī ekena vinaśyati
tathā eva jīva dṛṣṭyā tu sarva doṣa samudgamāḥ
evam parīkṣya bahudhā karṣaṇa ādi samācaret

original: patraiva sadanaṃ kuryāt taddeśaṃ karṣaṇaṃ kuru || 33 ||
analyzed: patrā eva sadanam kuryāt tad deśam karṣaṇam kuru  /
aṣṭa dikṣu ca kartavyam grāma ādiṣu śiva ālayam

original: paiśācika pade kuryāt ālayaṃ tu parāṅmukham || 34 ||
analyzed: paiśācika pade kuryāt ālayam tu parāṅmukham
parikhāḥ tu tridaṇḍa ādi yāvat triṃśat tadā antakam
tāvat eva iṣṭa digbhāge kartavyam śiva mandiram
parikhā abhyantare vā api paiśācika pade kuru

original: mānuṣe tu pade vātha kartavyaṃ śivamaṃdiram || 36 ||
analyzed: mānuṣe tu pade vā atha kartavyam śiva maṃdiram
vipra kṣatriya viś śūdrāḥ anulomāḥ tathā eva ca
sama nirmāṇa kartāraḥ sarva prāṇi hitāya vai
hasta mātram tu tad ghātam kṛtvā tad bhūmi madhyame
pūrite tad mṛdam dhīmān adhike ca uttamān mahī

original: samatā madhyamākhyātā hīnā sā kanyasā smṛtā |
analyzed: samatā madhyamā ākhyātā hīnā sā kanyasā smṛtā

original: gṛhītā cottamā madhyā gṛhītā kanyasā mahī || 39 ||
analyzed: gṛhītā ca uttamā madhyā gṛhītā kanyasā mahī

original: p. 5) śvetā raktā tathā pītā kṛṣṇā viprādayaḥ kramāt |
analyzed: śvetā raktā tathā pītā kṛṣṇā vipra ādayaḥ kramāt
caturvidhā mahī khyātā tad tad jātya arha tā śubhā
pareṣām aparāḥ śastāḥ sva pareṣām param vinā
tad tad yogya mahī grāhyā martyānām ālayam kuru

original: sarvā mahīpraśastā ca devānāṃ tu viśeṣataḥ |
analyzed: sarvā mahī praśastā ca devānām tu viśeṣataḥ
bhūta preta piśācebhyaḥ dadyāt dadhyodanam balim
astreṇa uccāṭayet etān paścāt karṣaṇam ācaret

original: śvetau raktau ca kapilau kṛṣṇau jātyarhakau kramāt || 43 ||
analyzed: śvetau raktau ca kapilau kṛṣṇau jāti arhakau kramāt
yauvane karṣaṇe pūrvau nāga hīnau bala anvitau
hema śṛṃga khura upetau na saṃspṛśau
saṃpūjya vṛṣa gāyatryā gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ budhaḥ

original: pūrvaṃ nivedanaṃ kṛtvā prāṅmukhau saṃsthitau vṛṣau || 45 ||
analyzed: pūrvam nivedanam kṛtvā prāc mukhau saṃsthitau vṛṣau
yājñikaiḥ sāra vṛkṣaiḥ vā lakṣaṇena yugam halam

original: sīrāyāmaṃ trihastaṃ syāt nāhaṃ saptāṃgulaṃ bhavet || 46 ||
analyzed: sīra āyāmam tri hastam syāt nāham sapta aṃgulam bhavet  /
vṛtta ākāram aśeṣam tu mūlam veda aṃśa maśrakam

original: mekhaloccaṃ tritālaṃ syāt trimātraṃ tadghanaṃ bhavet || 47 ||
analyzed: bhavet

original: mūlaṃ ṣaṇmātra vistāraṃ ghanaṃ vedāṃgulaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: mūlam ṣaṣ mātra vistāram ghanam veda aṃgulam bhavet
mūlāt agram kramāt kṣīṇam kiṃcid kṣīṇam tu madhyamam
mekhalāyāḥ tu mūle tu viryaveśam nava aṃgulam
veśa aṃśe dvi aṃgulam vyāsam ghanam ardha ardha mātrakam
caturviṃśa aṅgula āyāmam ghrāṇa dīrgham tu kāśyapa
sīrā ūrdhve ghrāṇa tuṃgam tu paṃca aṅgulam udāhṛtam
ghrāṇa kukṣi unmukham kuryāt manu mātram tad āyatam
śeṣam citram iti khyātam sīra mekhala sandhitau
ṣaṣ mātram ghrāṇa vistāram ghanam veda aṃgulam bhavet
agram sūci nibha ākāram anupūrvāt kṛśam bhavet
tri paṃca mātram iti uktam sīra ghrāṇa agraka antakam
ayasā hala jihvā tu ghrāṇa agre yojayet budhaḥ
sīra āyāma samam nāham yugam cidram yugāśrakam
kaniṣṭhā aṃgulī parīṇāham gocarma dvi kara āyatam
hṛdayam maṃtram uccārya badhvā yuga āśrayau vṛṣau
yuga madhye halam badhvā kiṃcid dakṣiṇam āśritam  /
karṣayet matimān vipraḥ tṛṇa ādīni vyapohya ca
tila sarṣapa mudgāni netra maṃtreṇa vāpayet  /
ācāryam pūjayet tasmai dadyāt yuga halau vṛṣau

original: trirātrāṃ kurite śreṣṭhaṃ vedayatrau tu madhyamam || 57 ||
analyzed: tri rātrām kurite śreṣṭham vedayatrau tu madhyamam
adhamam bhūtarātram syāt adhamam parivarjayet
ā puṣpāt phala gam rakṣya go gaṇānām nivedayet
eka rātram dvi rātram vā gāvaḥ tatra eva vāsayet
go vaktra gata kenaiḥ ca gomayeḥ prastavaiḥ api

original: p. 7) sthapatiṃ pūjayetpaścāt vastrādyaiśca yathā mati |
analyzed: sthapatim pūjayet paścāt vastra ādyaiḥ ca yathā mati

original: praśastaṃ bhūtalaṃ paścāt madhye samatalaṃ guruḥ || 60 ||
analyzed: praśastam bhū talam paścāt madhye sama talam guruḥ  /
gomaya ālepanam kṛtvā diś paricchedanam kuru
śaṃkum kalā aṃgula āyāmam nāham tat samam ucyate
mūla tāra aṣṭa bhāga ekam hīnam agra viśālakam
mūla agram mukula ākāram mūla agram kramaśāt kṛśam
su vṛttam ārjavam kuryāt sāravṛkṣam tu śoṣitam
śaṃku dviguṇa mānena tad madhye maṇḍalam likhet  /
tad madhye sthāpayet śaṃkum catur dikṣu samam tathā
pūrva aparāhnayoḥ chāyāt iti tad maṇḍala anta gau  /
chāyā agra madhye saṃlakṣya tathā eva tu parāhnake
tad bindu dvaya gam sūtram pūrva apara diś iṣyate  /
tayoḥ madhyantaram bhrāmyaḥ ca parānanam pṛści vat
dakṣiṇa uttara gam sūtram tad madhye tu prasārayet

original: ye martyā madhyamārdhī tu avacchāyāṃgulaṃ vrajet |
analyzed: ye martyāḥ madhyama ardhī tu avacchāya aṃgulam vrajet
maṇḍalam kubja tālena kanyasam tu vibhājite  /
bhānuḥ vāna iṣṭa viṃśa aṃśam saptam viṃśa aṃśayā uttare
gate tu ārjavam iti uktam kanyāyāḥ ca tathā eva hi
mīna iṣṭa viṃśat aṃśa ādi bhāga madhyastha mātrakam
vardhayet mithune saptaviṃśat aṃśa avasānakam

original: p. 8) tatordhamātraṃ kṣīṇaṃ syāt bhāgaṃ prati viśeṣataḥ |
analyzed: kṣīṇam syāt bhāgam prati viśeṣataḥ
kanyāyām ca aṣṭaviṃśa aṃśāt ardha mātra vivardhanāt  /
cāpa iṣṭa viṃśat aṃśa antam tathā hrasvam tathā eva hi
chāyā vṛddhi kṣayam hi evam kīrtitā śaṃku madhyamāt
chāyā mānam vrajet madhye brahmasūtram prasārayet
pūrva apara āhvayoḥ madhye chāyāmānam ca varjayet
prāc ādi paritas sūtram iṣṭa mānena vinyaset
puṇyāham vācaye paścāt khātvā prāsāda mānakaḥ
yāvat prāsāda vistāram ekāśīti padam guruḥ

original: tatpade vāstu devāṃśca pūjayitvā tu nāmataḥ || 74 ||
analyzed: tad pade vāstu devān ca pūjayitvā tu nāmataḥ
dadhi ājya gula saṃmiśram odanam ca balim dadet
praṇava ādīn nāma madhye svāhā antam balim ācaret

original: vāstuhomaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā madhye vā cottare'pi vā |
analyzed: vāstu homam tatas kṛtvā madhye vā ca uttare api vā
vāstu homam vinā ayatra kṛtam vāstu vinaśyati
paryagnikaraṇam kṛtvā prokṣayet paṃcagavyakaiḥ
sthapatiḥ kṛtya yogyaḥ syāt sthāpakaḥ mantra yogyakaḥ
karṣaṇam hi evam ākhyātam śṛṇu prāsāda vāstukam
iti aṃśumatkāśyape karṣaṇa vidhi paṭalaḥ prathamaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa prāsāde vāstu lakṣaṇam
prāsādasya viśāle tu nava bhāga vibhājite

original: prāgagraṃ daśasūtraṃ syāt udagagraṃ tathaiva ca |
analyzed: prāc agram daśa sūtram syāt udak agram tathā eva ca

original: evaṃ navanavāṃśe tu brahmā madhye navāṃśabhuk || 2 ||
analyzed: evam nava nava aṃśe tu brahmā madhye nava aṃśa bhuj   /
marīciḥ pūrva bhāge tu vivasvān dakṣiṇe tathā
mitraḥ paścima bhāge tu uttare pṛthivīdharaḥ  /
brahmāṇam ca nirīkṣya eva sthitvā ṣaṭpada bhāginaḥ
āpaḥ ca eva āpavatsaḥ ca tu aiśānyām diśi saṃsthitau
savitraḥ ca eva sāvitraḥ hi āgneyyām diśi saṃsthitau
indraḥ indrajayaḥ ca eva nairṛtyām diśi saṃsthitau
rudraḥ rudrajayaḥ ca eva vāyavyām diśi saṃsthitau
ete dvipada bhoktāraḥ ardham ardha dvayam tathā
īśānaḥ ca eva parjanyaḥ jayantaḥ ca mahendrakaḥ
ādityaḥ satyakaḥ ca eva bhraṃśaḥ ca eva antarikṣakaḥ

original: agniḥ pūṣā ca vitatho rākṣasaśca yamastathā |
analyzed: agniḥ pūṣā ca vitathaḥ rākṣasaḥ ca yamaḥ tathā
gandharvaḥ bhṛṃgarājaḥ ca mṛgaḥ ca eva tu dakṣiṇe
nirṛtī ca eva dauvārī sugrīvaḥ puṣpadantakaḥ

original: varuṇaḥ śoṣarogau ca pāpayakṣmā ca paścime || 9 ||
analyzed: varuṇaḥ śoṣa rogau ca pāpayakṣmā ca paścime
vāyuḥ nāgaḥ tathā mukhyaḥ bhallāṭaḥ somaḥ eva ca
ṛc āditi dyutiḥ ca eva bāhye tu eka aṃśa bhāginaḥ

original: p. 10) carakī ca vidārī ca pūtanā pāparākṣasī |
analyzed: carakī ca vidārī ca pūtanā pāpa rākṣasī
īśāna ādiṣu koṇeṣu bāhya sthāḥ pada varjitāḥ
pūrva ādiṣu catur dikṣu skandaḥ vaica aryamā tathā
vijṛmbhaḥ balipiṃchaḥ ca pūrvavat pada varjitāḥ
ete ca ekona paṃcāśat devatāḥ parikīrtitāḥ

original: viṃśatsūtraistu te sarve badhvā vai vāstumūrtinām || 13 ||
analyzed: viṃśat sūtraiḥ tu te sarve badhvā vai vāstu mūrtinām
tu uddhṛtāḥ

original: vāstumūrtiḥ kathaṃ deva ! badhvā taṃ śāyayetkatham || 14 ||
analyzed: vāstu mūrtiḥ katham deva badhvā tam śāyayet katham
deva asura mahā yuddham vartate tu yadā tadā
asurāṇām hita arthāya śukraḥ pratyādihat tapaḥ
tatas tapasi saṃbhūtaḥ bhūta ākāram mahā balam
aprabuddhiḥ tu tam bhūtam devaiḥ yuddham pravartate
sarva deva āyudhaiḥ ca eva na śakyate

original: sarvadevāśca taṃ bhūtaṃ śayanaṃ tu hyadhomukham || 17 ||
analyzed: sarva devāḥ ca tam bhūtam śayanam tu hi adhomukham

original: viṃśatsūtraiśca taṃ bhūtaṃ badhvā saṃpīḍya saṃsthitaḥ |
analyzed: viṃśat sūtraiḥ ca tam bhūtam badhvā saṃpīḍya saṃsthitaḥ
samāpa vāstu puruṣaḥ vāstu mūrtim tam ucyate  /
tad mūrtyā adhomukham hi evam sarveṣām duḥkham āvahet
yatra yat vāstu vinyāsam tat sarvam vāstu mūrtimān
sarvaḥ ṛddhikara artham tu vāstu homa balim kuru

original: p. 11) brahmādidevatānāṃ tu tṛpti homabaliṃ dvijaḥ |
analyzed: brahma ādi devatānām tu homa balim dvijaḥ

original: tāsāṃ tṛptiṃ kṛte vāstu puruṣācca na bādhyate || 21 ||
analyzed: tāsām tṛptim kṛte vā astu puruṣāt ca na bādhyate
tasmāt sarva prayatnena brahma ādīnām balim dadet
vāstu homaḥ ca kartavyaḥ brahma ādīnām sva nāmataḥ

original: īśāne tu śiro nyeva pādau nir-ṛtigocarau |
analyzed: īśāne tu śiraḥ pādau nirṛti gocarau
āgneyyām vāyu digbhāge korparau jānu śāyinau
mūrti geha sthitāḥ śira sandhitaḥ

original: netrasthāne ca parjanyo jayantaśca trikaṃ bhṛgaḥ || 24 ||
analyzed: netra sthāne ca parjanyaḥ jayantaḥ ca trikam bhṛgaḥ
āpaḥ kṛka ādika ūrdhve tu āpa vatsaḥ tathā eva ca

atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa caraṇa āyāma vistṛtam
ākāram bhūṣaṇam ca eva saṃkṣepāt śṛṇu suvrata

original: staṃbhaṃ ca talipaṃ caiva caraṇaṃ jaṃghameva ca |
analyzed: staṃbham ca talipam ca eva caraṇam jaṃgham eva ca

original: sthāṇuḥ sthūṇaṃ ca pādaṃ ca paryāya vacanastvime || 2 ||
analyzed: sthāṇuḥ sthūṇam ca pādam ca
āpta utsedha aṃśa mānena pāda āyāmam vidhīyate
adhiṣṭhānasya tuṃgasya dviguṇam vā aṃghri tuṃgakam
tasmāt dharā tala uccam tu ṣaṣ aṣṭa aṃśa adhikam tu vā
dārupādam tu tatam hi etat kuḍyapādam athā ucyate
tad ardham vā tri bhāga ūna catur bhāga ūnam eva vā
kuḍya stambha viśālam syāt etat sarveṣu dhāmasu
prateḥ uttara sīmāntam sālastaṃbham ucyate  /
upānāt uttara antam yat nikhāta staṃbham ucyate
tuṃgam sapta aṣṭadhā bhajya nava dharma aṃśam eva vā
tad mūla tāram ākhyātam tat tāram tu tathā bhajet
eka bhāga vihīnam tu śeṣam agra viśālakam
eka ādi ṣoḍaśā antānām talam prati evam ācaret
mūlāt agram tu kuṃbha mṛṇḍī ādi saṃyutam
brahmakāntam iti khyātam vasvaśram viṣṇukāntakam
rasāśram indrakāntam syāt candrakāntam kalāśrakam
kaṇṭha mānena tad mūle vedāśram tu prakalpayet
staṃbha agram ca eka mānena caturaśra samanvitam
tayoḥ madhyam tu vasvaśram ṣoḍaśāśram atha api vā

original: vṛttākāraṃ tu vā vipra ! kuṃbhamaṃḍyādi saṃyutam |
analyzed: vṛtta ākāram tu vā vipra kuṃbha maṃḍī ādi saṃyutam
rudrakāntam idam khyātam mūlāt agram tu vartulam
kuṃbha maṃḍī ādi hīnam yat tat vyāpī rudraka antakam
mūlāt agram yugāśram tu madhyeṣṭāśram tat ucyate
catur aśram adhobhāge aṣṭa aśram madhyamam tathā
tad ūrdhve vṛttam evam syāt tri bhāgam tuṅga sādṛśam
śivacchandam idam khyātam śiva harmye praśaṃsitam
daṇḍam sārdha dvi daṇḍam vā mūle padmāsana udayam

original: dviguṇaṃ tasya vistāraṃ padmākāraṃ tu kārayet |
analyzed: dviguṇam tasya vistāram padma ākāram tu kārayet
sa padmam karṇikāyām tu caraṇa sthāpanam kuru
yathā iṣṭa ākṛti saṃyuktam kuṃbha maṇḍī ādi saṃyutam
cakravāka latā ādyaiḥ tu bhūṣitam padma pādakam
tu vyālena vyālapādakam
mūlebham tad pramāṇena gajapādam udāhṛtam
mūle siṃha ādibhiḥ yuktam yathā iṣṭa ākṛti saṃyutam
kuṃbha maṃḍī ādi saṃyuktam tad tad nāmnā prakīrtitam
vṛtta ākāre tad āyāme śuṇḍu pādaiḥ samanvitam
kuṃbha maṃḍī ādi saṃyuktam śuṇḍu pādam udāhṛtam
muktā dāmaiḥ alam kṛtya piṇḍipādam udāhṛtam
viṣkaṃbha karṇa mānena staṃbha agre caturaśrakam
tad ardha su ardha daṇḍena tu abjam aṣṭa asra saṃyutam
daṇḍa mānena tasya adhas vasu aśram parikalpayet
tad adhas pūrvavat padmam tasya adhas daṇḍa mānataḥ
caturaśra samāyuktam tasya adhastāt tu pūrvavat

original: mūle tu śeṣaṃ vedāśraṃ citraṃ vātha taducyate |
analyzed: mūle tu śeṣam vedāśram citram vā atha tat ucyate
tad madhye paṭṭam vasvaśram śrīkaṇṭham tat udāhṛtam
ced śrīvaktram staṃbham ucyate
syāt tri paṭṭam kṣepaṇa anvitam
kṣepaṇa staṃbham ākhyātam paṭṭam patra ādi śobhitam
staṃbha tāra tri bhāga ekam catur bhāga ekam eva vā
staṃbha madhye śivām kuryāt ūrdhva adhastāt viśeṣataḥ
staṃbha mūle tu padma ādīn staṃbha mānena kalpayet  /
staṃbha lakṣaṇam ākhyātam bodhikā lakṣaṇam śṛṇu
iti aṃśumānkāśyape staṃbha lakṣaṇa paṭalaḥ aṣṭamaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa bodhikā lakṣaṇam param
mūla pāda sama vyāsam śreṣṭha madhyena madhyamam
agra pāda viśālena samam kanyasa bodhikāḥ
vistāra sadṛśa utsedham paṃca daṇḍa āyata anvitam
uttamā bodhikā khyātā tāra dvi tri aṃśam unnatam
madhyamā sā prakīrtitā
vistārasya ardha tuṃgam tu tat tri daṇḍa āyata anvitā
kanyasā bodhikā khyātā tu aṃghrīyaḥ bodhikā anvitā
madhyemaṃśe taraṃgasyāḥ latā ādyaiḥ bhūṣitam tu vā
tad adhas tu eka bhāgena kukṣibandham tu kārayet

original: daṇḍaṃ tripādamardhaṃ vā chāyāmānaṃ ca dagrayoḥ || 6 ||
analyzed: daṇḍam tri pādam ardham vā chāyā mānam ca
adhastāt bodhika aṃśena alaṃkāram vadāmi aham
madhya paṭṭa tri bhāga ekam vistāra ardham atha api vā
pārśvayoḥ ubhayoḥ śeṣam taraṃga sthānam ucyate  /
sa kṣudra kṣepaṇam madhya paṭṭam patraiḥ alaṃkṛtam
pārśvayoḥ tu taraṃgaḥ syāt samāḥ ca anyonya hīnakam
bodhikā vistara ardham vā tri pādam vā agra nīvrakam
tad nivra sadṛśam vyāsam saṃbhoja kāra kalpitam
tad utsedham ṣaṣ aṃśam tu kṛtvā ūrdhvam paṭṭikā aṃśakam
ūrdhva padmam atha aṃśena karṇam ardhena kārayet  /
adhas padmam dvi bhāgena adhas paṭṭyaṃśam ucyate
adhas stha ambujam ardha aṃśam kalpayet tu krameṇa tu
padmasya mukula ākāram agra ādadhe gatam kuru
agra niṣkrāma yuktam vā chatra ākāram atha api vā
pārśvayoḥ muṣṭi bandha agram vyāla rūpa ādi kalpitam
bhūtaiḥ ca makaraiḥ vyālaiḥ nāṭaka ādyaiḥ vibhūṣitam

original: p. 42) ratnabandhakriyā vāpi citrā vāgrastha ghaṭṭitam |
analyzed: ratna bandha kriyā
bodhi agrayoḥ taraṃgaḥ syāt tad madhye daṇḍa mānataḥ  /
paṭṭam kartavyam tāra ucchrāye sa suvratā
nānā citraiḥ alam kṛtya bodhikā citra bodhikā
patraiḥ vicitritā patrabodhikā parikīrtitā
mahā arṇava taraṃga ābhān taraṃgān tu prakalpayet
pādam ardham tri pādam vā bhitteḥ stambhasya nirgatiḥ
caturaśra aṣṭa vṛttānām kramāt sādhāraṇam tu vā
bodhi kāyaḥ tu adhastāt tu vīra kāṇḍam yuga aśrakam
agra pāda samam tāram tri pādam tuṃgam ucyate
sarveṣām api pādānām vīrakāṇḍam yugāśrakam
śṛṇu
iti aṃśumān kāśyape bodhikālakṣaṇa paṭalaḥ navamaḥ

original: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa phalakānāṃ tu lakṣaṇam |
analyzed: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa phalakānām tu lakṣaṇam
catur daṇḍa viśālam tu uttamā bhavet
athavā kuṃbha karṇa samam bhavet

original: p. 43) sarveṣāṃ phalakānāṃ tu tuṃgaṃ pādona daṇḍakam |
analyzed: sarveṣām phalakānām tu tuṅgam daṇḍakam
tad utsedham tridhā ābhajya ūrdhva aṃśa utsaṃdhiḥ ucyate
tad adhas vetram eka aṃśam tasya adhasta aṃśam ambujam
nāga vaktra sama ākāram āpotrāt pāda rūpavat
sarveṣām phalakānām tu utsandhyā ābham yuga aśrakam
phalakā iva prakartavyā tasya adhastāt ghaṭam kuru
dvi daṇḍam pāda hīnam vā sārdha daṇḍam atha api vā
sa pāda daṇḍa tuṃgam vā ghaṭa uccam tu caturvidham
priyadarśana saumyam ca candrakāntam ca śrīkaram
yathā krameṇa nāmāni kalaśānām krama uditam
ghaṭa ucchraye nava aṃśena ghṛta bhāgena parikalpayet
veda aṃśam kalaśa utsedham kaṇṭham eka aṃśa mānataḥ  /
āsya uccam eka bhāgena padmam ekena kalpayet
ardhena vṛttam ardhena hīnau saṃkalpayet budhaḥ
ūrdhvāt adhas gatam kuryāt tat etena vinā kramāt
evam uccam samākhyātam niṣkaṃbham adhunā śṛṇu
pāda vyāsa samam hīrau tad karṇam ca asya vistṛtam

original: āsyaṃ karṇaṃ viśeṣeṇa kuṃbhasyaiva tu vistṛtam || 11 ||
analyzed: āsyam karṇam viśeṣeṇa kuṃbhasya eva tu vistṛtam
stambha vyāsa samam proktam vistāram dhṛga kaṇṭhayoḥ
tasya adhas laśunam mūla tuṃga daṇḍa eka mānataḥ  /
tad ardhaḥ tad tad ardhena mānena abjam prakalpayet
vaktra sthānam udāhṛtam
tasya adhas daṇḍa mānena muktā dāmaiḥ vibhūṣitam

original: laśunaṃ cābjapatraṃ ca muktādāma tathaiva ca || 14 ||
analyzed: laśunam ca abja patram ca muktā dāma tathā eva ca
staṃbha vyāsa samam vyāsam kalpayet kalpa vittamaḥ
athavā bodhikā ādīnām udayam tu vadāmi aham
ūrdhva bhāgam tu saṃgrāhya dvāviṃśati aṃśakam bhavet
yuga aṃśam bodhikā utsedham vīrakāṇḍam ca tad samam
bhavet
tadā asya udayam eka aṃśam padmam ekena kārayet  /
vittam ardhena kartavyam hīrau tat samam ucyate
staṃbha bhūṣaṇam evam syāt vedikā lakṣaṇam tathā
iti aṃśumānkāśyape stambhabhūṣaṇa paṭalaḥ daśamaḥ

original: p. 45) atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa vedikā lakṣaṇaṃ param |
analyzed: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa vedikā lakṣaṇam param
adhiṣṭhāna upariṣṭhāt tu staṃbha mūle tu kalpayet
prastarasya upariṣṭāt ca kartavyā vedikā dvija
adhyardha daṇḍa mānam tu kanyasā

original: dvidaṇḍena tu madhyaṃ syāt śreṣṭhatuṃgaṃ tridaṇḍakam |
analyzed: dvi daṇḍena tu madhyam syāt śreṣṭha tuṃgam tri daṇḍakam
athavā anya prakāreṇa vedikā utsedham ucyate
vibhājite
eka aṃśam vedikā mānam kramāt śreṣṭha antara adhamam

original: evaṃ hi caraṇāyāṃ tu mūle tu vedikodayam |
analyzed: evam hi caraṇāyām tu mūle tu vedikā udayam

original: ūrdhve bhūmyaṃghri tuṃgaṃ tu saptabhāgaṃ vibhājite || 5 ||
analyzed: ūrdhve tuṃgam tu sapta bhāgam vibhājite  /
eka aṃśam kaṇṭha harmyāṇām vedikā udayam iṣyate
tri catur paṃca bhāgam tu gala utsedham vibhājite  /
galamūle tu vedi uccam aṃśam śreṣṭha antara adhamam
āpeta utsedha aṃśa mānam vā gala mūle tu vedikā
gala ūrdhve kaṃpam eka aṃśam ekena abjam prakalpayet
tad ūrdhva kaṃpam ekena kartavyam dvijasattama
sapta aṃṣṭa aṃśe tu vedi ucce veda bhūtam kramāt galam

original: kampapadmaṃ ca kampaṃ ca prāgivaiva prakalpayet |
analyzed: kampa padmam ca kampam ca prāk iva eva prakalpayet
karṇa mānena tad mūle kaṃpam ekena kalpayet  /

original: p. 46) śeṣaṃ karṇodayaṃ proktaṃ tatkaṃparahitaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: śeṣam karṇa udayam proktam tat kampa rahitam tu vā

original: adhyardhāṃśaṃ tu vā padmaṃ tuṃgaṃ dvyaṃśamathāpi vā || 11 ||
analyzed: adhyardha aṃśam tu vā padmam tuṃgam dvi aṃśam atha api vā
padma śaivala patra ābhā citra aṃgā vedikā matā
sarvāsām vedikānām tu galam aṃghri vibhūṣitam
kuḍya staṃbha samam vyāsam nīvram ca vedikā aṃghriṇā
prastara upari vedīnām veśanam śṛṇu suvrata
catur bhāga eka veśam vā
kuḍya staṃbhasya bāhyām tu vedyā aṃghrī bāhyaveśanam
evam vā anya prakāreṇa vedikā vistṛtam śṛṇu
kuḍya pād bāhyamānam tu ubhayoḥ pārśvayoḥ api

original: ṣaṭsaptāṣṭanavāṃśaṃ vā daśabhāgaṃ tu vā bhajet || 16 ||
analyzed: ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭa nava aṃśam vā daśa bhāgam tu vā bhajet  /
eka aṃśa rahitam śeṣam vedikāyāḥ tu vistaram
yuga aśra vedikā ākārāḥ nāgare prastara upari
drāviḍe vesare harmye vasvaśram vedikā ākṛtiḥ

original: athavā vesare harmye vedikā vṛttameva vā || 18 ||
analyzed: athavā vesare harmye vedikā vṛttam eva vā
ca galāśrāḥ vedikāśrakāḥ
vedikā lakṣaṇam proktam śṛṇu jālāka lakṣaṇam
iti aṃśumān kāśyape vedikā lakṣaṇa paṭalaḥ ekādaśa
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa śṛṇujālāka lakṣaṇam
pāda varge gale ca eva jālakasthānam ucyate
prāsādeṣu mahā śālāsu antarāle ca madhyame
vātāyanam prakartavyam anena vidhinā budhaḥ
yojayet vedikā ūrdhve tu jālakam tu dvijottama

original: tasmādyatnena vediṃ tu jālakārdhaṃ na chedayet |
analyzed: tasmāt yatnena vedim tu jālaka ardham na chedayet

original: dvidaṇḍaṃ kanyasaṃ vyāsaṃ tridaṇḍaṃ madhyamaṃ bhavet || 4 ||
analyzed: dvi daṇḍam kanyasam vyāsam tri daṇḍam madhyamam bhavet
catur daṇḍa viśālam tu uttamam parikīrtitam
vistāra sadṛśa utsedhāt eka daṇḍa vivardhanāt  /
vistāra dviguṇam yāvat tāvat vaijālaka unnatam
eṣu tuṃga viśāleṣu yat iṣṭam tat parigrahet
stambha vyāsa ardha mānam tu ghana vyāsa aṃghri kaṃpayoḥ
vistāra ardha ghanam vyāsam tri caturtha aṃśam eva vā

original: madhye staṃbhaṃ ca raṃghraṃ ca varjyā jālakamācaret |
analyzed: madhye staṃbham ca raṃghram ca varjyāḥ jālakam ācaret
yugma pāda samāyuktam yugmakam penam ucyate  /
gonetram hastinetram ca nandyāvartam ṛjuṃkriyām

original: puṣpaghaṇḍaṃ rasakaṇṭhaṃ ca jālakaṃ ṣaḍvidhaṃ bhavet || 9 ||

analyzed: kaṇṭha ga chidram gonetram iti saṃjñitam
kaṇṭha ga chidram hastinetram udāhṛtam
paṃca sūtram tu yat chidram pradakṣiṇa vaśāt kṛtam
nandyāvartasya puṣpa ābham nandyāvartam udāhṛtam
ārjavam saṃbhakam vaudvau jālakam tat ṛju kriyam
puṣpa khaṇḍam ca karṇam ca nandyāvartam iva ākṛtiḥ
stambha yogam kavāṭam ca bhitti madhyāt bahis sthitam
yugmāyugmaka vāṭam vā ghāṭanāt ghāṭana kṣamam
jālakam tu sabhā ādīnām madhya mānena kalpayet
lohaiḥ druma utpalaiḥ dravyaiḥ veṣṭakābhiḥ tu jālakam

original: trayovidhaṃ tu yaddravyaṃ tena tatraiva yojayet |
analyzed: trayovidham tu yat dravyam tena tatra eva yojayet
jālakam hi evam ākhyātam tatas toraṇa lakṣaṇam
iti aṃśumān kāśyape jālaka lakṣaṇa paṭalaḥ dvādaśa

original: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa toraṇānāṃ tu lakṣaṇam |
analyzed: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa toraṇānām tu lakṣaṇam
pāda udaye daśa aṃśe tu sapta aṃśam caraṇa udayam
śeṣam ca guṇa bhāgam tu jhaṣa mānam udāhṛtam
nava aṃśe pāda tuṃgam tu ṣaṣ aṃśam caraṇa āyatam

original: p. 49) śeṣaṃ jhaṣodayaṃ khyātaṃ aṣṭāṃśe vāṃghrituṃgakam |
analyzed: śeṣam jhaṣa udayam khyātam aṣṭa aṃśe vā aṅghri tuṅgakam
paṃca aṃśam caraṇa uttuṃgam jhaṣa utsedham guṇa aṃśakam
tuṃga ardham vipulam vā atha veda bhūta rasa aṃghrikaiḥ
toraṇasya eva pād bāhye vyāsam evam caturvidham
prāsāda maṇṭapa ādīnām madhya bhāge tu toraṇam
anena vidhinā vā api kartavyam bhitti bāhyake
patra ākhya toraṇam ca ādau dvitīyam makara toraṇam
tṛtīyam citra saṃjñā tu trividham toraṇa ākṛtiḥ
ardhacandram iva ākāram patra ja ādi virājitam
patratoraṇam ākhyātam tatas makaram ucyate
paṃcavaktra samāyuktam pārśvayoḥ makara āsyakam
madhye pūrīsa saṃyuktam nānāvidha latā anvitam
nānā alaṃkāra saṃyuktam yuktam makara toraṇam
tat eva pārśvayoḥ madhye purīmasya dvayoḥ api
nakra tuṇḍam prakartavyam bhūta vidyādhara āsyakam
siṃha ibha vyāla haṃsa ādyaiḥ pāla asram mukta dāmakaiḥ
anyaiḥ ca vividhaiḥ citraiḥ ratna bandhaiḥ ca bhūṣitam
citra toraṇam etat syāt procyate toraṇa trayam
toraṇāni uttara adhastāt prayojyāni vicakṣaṇaiḥ
pāda uccam pañca ṣaṣ sapta bhāge dvau toraṇa agrakam

original: śeṣaṃ pādodayaṃ khyātaṃ evaṃ citramidaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: śeṣam pāda udayam khyātam evam citram idam bhavet
catur aśra aṣṭakam vā api vṛttam vā toraṇa aṃghrikam
kuṃbha maṃḍī ādi saṃyuktam bodhikā rahitam tu vā
bodhikā sahitam vā api vīrakāṇḍa samanvitam

original: kuḍyastaṃbhaviśālārdhaṃ tripādaṃ vā samaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: kuḍya staṃbha viśāla ardham tri pādam vā samam tu vā
toraṇa aṃghri viśālam tu procyate dvijasattama
uttaram vājanam sa abja kṣepaṇam kudravājanam
yathākrameṇa saṃkalpya anena vidhinā budhaḥ
toraṇa aṃghri viśālam vā tri pādam vā uttara udayam
tad ardham vājana uccam tu tasya ardham dala mānakam
dala ūrdhva kṣepaṇam khyātam tasya ardham kṣudra vājanam

original: uttaraṃ bodhikordhve vā vīrakāṇḍe tu vā bhavet || 18 ||
analyzed: uttaram bodhikā ūrdhve vā vīrakāṇḍe tu vā bhavet
utsaṃdhyam tad nata agreṇa kuryāt makara viṣṭharam
toraṇa agra viśālam tu kuḍya staṃbha udaya ardhakam
kuḍya staṃbha dvayoḥ antar vyāsam vā toraṇa agrakam
aṃghri vetra avasānam vā tasmāt daṇḍa adhikam tu vā
evam caturvidham khyātam toraṇa agra viśālakam
kuḍya toraṇam ākhyātam dvāra toraṇam ucyate
dvāra tulya unnatam vyāsam toraṇa aṅghri antaram samam
uttaram vājanam ca abja kṣepaṇam ca aṣṭamaṃgalam
paṃcavaktra āḍhyam prāc ukta vidhinā kuru
patra ākhyam makara ākhyam vā citra toraṇam eva vā
madhya ūrdhve śūla saṃyuktam pārśvayoḥ ca samanvitam
darpaṇam pūrṇa kuṃbham ca vṛṣabham yugma cāmaram
śrīvatsam svastikam śaṃkham dīpaḥ deva aṣṭa maṃgalam

original: śrīvatsaṃ madhyame kuryāt śeṣāstu tasya pārśvayoḥ || 25 ||
analyzed: śrīvatsam madhyame kuryāt śeṣāḥ tu tasya pārśvayoḥ  /
lohaiḥ dāru śilābhiḥ vā kartavyam dvāra toraṇam

pāda uccam tu tridhā ābhajya dvi bhāgam caraṇa udayam
pādam sarva aṃga saṃyuktam bodhikā rahitam kuru
uttaram vājanam ca abja kṣepaṇam nimna vājanam
tad ūrdhve jhaṣa khaṇḍam tu nānā citraiḥ vicitritam
toraṇam makara ākhyam tu mṛṇābhye dvi krakandharam
etat syāt staṃbha toraṇam
pāda antare vā hārāyām karṇa prāsāda madhyame
śālā madhya antarālāyām kartavyam sarva dhāmasu
stambha toraṇam ākhyātam kuṃbha latāḥ vidhim śṛṇu
iti aṃśumānkāśyape toraṇa lakṣaṇa paṭalaḥ trayodaśa
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa kuṃbha latā vidhim śṛṇu
staṃbha mūle tu vedi ūrdhve padmāsanam prakalpayet
pāda vyāsa samam tuṃgam sapta ādam padma vistaram
padma uccam vasudhā bhajya kampam eka aṃśam ucyate  /

original: adhaḥ padmaṃ guṇāṃśaṃ tu ekāṃśaṃ galamucyate |
analyzed: adhas padmam guṇa aṃśam tu eka aṃśam galam ucyate
ūrdhva padmam dvi bhāgam tu kampam ekena kārayet  /

tad tuṃga dviguṇam kuṃbham vyāsam iti ucyate mayā
kuṃbhasya staṃbha niryūham vallī maṇḍala saṃyutam
kuṃbha maṃḍī ādi saṃyuktam vīra kāṇḍa vihīnakam
phalaka upari padmam tu kuṃbha mānena kārayet

original: kuṃbhaṃ kuṃbhaṃ latāṃ hyetāṃ anyathā vakṣyate budhaiḥ || 6 ||
analyzed: kuṃbham kuṃbham latām hi etām anyathā vakṣyate budhaiḥ
tat eva utsaṃdhikā ūrdhve tu vīra kāṇḍa samanvitam

original: evaṃ trividhinītyā tu procyate kuṃbhalatā dvija ! || 8 ||
analyzed: evam tri vidhi nītyā tu procyate kuṃbha latā dvija
iti aṃśumān kāśyape kuṃbha latā vidhi paṭalaḥ caturdaśa
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa vṛtta sphuṭita lakṣaṇam
ṣaṣ aṃgulam samārabhyam dvi dvi aṃgula vivardhanāt
kalā aṃgula avadhiḥ yāvat tāvat vyāsam tu ṣaṭvidham

original: vitārārdhaṃ tu tannivraṃ tridvyaṃśaṃ vā tribhāgikam || 2 ||
analyzed: vitāra ardham tu tat nivram tri dvi aṃśam vā tri bhāgikam

original: sakandharaṃ tadūrdhve tu śukanāsyānvitaṃ tu vā || 3 ||
analyzed: sa kandharam tad ūrdhve tu śuka nāsya anvitam tu vā

staṃbha utsedha yuga aṃśe tu dvi bhāgam caraṇa āyatam
prastara udayam eka aṃśam śukanāsya udaya aṃśakam

athavā antara maṃcam tu prokta mārgeṇa vā kuru

original: staṃbhākhye toraṇaṃ caiva tathā kuṃbhalatā dvija ! |
analyzed: staṃbha ākhye toraṇam ca eva tathā kuṃbha latāḥ dvija

iti aṃśumān kāśyape vṛtta sphuṭita lakṣaṇa paṭalaḥ paṃcadaśa
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa dvāra vinyāsa lakṣaṇam
pāda uccam daśadhā bhajya śuddha dvāram nava aṃśakam  /
caraṇam navadhā bhajyam aṣṭa aṃśam dvāra mānakam
athavā ghrika tuṃgam tu vasu bhāga vibhājite

original: saptāṃśaṃ dvāramānaṃ tu śeṣaṃ tu rasabhājite |
analyzed: sapta aṃśam dvāra mānam tu śeṣam tu rasa bhājite
sārdha vahni aṃśam ūrdhve tu bhuvaṃgasya ucchrayam bhavet
pataṃga uccam adhastāt tu sārdha dvi bhagam ucyate

eka dvi tri catuṣpaṃca ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭa nava aṃgulam
tuṅga ardhāt adhikam hīnam tāram ekona viṃśati
bhedam evam tridhā ākhyātam dvāra tuṃgam tridhā bhavet

original: sarveṣāmapi harmyāṇāṃ dvāraṃ madhye tu yojayet || 6 ||
analyzed: sarveṣām api harmyāṇām dvāram madhye tu yojayet  /

tuṃgam tu
guṇa aṃśam ūrdhva gam khyātam bāhya abjam kṣepaṇa anvitam

pataṃga tāre yogasya tulyam abja vihīnakam

original: bhuvaṃgaṃ ca pataṃgaṃ ca madhyastha balayānvitam || 10 ||
analyzed: bhuvaṃgam ca pataṃgam ca madhyastha balayā anvitam

original: p. 55) tāmrajau vāyasau vātha valayau kīlabandhitau |
analyzed: tāmra jau vāyasau vā atha valayau kīla bandhitau

śailajam ca bhuvaṃga ādi yoga agra śikhayā anvitau
bhuvaṃga pataṃgayā ucchidra ragrayoḥ veśanā anvitau
evam dṛḍhīkṛtam paścāt yoga sthāpanam ācaret
su nakṣatre śubhe vāre śubha homa muhūrtake
yogam tu sthāpayet vipra śānti homa purassaram
bhitti vyāse tu paṃca aṃśe dvābhyām paṃca avasānakam
abhyantare tu sapta aṃśa sīmā yogasya madhyamam
tat bāhya ibhyantare ca eva yoga vyāsaḥ gata āśritam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam yogam sthāpya dṛḍhīkṛtam
ubhayoḥ pārśvayoḥ paścāt kavāṭe yogam āśritau  /
pratyekam eka pakṣam vā dvi tri pakṣam atha api vā
antar sarat amaiḥ vipra kaṃvāṭam tu dṛḍhīkṛtam
yaṣṭi traya antarau etau ca ūrdhvedhastāt śritau
snigdha sāra drumaiḥ bāhya abhyantare yaṣṭi bandhitau
tri paṃca sapta saṃkhyāḥ vā nava rudra trayodaśa
paṃca saptadaśa eva atha yaṣṭi saṃkhyā eka pārśvakam
tathā eva ubhaya pārśve ca loha kīlaiḥ dṛḍhīkṛtam
vāma pārśve kavāṭe tu yojayet vādu paṭṭikā
tri catuḥ paṃca mātram vā dvāra paṭṭika vistṛtam
tad tri bhāga eka bhāgam tu tasya nīvram udāhṛtam

original: tannivra dviguṇaṃ khyātaṃ nīvraṃ vai tatkavāṭayoḥ |
analyzed: tat nivra dviguṇam khyātam nīvram vai tat kavāṭayoḥ
kavāṭa agre ca madhye ca vāma paṭṭika pārśvayoḥ
lohajam valayā upetā vetānī kīla bandhitam
loha jam dāru jam vā atha yaṣṭayaḥ

original: tāsāṃ triyaṃgulaṃ tāraṃ tārārdhaṃ ghana saṃyutam |

original: p. 57) tayormadhyāntarāle vā hyomābhīṣṭaṃ tu yatra vai |

analyzed: kaṃpa dvāram samākhyātam prastaram tu tatas śṛṇu
iti aṃśumān kāśyape kaṃpa dvāra lakṣaṇa paṭalaḥ saptadaśa

original: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa prastarasya tu lakṣaṇam |
analyzed: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa prastarasya tu lakṣaṇam
staṃbha ardham maṃca mānam tu āpa utsedha aṃśam eva vā

vājanam ca eka bhāgena bhūtamālām tatam tribhiḥ

sapta aṃśam tu kapota uccam āliṃgam ca eka bhāgayā
aṃśena antaritam kuryāt pratyutsedham guṇa aṃśakam
vājanam tu eka bhāgena athavā anya prakārataḥ
tuṃgam ekonaviṃśa aṃśam kṛta uttaram tri bhāgayā

original: evaṃ dvitalamākhyātaṃ tritalaṃ tu tathā viduḥ || 62 ||
analyzed: evam dvi talam ākhyātam tri talam tu tathā viduḥ
iti aṃśumān kāśyape dvi tala māna paṭalaḥ saptāviṃśaḥ

original: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa tritalaṃ śṛṇu suvrata ! |
analyzed: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa tri talam śṛṇu suvrata
tasya vistāra tuṃgam ca purā uktam harmya māna vat
vinyāsa sūtrayoḥ antar tad aṣṭa aṃśa vibhājite
eka aṃśam kūṭa vistāram viśāla āyāmam tu tat dvayam
samam tri pādam ardham vā paṃjara vyāsam ucyate
śeṣam hāra antaram khyātam niṣkrānta ādīni pūrvavat
ūrdhva bhūmau rasa aṃśa iṃśam kūṭa vyāsam udāhṛtam
śālāyāma dvi bhāgam tu śeṣam hāra antaram bhavet
hāra antara samam vā ardha tri pādam vā atha paṃjaram
daṇḍam sārdha dvi daṇḍam vā madhyabhadrasya nīvrakam
prāsādasya ucchrayam bhānu dviguṇa aṃśam vibhājite  /
dvi bhāgam dharā tala uccam vai vedāṃśam caraṇa udayam
dvi bhāgena catur aṃśakaiḥ
pāda āyāmam ca sārdha aṃśam prastara uccam udāhṛtam
sārdha tri bhāgam pāda uccam sa pāda aṃśam tu maṃcakam
sārdha tri aṃśam tu śikharam stūpī uccam tu eka bhāgayā

original: evaṃ hi kalpitaṃ gehaṃ śāntikaṃ tviti vidyate |
analyzed: evam hi kalpitam geham śāntikam tu iti vidyate
caturviṃśat vimāna ucca itala uccam tu dvi bhāgayā
veda aṃśam caraṇāyāmam pakṣa aṃśam maṃca mānakam
catur aṃśam tu
sārdha aṃśam prastara utsedham sārdha tri aṃśa aṃghriṇā udayam
adhyardha aṃśam tu ardha aṃśam vedikā udayam
sa pāda aṃśam śikhā mānam pauṣṭikam tat udāhṛtam

original: saptaviṃśati bhāgaṃ tu kṛtvā tu sadanodayam |
analyzed: saptaviṃśati bhāgam tu kṛtvā tu sadana udayam
dvi bhāgam dharā tala utsedham yuga aṃśam caraṇa udayam
dvi bhāgena veda aṃśam caraṇa udayam
pāda ūna dvi aṃśam aṃcāḥ ca talīpa uccam tu tad dvayam
sārdha aṃśam prastara utsedham eka aṃśam vedikā udayam

original: dvibhāgaṃ grīvamānaṃ tu vedabhāgaṃ tu śīrṣakam || 16 ||
analyzed: dvi bhāgam grīva mānam tu veda bhāgam tu śīrṣakam
śeṣam stūpī udayam khyātam jaya dam tat udāhṛtam
catvāriṃśat dvaya ādhikya bhāgam kṛtvā gṛha uccakam
adhiṣṭhānam tri bhāga ardham sapta aṃśam caraṇa udayam
sadṛśam sārdha ṣaṭkakam
guṇa aṃśam prastara utsedham ūrdhva pādam ṣaṣ aṃśakam
sārdha dvi aṃśam tu maṃca uccam eka aṃśam vedikā udayam
dvi bhāgam stūpi tuṃgam tu proktam adbhuta harmyake
tu ṣaṣ aṣṭa aṃśaiḥ vibhājite
adhiṣṭhānam yuga aṃśam tu vasu aṃśam caraṇa udayam
tu veda aṃśam sārdha saptakam
sārdha tri bhāgam aṃca uccam sapta aṃśam caraṇa udayam
prastara uccam guṇa aṃśam tu śiva aṃśam vedikā udayam

original: galamānaṃ dvibhāgaṃ syāt rasāṃśaṃ śikharaṃ bhavet || 23 ||
analyzed: galamānam dvi bhāgam syāt rasa aṃśam śikharam bhavet
dvi bhāgam tu śikhā mānam evam syāt sārvakāmikam
aṣṭa kūṭa aṣṭa śālā ābham kalā paṃjara saṃyutam
ṣaṇṇavati alpa nāsya āḍhyam janmāt agram yuga aśrakam
nānā adhiṣṭhāna saṃyuktam nānā pādaiḥ alam kṛtam
śikhare bhānunā āsya āḍhyam mahā alpam catur aṣṭakam
bhavet

original: svastikaṃ bhavanaṃ khyātaṃ tadeva śikhare dvija ! |
analyzed: svastikam bhavanam khyātam tat eva śikhare dvija
catur mahā nāsikā upetam alpa aṣṭaka vivarjitam
svasti bhadram idam khyātam sarva deva priya āvaham

original: tadeva vṛttaśikharaṃ galaṃ vai vedikā tathā || 28 ||
analyzed: tat eva vṛtta śikharam galam vai vedikā tathā
rudrakāntam idam nāmnā mama prīti karam bhavet
tat eva śīrṣa koṇeṣu alpa nāsī dvayam bhavet
kalpitam śiva kāntam syāt śiva priya karam gṛham

original: tadeva vedikākaṇṭhaṃ śīrṣakaṃ ca ghaṭaṃ tathā || 30 ||
analyzed: tat eva vedikā kaṇṭham śīrṣakam ca ghaṭam tathā
kalpitam yat tat viṣṇu kāntam idam param
vinyāsa sūtrayoḥ antar nava bhāga vibhājite  /
eka aṃśam kūṭa vistāram dvi bhāgam koṣṭha dīrghakam

original: koṣṭhaṃ prati dvikoṣṭhaṃ syāt ardhāṃśaṃ paṃjarastatam || 32 ||
analyzed: koṣṭham prati dvi koṣṭham syāt ardha aṃśam paṃjaraḥ tatam
śeṣam hāra antaram khyātam kalpayet kalpa vittamaḥ
catuṣkūṭa aṣṭa śālā ca bhānu paṃjara saṃyutam
hāra antaram caturviṃśat ādi bhūmā ivam ācaret
sapta aṃśam vibhajet bhāgam eka aṃśam kūṭa vistaram

original: p. 104) koṣṭhāyataṃ dvibhāgaṃ syāt dhāmamadhye prakalpayet |

analyzed: ardha aṃśam paṃjara vyāsam śeṣam hāra antaram bhavet
catuṣkūṭam catur śālā paṃjara aṣṭaka saṃyutam
kalpya hāra antara upetam dvitīyam bhū talam kuru
tad ūrdhva bhūmi vistāram tri aṃśa ekam madhya bhadrakam
aṣṭa kūṭā ca śālā ca viṃśat paṃjara saṃyutam
śata aṣṭa nāsikā upetam vasvaśram śīrṣakam galam
mahānāsi aṣṭaka upetam śikharantu dvijottama

original: nāmnā śuddhavimānaṃ tu mama prītikaraṃ bhavet |
analyzed: nāmnā śuddha vimānam tu mama prīti karam bhavet

original: tadevāṣṭāśra vedī ca vṛttābhaṃ śikharaṃ galam || 39 ||
analyzed: tat eva aṣṭa aṣṭa vedī ca vṛtta ābham śikharam galam
vimala ākṛti nāmnā tu sarva deva hitam bhavet
tat eva śikharam kaṇṭham yugāśram brahmakāntakam

original: tadeva sāyatāśraṃ tu sapādaṃ sārdha tribhāgikam |
analyzed: tat eva sa āyatāśram tu sa pādam sa ardha tri bhāgikam

original: vasubhāgaṃ tu vistāraṃ āyāmaṃ daśadhā bhavet || 41 ||
analyzed: vasu bhāgam tu vistāram āyāmam daśadhā bhavet
eka aṃśam kūṭa vistāram śālā antam dviguṇa āyatam
śeṣam hāra antaram khyātam prāk iva eva prakalpayet
ṣaṣ aṣṭa bhāga vistāram āyāmam ca ūrdhva bhūmike
ekaika aṃśena kūṭam syāt koṣṭha dīrgham dvaya aṃśakam

original: p. 105) ardhāṃśaṃ paṃjaravyāsaṃ śeṣaṃ hārāntaraṃ bhavet |
analyzed: ardha aṃśam pañjara vyāsam śeṣam hāra antaram bhavet
ūrdhva bhū vistṛtam ca agni bhāga ekam madhya bhadrakam

original: dvyaśra vṛttaṃ ca vedī ca kaṇṭhaṃ ca śīrṣakaṃ tathā |
analyzed: dvi aśra vṛttam ca vedī ca kaṇṭham ca śīrṣakam tathā
catuṣkūṭa aṣṭa śālā ca bhānu paṃjara saṃyutam
hāra antaram caturviṃśat kalpayet ādi bhū tale
catuṣkūṭam catur śālā paṃjara aṣṭaka saṃyutam
ṣoḍaśa antara saṃyuktam śata saṃkhyā alpa nāsikā
lalāṭa nāsikāḥ vaktram pārśvayoḥ bhadra nāsikāḥ

original: tathaivaṃ nāsikā praṣṭho śīrṣakaṃ caiva mācaret |
analyzed: tathā evam nāsikā śīrṣakam ca eva mā ācaret
nānā adhiṣṭhāna saṃyuktam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam hāra antaram idam bhavet
māna sūtra antam nava navadhā tu vibhājite  /
guṇa aṃśam garbha geham tu śiva aṃśam kuḍya vistṛtam
paritas lindam eka aṃśam hārāvyāsam śiva aṃśakam

original: evaṃ hi kalpitaṃ teṣu karṇakūṭaṃ śivāṃśakam |
analyzed: evam hi kalpitam teṣu karṇakūṭam śiva aṃśakam

original: madhye koṣṭhaṃ guṇāṃśaṃ syāt ekāṃśaṃ paṃjarastathā || 51 ||
analyzed: madhye koṣṭham guṇa aṃśam syāt eka aṃśam paṃjaraḥ tathā
hāra antaram tathā ardha aṃśam kalpya ivam prathame bhuvi

original: athavā paṃjarāṇāṃ tu ṣaḍaṃśaṃ vā vidhīyate || 52 ||
analyzed: athavā paṃjarāṇām tu ṣaṣ aṃśam vā vidhīyate
śeṣam hāra antara ākhyātam paritas
ūrdhva bhūmau ṣaṣ aṃśa iṃśam kūṭa koṣṭhāya tat bhavet
ardha aṃśam paṃjara vyāsam śeṣam hāra antaram bhavet
ūrdhva bhū vistṛta antam tu madhye daṇḍena nirgatiḥ
catur aśram adhiṣṭhānam vasu aśram śīrṣakam galam
ādau tale catuṣkarṇe kūṭam
aṣṭāśri śīrṣakam madhyāt ūrdhva bhūmau prakalpayet
aṣṭa kūṭa aṣṭa koṣṭha ādi kalā paṃjara saṃyutam
śata alpa nāsikā upetam śikhara iṣṭam mahattaram
tat eva karṇakūṭānām śīrṣakam vartula ākṛti
prāsāda śikharam kaṇṭham vṛtta ākāram prakalpayet
śikhare tu catur dikṣu bhadranāsī samanvitam
vidikṣu hi alpa nāsā āḍhyam vṛtta kūṭam idam param
tat eva śikharam koṇe kṣudra nāsī aṣṭaka anvitam
karṇakūṭānām śīrṣakam vartula ākṛtiḥ
śeṣam prāk iva kartavyam śrīkaṇṭham tat udāhṛtam
tat eva aṣṭa aṃśam ādhikyam āyāmam caturaśrakam
śālā madhye mahā nāsī bhadram vinā prakalpayet  /
śālā ābha mastakam kaṇṭham vṛtta āyatam atha api vā
stūpi traya samāyuktam etad nāmnā su maṃgalam
mānasūtra antaram dharma bhāgam kṛtvā dvijottama
garbha geham tu veda aṃśam gṛha piṇḍī aṃśam āvṛtam
paritas lindam eka aṃśam hārā bhāgena kalpayet
teṣu eka kūṭa vistāram madhye koṣṭha āyatam dvayam
tayoḥ madhya eka bhāgena paṃjara vyāsam ucyate
hāra antaram atha aṃśena paṃjarasya tu pārśvayoḥ
aṣṭa aṃśam ca ūrdhva bhūmiḥ tu kṛtvā aṃśam kūṭa vistṛtam
śālā tad dviguṇa āyāmam tayoḥ madhye tu paṃjaram
eka aṃśena eva kartavyam śeṣam hāra antaram bhavet
catur bhāgam dvi bhāgam madhya bhadrakam

original: daṇḍaṃ vādhyardhadaṇḍaṃ vā dvidaṇḍaṃ vātha nirgamam |
analyzed: daṇḍam vā adhyardha daṇḍam vā dvi daṇḍam vā atha nirgamam

original: vedāśraṃ ca madhiṣṭhānaṃ tadvatkarṇaṃ ca śīrṣakam || 69 ||
analyzed: ca tadvat karṇam ca śīrṣakam
aṣṭa śālā aṣṭa kūṭam ca paṃjaram ṣoḍaśa anvitam
śata alpa nāsikā upetam vṛṣa sthala samanvitam
nānā adhiṣṭhāna saṃyuktam nānā pādaiḥ alaṃkṛtam
unnatau kūṭa koṣṭhau dvau ca antara prastara anvitau

original: gāndhāramiti vikhyātaṃ aṣṭāśraṃ ca galaṃ śiraḥ |
analyzed: gāndhāram iti vikhyātam aṣṭāśram ca galam śiraḥ
śrīviśālam iti khyātam vartulam vedikā galam
śīrṣakam ca eva kartavyam śeṣam pūrvavat ācaret
śrībhogam iti vikhyātam sarva deva arhakam param
vṛttāyate dvayāśra vṛtāṣṭāśre ca ṣaḍaśrake
kūṭa koṣṭha ādi sarva aṃgam prāk iva eva prakalpayet

original: vṛṣasthalaṃ maṇṭapaṃ ca tyajetkarṇaṃ ca śīrṣakam |
analyzed: vṛṣasthalam maṇṭapam ca tyajet karṇam ca śīrṣakam
varṣa sthala vihīnānām karṇam śīrṣaka saṃyutam
kūṭa koṣṭha ādi sarva aṃga ādi ucitam nāgara ādikam
nānā alaṃkāra saṃyuktam nānā citraiḥ vicitritam
garbhageha viśālam ca gṛha piṇḍya agra maṇṭapam
eka bhūmi vidhāna uktam dvi talam tu viśeṣataḥ
tri talam hi evam ākhyātam catur bhūmim atha ucyate
iti aṃśumān kāśyape tri tala vidhāna paṭalaḥ aṣṭāviṃśaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa catur bhūmeḥ tu lakṣaṇam
vistara utsedha mānam tu proktam prāsāda mānake
vinyāsa sūtrayoḥ antara vasudhā vibhajet samam

original: karṇakūṭaṃ tatāṃśaṃ tu koṣṭhaṃ tad dviguṇāyatam || 3 ||
analyzed: karṇakūṭam tata aṃśam tu koṣṭham tat dviguṇa āyatam
paṃjara vyāsam aṃśena śeṣam hāra antaram bhavet
punar api ūrdhva bhūmim ca vasu bhāga vibhājite

original: karṇakūṭaṃ ca koṣṭhaṃ ca paṃjaraṃ pūrvavadbhavet |
analyzed: karṇakūṭam ca koṣṭham ca paṃjaram pūrvavat bhavet
tad ūrdhve aṣṭa bhāge tu śiva aṃśam kūṭa vistṛtam
ardha aṃśam paṃjarasya tu

original: śeṣaṃ hārāntaraṃ proktaṃ hīnādhikyaṃ tu nāśrayet || 6 ||
analyzed: śeṣam hāra antaram proktam hīna ādhikyam tu na āśrayet

original: daṇḍaṃ vādhyardha daṇḍaṃ vā dvidaṇḍaṃ vātha nirgatam || 7 ||
analyzed: daṇḍam vā adhyardha daṇḍam vā dvi daṇḍam vā atha nirgatam
prāsāda uccam tu vibhajet saṃgraham triṃśat aṃśakam
sārdha aṣṭa aṃśam adhiṣṭhānam bhūta aṃśam caraṇa udayam
adhiṣṭhāna samam maṃcam pāda ūna paṃcakam
sa pakṣa aṃśam ca maṃca uccam kalpayet dvijasattama
pāda uccam pakṣa aṃśam prastara udayam
sa pāda veda bhāgam tu caraṇa udayam iṣyate  /

original: karṇoccaṃ tu dvibhāgaṃ syāt sārdhavedāṃśa śīrṣakam || 11 ||
analyzed: karṇa uccam tu dvi bhāgam syāt sārdha veda aṃśa śīrṣakam

original: p. 110) stūpyuccaṃ tu dvibhāgaṃ syāt śāntikaṃ bhavanaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: stūpī uccam tu dvi bhāgam syāt śāntikam bhavanam bhavet
catvāriṃśat bhāgam kṛtvā gṛha unnatam
prastaram ca agni bhāgena bhūta aṃśam talipāyatam
syāt bhūta aṃśam caraṇa udayam
sa pāda dvi bhāgam aṃca uccam sārdha veda aṃghriṇā udayam
dvi bhāgam tu śiva aṃśam vedikā udayam
adhyardha aṃśam gala utsedham yuga aṃśam śikhara udayam
dvi bhāgam tu śikhā mānam pauṣṭikam tat udāhṛtam
paṃcāśat vibhajet dhāma tuṃgam stūpī avasānakam
sārdhatriṃśam adhiṣṭhānam sapta aṃśam caraṇa udayam
tad ardham tu ṣaṣ aṃśam caraṇa udayam

original: guṇāṃśaṃ maṃcamānaṃ tu ūrdhvapādaṃ tu taddvayam |
analyzed: guṇa aṃśam tu ūrdhva pādam tu tad dvayam
tri bhāgam prastara utsedham pāda uccam sārdha paṃcakam
prastara uccam tri bhāgam syāt aṃśena vedikā udayam
dvi bhāgam galamānam tu śara aṃśam śikhara udayam
sārdha aṃśam sthūpi mānam tu jaya dam tat udāhṛtam
upāna ādi sthūpi paryantam paṃcāśat vibhajet budhaḥ
tala uccam sārdham agni aṃśam sapta aṃśam caraṇa udayam
sadṛśam sārdha ṣaṣ bhavet
pāda adhika tri bhāga aṃśam maṃca mānam udāhṛtam
sārdha paṃca aṃśam aṃghri uccam maṃcam sārdha dvi bhāgayā
eka aṃśam vedikā mānam dvi bhāgam syāt gala udayam
paṃca aṃśam śikhara uttuṃgam sa pādam śikhara udayam
adbhutam sadanam hi evam kalpayet kalpa vittamaḥ

original: ārāmoccaṃ tu paṃcāśat bhāgaṃ kṛtvā viśeṣataḥ |
analyzed: ārāma uccam tu paṃcāśat bhāgam kṛtvā viśeṣataḥ
sārdha agni aṃśam adhiṣṭhānam dhālvaṃśam caraṇa udayam
prastara uccam tri bhāgena caraṇam sārdha ṣaṣ bhavet
syāt sa ardha ṣaṭkakam
tri bhāgam prastara utsedham pāda uccam sārdha paṃcakam
pādona agni aṃśam aṃca uccam śiva aṃśam vedikā udayam
dvi bhāgam galamānam tu pāda aṃśam śikhara udayam
vyoma aṃśam tu śikhā mānam vimānam sārvadeśikam
homa ādi stūpi varga antam veda aśram parikalpayet
bhānu kūṭam tathā koṣṭham bhānu dviguṇa paṃjaram
śikhare tu catur dikṣu bhadranāsī catuṣṭayam
pādam prati alpa nāsya āḍhyam śikhara ulpa aṣṭa nāsikāḥ
kūṭa koṣṭha ādi sarva aṅgam nāgara ādi ucitam kuru
eka ākāra tala staṃbham subhadram iti vidyate
tat eva śikhara iṣṭa alpa nāsikā rahitam bhavet
tat brāhmyam iti vikhyātam sarva deva priya āvaham
tat evam śikharam kaṇṭham vṛttam śrīkāntam ucyate
śīrṣakam kaṇṭham śrīmaṇḍanam udāhṛtam
tat eva śikhare ca aṣṭau mahā nāsī samanvitam
śrīvantam iti khyātam śālābhadra yutam tu vā
vibhadram vā atha kartavyam sarveṣām sadanām api
nānā aṃghri tala saṃyuktam tad tad nāmnā prakīrtitāḥ
vistāra adhyardham āyāmam sabhā ākāram tu śīrṣakam
saṃpad ālayam iti uktam sarva deva arhakam param
mānasūtra antaram nanda bhāgam kṛtvā viśeṣataḥ
garbha geham guṇa aṃśam syāt bhāgena gṛha piṇḍikā
alindam aṃśena kartavyam hāra bhāgena kalpayet
tatas vinyāsa sūtra antam sadanam nava bhājite
eka aṃśam kūṭa vistāram guṇa aṃśam koṣṭha dīrghakam
eka aṃśam paṃjara vyāsam sārdha aṃśam

veda aṃśa garbha geham tu gṛha piṇḍī tri bhāgayā
alindam ca eka bhāgena hārā tāram śiva aṃśakam
vinyāsa sūtrayoḥ antara muni bhāga vibhājite
teṣu ekam kūṭa vistāram śālā dīrgham tu tat dvayam
eka aṃśam paṃjara vyāsam pādam hāra antaram bhavet
catuṣkūṭān ca śālā ca paṃjaram ṣoḍaśa anvitam
hāra antaram ca dvātriṃśat kalpayet ādi bhū tale
tad ūrdhva bhūmi vistāram trayodaśa vibhājite
eka aṃśa karṇa kūṭam tu śālā tad dviguṇa āyatā
tri pādam paṃjara vyāsam pādam hāra antaram bhavet

original: kūṭādīnāṃ tu saṃkhyā tu ādibhūmisamaṃ bhavet || 7 ||
analyzed: kūṭa ādīnām tu saṃkhyā tu ādi bhūmi samam bhavet

original: p. 139) ūrdhvabhūvistṛtaṃ bhānu bhāgaṃ kṛtvānu sauṣṭikam |
analyzed: ūrdhva bhū vistṛtam bhānu bhāgam kṛtvā anu sauṣṭikam
dviguṇam koṣṭha dīrgham tu ardha aṃśam paṃjaraḥ tatam

original: pādaṃ hārāntaravyāsaṃ teṣāṃ saṃkhyā tu pūrvavat |
analyzed: pādam hāra antara vyāsam teṣām saṃkhyā tu pūrvavat
tasya ūrdhva tala vistāram rudra bhāga vibhājite
pādam paṃjara vistāram śeṣam pūrvavat eva hi
ūrdhva bhūmi viśālam tu vyoma aṃśam kūṭa vistṛtam

original: koṣṭhaṃ taddviguṇaṃ khyātaṃ śeṣaṃ hārāntaraṃ samam |
analyzed: koṣṭham tad dviguṇam khyātam śeṣam hāra antaram samam

original: tasyordhvabhū navāṃśe tu śivāṃśaṃ sauṣṭikaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: nava aṃśe tu śiva aṃśam sauṣṭikam bhavet

original: adhyardhāṃśaṃ tu koṣṭhaṃ syāt śeṣaṃ hārāntaraṃ samam || 12 ||
analyzed: adhyardha aṃśam tu koṣṭham syāt śeṣam hāra antaram samam
tri bhāga ekam paṃjaravyāsam ucyate
prāgvat kūṭa ādinām saṃkhyā rasa bhūḥ evam eva hi
aṣṭa aṃśam vibhajet sapta tala vistāram eva hi
kūṭam eka aṃśa mānena madhye śālā dvi bhāgayā
paṃjara vyāsam eka aṃśam hāra antaram tad ardhakam
catuṣkūṭam catur śālā paṃjara aṣṭaka saṃyutam
hāra antaram kalā saṃkhyā kalpya ivam saptamam talam
sapta aṃśam vibhajet aṣṭa bhūmeḥ ca eva tu vistaram

original: prāgvatkūṭaṃ ca koṣṭhaṃ ca śeṣaṃ hārāntaraṃ bhavet |
analyzed: prāgvat kūṭam ca koṣṭham ca śeṣam hāra antaram bhavet
bhāga ekam madhya paṃjara vistṛtam
nava bhūmi viśālam tu ṣaṣ bhāgam vibhajet samam

original: prāgvatkūṭaṃ ca koṣṭhaṃ ca paṃjaraṃ ca prakalpayet || 18 ||
analyzed: prāgvat kūṭam ca koṣṭham ca paṃjaram ca prakalpayet
tad ūrdhva bhūmi vistāram nava aṃśam tu vibhājite
madhye bhadram tad eka aṃśam daṇḍa mānena nirgatiḥ  /
prāsādasya ca utsedham śata bhāga vibhājite
yuga aṃśam tat adhiṣṭhānam aṣṭa aṃśam caraṇāyatam
pāda ūna veda bhāgam tu maṃca mānam udāhṛtam
dhātu aṃśam caraṇa uccam tu sa pāda agni aṃśa maṃcakam

original: sārdhaṣaṭkāṃghri tuṃgaṃ tu prastaraṃ cāgni bhāgayā || 22 ||
analyzed: tuṃgam tu prastaram ca agni bhāgayā
rasa aṃśam pāda dīrgham tu pāda ūna agni aṃśam aṃcakam
pāda uccam sārdha paṃca aṃśam sārdha paṃca aṃśam aṃcakam
pāda adhikam tu paṃca aṃśam pāda utsedham tat ucyate
paṃca aṃśam pāda dīrghakam
pāda adhikam tu pakṣa aṃśam maṃca mānam udāhṛtam
sa tri pāda yuga aṃśam tu pāda dīrgham udāhṛtam
prastara uccam dvi bhāgam tu sārdha veda aṃśam aṃghrikam

original: pādona dvyaṃśamaṃcaṃ syāt śaśyaṃśaṃ tu vitardikam || 26 ||
analyzed: syāt śaśi aṃśam tu vitardikam  /
kaṇṭham adhyardha bhāgena śīrṣakam sārdha vedakam
pāda hīna dvi bhāgam tu sthūpī utsedham udāhṛtam
tu śikhare yugma nāsikā
pādam nānā pādam rasātalam
atyanta ākāra saṃyuktam sarva deva priya āvaham
tat eva unnata kūṭam ced indrakāntam iti smṛtam
koṣṭham ca natam vā unnata sauṣṭikam

original: pakṣaśālā tu madhyasthā śālā daṇḍena nīvrakam || 30 ||
analyzed: pakṣaśālā tu madhyasthā śālā daṇḍena nīvrakam  /
aṣṭāśri śikharam kaṇṭham śikhara iṣṭau tu nāsikāḥ
nānā alaṃkāra saṃyuktam catuṣkūṭam idam tathā
tat eva kūṭa koṣṭham ca sa antara prastaram samam
kūṭa koṣṭha ādi saṃyuktam sama sūtram atha upari
maṃtrapūtam iti khyātam vimānam sārvadeśikam
tat eva śikharam kaṇṭham vṛtta ābham parikalpayet
śrīkāntam iti vikhyātam sarva deva arhakam gṛham

original: tadeva karṇakūṭānāṃ śīrṣakaṃ ca galaṃ tathā || 34 ||
analyzed: tat eva karṇakūṭānām śīrṣakam ca galam tathā
vṛtta ākāram prakartavyam yat tat īśvarakāntakam
daśa bhūmi evam ākhyātam tatas tu ekādaśam talam
iti aṃśumān kāśyape daśa bhūmi vidhāna paṭalaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa rudra bhūmi vimānakam
prāsāda māna vidhinā saṃgṛhet tu tata udayam
tithi aṃśam vibhajet tat tu guṇa aṃśam garbha gehakam
pakṣa aṃśam gṛhapiṇḍī syāt alindam ca eka bhāgayā

original: ekāṃśaṃ kuḍya vistāraṃ alindaṃ tu śivāṃśakam |
analyzed: eka aṃśam kuḍya vistāram alindam tu śiva aṃśakam
hāra antaram atha aṃśena kalpayet tu yathākramam
alinda aṃśam alindam vā ghanabhittiḥ atha api vā
prastara antam ghanam vā api tad ūrdhva ilindam eva vā
vinyāsa sūtrayoḥ antar vyāsam pakṣa aṃśa bhājite
śivāṃśam karṇakūṭam syāt śāla dvi bhāgayā
madhya śālā agni bhāgam syāt ardha aṃśam paṃjaram bhavet

original: hārāntaraṃ ca tattulyaṃ kalpyevaṃ syādi bhūtale || 6 ||
analyzed: hāra antaram ca tad tulyam kalpya ivam bhū tale

original: tadūrdhve'pi viśālaṃ tu manvaṃśaṃ tu vibhājite |
analyzed: tad ūrdhve api viśālam tu manvaṃśam tu vibhājite
śiva aṃśam kūṭa vistāram koṣṭha dīrgham tu tat dvayam
dvi antaram paṃjara vyāsam hāra antaram tathā eva ca
bhānu koṣṭham catuṣkūṭam kalā paṃjara saṃyutam
hāra antaram ca veda aṣṭau dvitīyam ca ādi bhū talam
tasya ūrdhve bhū viśālam tu trayodaśa vibhājite
vyoma aṃśam kūṭa vistāram koṣṭha dīrgham dvi bhāgayā
ardha aṃśam paṃjara vyāsam śeṣam hāra antaram bhavet

original: p. 143) kūṭādīnāṃ tu saṃkhyā syuḥ ādibhūmau yathā tathā |
analyzed: kūṭa ādīnām tu saṃkhyā syuḥ ādi bhūmau yathā tathā
tad ūrdhve vistāram dvādaśa aṃśa vibhājite
eka aṃśam kūṭa vistāram koṣṭham tu dviguṇa āyatam
śeṣam hāra antaram khyātam tri bhāga eka aṃśa paṃjaram

original: paṃjaraṃ kūṭakoṣṭhaṃ ca saṃkhyā vai prāgivaiva tu |
analyzed: paṃjaram kūṭa koṣṭham ca saṃkhyā vai prāk iva eva tu
tad ūrdhve bhūmi vistāram rudra aṃśam tu pūrvavat
tad ūrdhva bhū nava aṃśe tu kūṭa vyāsam prakalpayet
tasya ūrdhva bhūmi vistāram daśa bhāgam vibhājite

original: kūṭaṃ caiva tu koṣṭhaṃ ca saṃkhyāmānaṃ tu pūrvavat |
analyzed: kūṭam ca eva tu koṣṭham ca saṃkhyā mānam tu pūrvavat
tad ūrdhva bhū nava aṃśe tu kūṭa vyāsam śiva aṃśakam  /

original: adhyardhāṃśaṃ tu koṣṭhāyāṃ śeṣaṃ hārāntaraṃ bhavet |
analyzed: adhyardha aṃśam tu koṣṭhāyām śeṣam hāra antaram bhavet
hāra antara tri bhāga ekam paṃjara vyāsam iṣyate  /
prāgvat kūṭa ādi saṃkhyāḥ syuḥ kalpayet kalpa vittamaḥ
aṣṭa aṃśam vibhajet aṣṭa bhūmeḥ ca eva pravistṛtam
kūṭa vistāram eka aṃśam madhyeśālā dvi bhāgayā
paṃjara vyāsam eka aṃśam hāra antaram tad ardhakam
catuṣkūṭam catur śālā paṃjara aṣṭaka saṃyutam
hāra antaram kalā saṃkhyā procyate iṣṭa samanvitam
nava bhūmi viśālam tu saptadhā vibhajet samam
kūṭa vyāsam atha aṃśena koṣṭha dīrgham dvi bhāgayā
śeṣam hāra antaram khyātam tat tri bhāga eka paṃjaram
daśa bhūmi viśālam tu rasa bhāga vibhājite

original: prāgvatkūṭaṃ ca koṣṭhaṃ ca pūrvavacca prakalpayet |
analyzed: prāgvat kūṭam ca koṣṭham ca pūrvavat ca prakalpayet
prathama ādi paṃca bhūmi antam bhadra paṃjara saṃyutam
paṃca bhūmi upariṣṭāt tu bhadram vā bhadra paṃjaram
ūrdhva bhūmi viśālam tu guṇa bhāga vibhājite
madhye bhadram tad eka aṃśam daṇḍa mānena nirgatiḥ

original: prāsādasya tu cotsedhaṃ śatāṃśaṃ sa trayodaśa || 24 ||
analyzed: prāsādasya tu ca utsedham śata aṃśam sa trayodaśa
kṛtvā sārdha yuga aṃśam tu dharā talam udāhṛtam
pāda uccam sārdha vasu aṃśam paṃca mānam yuga aṃśakam
vasu aṃśam caraṇāyāmam paṃcam pādonakam yugam
sapta aṃśam pāda dīrgham tu pāda adhika agni maṃcakam
ardha adhika ṣaṣ aṃśam tu pāda uccāḥ tu maṃcakam
ṣaṣ aṃśam pāda tuṃgam tu pāda ūna agni aṃśam aṃcakam
ardha adhikam tu bhūtāṃśam pāda dīrgham udāhṛtam
ardha adhika dvi bhāgam tu prastarasya udayam bhavet
sa pādam paṃca bhāgam tu pāda dīrgham praśasyate
sārdha pakṣa aṃśam aṃca uccam bhūta aṃśam caraṇa udayam
sa pādam pakṣa bhāgam tu maṃcamānam udīritam
pāda ūna pañca bhāgam tu caraṇa udayam īritam
maṃcamāna dvi bhāgam tu sārdha veda aṃśam aṃghrikam
sa tri pāda śiva aṃśam tu prastarasya samucchrayaḥ
śaśi aṃśam vedikā mānam kaṇṭha uccam sa ardha bhāgayā
ardha adhikam tu veda aṃśam śikhara udayam iṣyate
pādonam tu dvi bhāgam syāt sthūpī udayam iṣyate
homa ādi sthūpa paryantam yugāśram parikalpayet
śikhare tu catur dikṣu mahānāsī samanvitam
pādam dhātāram kāntam ucyate
sauṣṭikam ca antam aṃcam tu vijayam tat udāhṛtam
tat eva unnata kūṭam ca koṣṭha unnatāḥ samaṃcakāḥ
sarva ātmakam idam khyātam sarva deva ātmakam param
tat eva śikharam kaṇṭham vasu aśram vasu nāsikāḥ
viśālabhadram ākhyātam sarva deva arhakam param
tat eva madhya bhadra āḍhyam kūṭa koṣṭhau sama unnatau

original: samaṃcaṃ vā vimaṃcaṃ vā kūṭaśālā ca paṃjaram || 88 ||
analyzed: samaṃcam vā vimaṃcam vā kūṭa śālā ca paṃjaram
gaṇikā viśālakam proktam brahma viṣṇu śiva arhakam
tat eva śikharam kaṇṭham vṛttam aṣṭa aśra vedikā
indrakāntam iti khyātam vimānam sārvadeśikam
tat eva karṇakūṭaḥ tu bhadra yuj karṇabhadrakam

original: p. 146) tadeva sauṣṭikānāṃ tu śīrṣakaṃ maṇḍalākṛtiḥ |
analyzed: tat eva sauṣṭikānām tu śīrṣakam maṇḍala ākṛtiḥ
nāmnā karṇaviśālam tu sarva deva priya āvaham
evam ekādaśam bhūmi lakṣaṇam parikīrtitam
iti aṃśumān kāśyape rudrabhūmividhipaṭalaḥ saptatriṃśaḥ

original: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa bhānu bhūmi vidhiṃ param |
analyzed: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa bhānu bhūmi vidhim param
tasya vistāra tuṃgam tu proktam prāsāda mānakam
sa sapta dharma bhāgam tu kṛtvā prāsāda vistṛtam
bhūta aṃśam garbha geham tu pakṣa aṃśam gṛha piṇḍikā
alindam eka bhāgena kuḍyam eka aṃśa mānataḥ

original: alindaṃ tu śivāṃśaṃ syāddhārā bhāgena kalpayet || 3 ||
analyzed: alindam tu śivāṃśam syāt dhārā bhāgena kalpayet
athavā garbha geham tu guṇa aṃśena eva kārayet
garbha gehasya tulyam vā gṛha piṇḍeḥ tu vistṛtam
śeṣam prāk iva kartavyam alindam kuḍya hārayā
vinyāsa sūtrayoḥ anta saptādaśa vibhājite  /
guṇa aṃśam madhya śālā āsyā karṇakūṭam śiva aṃśakam
tayoḥ madhye tu pakṣa aṃśam śālādīrgham udāhṛtam
kūṭa koṣṭha antare ca eva koṣṭhayoḥ antare pi vā
śiva aṃśam pañjara vyāsam karṇa kūṭam iva ākṛtiḥ
hāra antaram tad ardha aṃśam kṣudra paṃjara saṃyutam
evamādi talam kuryāt ūrdhvam rudra tala ukta vat
saptaviṃśat śatam bhāgam kṛtvā harmyaḥ dvijottama
ūrdhvam bhānu tala ukta vat
evam bhānu talam proktam trayodaśa talam śṛṇu
iti aṃśumān kāśyape bhānu bhūmi vidhi paṭalaḥ aṣṭatriṃśaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa trayodaśa talam śṛṇu
tasya tuṃgam ca prāsāda mānavat gṛham
ekonaviṃśat aṃśam tu kartavyam sadana statam
guṇa aṃśam garbha geham tu pakṣa aṃśam gṛha piṇḍikā
alindam tat śiva aṃśam syāt dhārā bhāgena kalpayet
tad bāhyelindam eka aṃśam hārā bhāgena deśika

original: vyoma bhāgamalindaṃ syāt hāravyāsaṃ ca tatsamam |
analyzed: vyoma bhāgam alindam syāt hāravyāsam ca tad samam
vinyāsa sūtrayoḥ antar ekonaviṃśat aṃśakaiḥ
śiva aṃśam karṇakūṭam syāt madhye śālāgni bhāgayā

original: p. 148) pakṣaśālā ca tattulyaṃ ekāṃśaṃ paṃjarasya tu || 5 ||
analyzed: pakṣaśālā ca tad tulyam eka aṃśam paṃjarasya tu
hāra antaram tad ardha aṃśam kṣudra paṃjara saṃyutam
paṃjaram karṇakūṭa ābham tasya ābham kṣudra paṃjaram
evam ādi talam proktam ūrdhva bhānu tala ukta vat
sadana udayam
paṃca aṃśam tat adhiṣṭhānam daśa aṃśam caraṇa udayam
bhūta aṃśam syāt śeṣam dvādaśa bhūmi vat
trayodaśa talam hi evam kalā bhūmim atha upari
iti aṃśumān kāśyape trayodaśa bhūmi vidhi paṭalaḥ ekonacatvāriṃśaḥ  /
atha ṣoḍaśa bhūmeḥ tu lakṣaṇam vakṣyate idhunā
evam krameṇa saṃkalpya paṃcālī inda samanvitam
paṃcahāra samāyuktam gṛha piṇḍiḥ tu bāhyakam
garbhageham rasa aṃśam ca veda aṃśam gṛha piṇḍikā
śeṣam pūrvavat uddiṣṭam alinda ādi dvijottama
eka dvi tri catuṣpaṃca bhūmau vā atha dharā tale
devatā sthāpanam kuryāt ṣoḍaśa sthala harmyake
deva sthāpana bhūmi antam yāvat tāvat ghanam kuru

original: p. 149) bāhye tu citrālaṃkāraṃ ghanabhūmyantaraṃ kuru |
analyzed: bāhye tu citra alaṃkāram ghana bhūmi antaram kuru

original: alindaṃ lajapādaṃ vā chāditaṃ vā tulādibhiḥ || 5 ||
analyzed: alindam laja pādam vā chāditam vā tulā ādibhiḥ

original: prastarāntaṃ ghanaṃ vātha hārāntaṃ vātha tadghanam |
analyzed: prastara antam ghanam vā atha hāra antam vā atha tad ghanam
vyāse sa vedi triṃśa aṃśe karṇakūṭam śiva aṃśakam  /
harmya madhye tu veda aṃśam śālā āyāmam udāhṛtam
tayoḥ madhye dvi bhāgena śālādīrgham udāhṛtam

original: tayormadhye ca śālāṃ tu pakṣāṃśenaiva kalpayet |
analyzed: tayoḥ madhye ca śālām tu pakṣa aṃśena eva kalpayet
tayoḥ madhye vidha aṃśena paṃjaram karṇa kūṭa vat
hāra antaram tayoḥ madhye ardha aṃśena eva kalpayet
evam hi kalpayet ādi bhūmi śālā aṣṭaviṃśatiḥ

original: karṇakūṭaṃ tu vedāḥ syuḥ dvātriṃśatpaṃjaraṃ bhavet |
analyzed: karṇakūṭam tu vedāḥ syuḥ dvātriṃśat paṃjaram bhavet
sa veda ṣaṣṭi saṃkhyāḥ syuḥ hāra antaram dvijottama
evamādi talam khyātam dvitīyam dvātriṃśat aṃśake

original: dvibhāgaṃ madhyaśālā syāt śeṣaṃ pūrvavadeva hi || 11 ||
analyzed: dvi bhāgam madhyaśālā syāt śeṣam pūrvavat eva hi
dvitīyā hi evam ākhyātam tṛtīyam adhunā ucyate
triṃśat aṃśa vibhāgam tu kṛtvā tṛtīya bhū talam
paṃjaram ca ardha bhāgayā

original: hārāntaraṃ tadardhaṃ syāt śeṣaṃ dvitīya bhūmivat || 13 ||
analyzed: hāra antaram tad ardham syāt śeṣam bhūmi vat
viśālam tu sa aṣṭaviṃśati bhājite
karṇa kūṭa samam piṇḍī śālāyāḥ tu dvi pārśvayoḥ
paṃjara vyāsam ardha aṃśam śeṣam prāk iva kalpitam
paṃcame tala vistāre ṣaḍviṃśati aṃśa bhājite  /
madhyaśālā tu veda aṃśam vyoma aṃśam karṇakūṭakam
tayoḥ madhyastha śālā ca tayoḥ madhye ca koṣṭhakam
pratyekam dvi dvi bhāgena kalpayet kalpa vittamaḥ
tayoḥ madhya īrdha bhāgena paṃjaram karṇakūṭa vat
hāra antaram tad ardhena teṣām saṃkhyā ādi bhūmi vat
ṣaṣṭham ca bhūmi vistāram caturviṃśati bhājite
madhye koṣṭha dvi bhāgena śeṣam pūrvavat eva hi
saptamam bhūmi vistāram dvāviṃśati aṃśakam bhajet  /

original: śivāṃśaṃ karṇakūṭaṃ syāt madhye śālā dvibhāgayā |
analyzed: śiva aṃśam karṇakūṭam syāt madhye śālā dvi bhāgayā
tayoḥ madhye śiva aṃśena kṣudram koṣṭham prakalpayet
tayoḥ madhye dvi bhāgena śālām kuryāt viśeṣataḥ
adhyardham paṃjara vyāsam tad ardham

original: paṃjaraṃ kūṭakoṣṭhaṃ ca saṃkhyā vai prāgivaiva tu |
analyzed: paṃjaram kūṭa koṣṭham ca saṃkhyā vai prāk iva eva tu
aṣṭamam vistāram viṃśati aṃśa vibhājite
tayoḥ madhye dvi bhāgena koṣṭha āyāmam udāhṛtam
tayoḥ madhye śiva aṃśena kṣudra koṣṭham prakalpayet

original: śeṣaṃ prāgiva kartavyaṃ teṣāṃ saṃkhyā tu pūrvavat || 24 ||
analyzed: śeṣam prāk iva kartavyam teṣām saṃkhyā tu pūrvavat

original: p. 151) navabhūmi viśālṃ tu triṣṣaḍaṃśa vibhājite |
analyzed: tu triḥṣaṣ aṃśa vibhājite

original: śivāṃśaṃ karṇakūṭaṃ syāt madhye śālā dvibhāgayā || 25 ||
analyzed: śiva aṃśam karṇakūṭam syāt madhye śālā dvi bhāgayā
tayoḥ madhya īrdha bhāgena paṃjaram parikalpayet
tasya ardhena eva hāra antaram bhavet
tad pārśvayoḥ dvi bhāgam syāt koṣṭham kuryāt viśeṣataḥ
kūṭa koṣṭha antare ca eva koṣṭhayoḥ antare api vā
paṃjaram kalpayet dhīmān ardha aṃśena eva suvrata
hāra antaram tad ardha aṃśam kalpayet kalpa vittamaḥ
viṃśat koṣṭham ca tat kūṭam paṃjaram bhānubhiḥ dvayam
kalpya ivam navame bhūmau daśa bhūmeḥ tu vistaram
daśa bhūmeḥ tu vistāram ṣoḍaśa aṃśa vibhājite
karṇakūṭam śiva aṃśam syāt tad samam paṃjaraḥ tatam
śālā āyāmam dvi bhāgena tu ardha aṃśam
bhānu śālā catuṣkūṭam kalā paṃjara saṃyutam
hāra antaram tu dvātriṃśat kalpayet daśame tale
ekādaśa tala vyāsam manu bhāga vibhājite  /

original: śivāṃśaṃ karṇakūṭaṃ tu madhye śālā dvibhāgayā |
analyzed: śiva aṃśam karṇakūṭam tu madhye śālā dvi bhāgayā
tayoḥ madhye sthala aṃśānām guṇa aṃśam parikalpayet
ardha aṃśam paṃjara vyāsam tasya ardham

original: catuṣkūṭā tu śālā ca paṃjaraṃ ṣoḍaśānvitam || 34 ||
analyzed: catuṣkūṭā tu śālā ca paṃjaram ṣoḍaśa anvitam

original: p. 152) hārāntaraṃ tu dvātriṃśat kalpyaṃ rudratale'pi ca |
analyzed: hāra antaram tu dvātriṃśat kalpyam rudra tale pi ca
bhānu bhūmi viśālam tu bhānu bhāga vibhājite
paṃjaram kūṭa koṣṭham ca saṃkhyā rudra tala ukta vat
sarveṣām api koṣṭhānām paṃca aṃśam pravidhīyate
trayodaśa tala vyāsam daśa bhāga vibhājite
karṇakūṭam śiva aṃśena madhye śālā dvi bhāgayā
tayoḥ madhya eka bhāgena śālākāram prakalpayet
tayoḥ madhye vibhāgena paṃjaram karṇa kūṭa vat
hāra antarasya tasya ardham saṃkhyā dvādaśa bhūmi vat
caturdaśa tala vyāsam vasu bhāga vibhājite  /
karṇakūṭam śiva aṃśena madhye śālā dvi bhāgayā
ardha aṃśam paṃjara vyāsam tasya ardham
catuṣkūṭam catur śālā paṃjaram ṣoḍaśa anvitam
hāra antaram caturviṃśat kalpyam evam anukramāt
tri paṃca bhūmi vistāram ṣaṣ bhāgam vibhajet samam
karṇakūṭam tu vyoma aṃśam madhyeśālā dvi bhāgayā
hāra antaram tu śaśi aṃśam yuga paṃjara saṃyutam
aśeṣa ūrdhva talam vyāsam veda bhāga vibhājite  /
dvi bhāgam vistṛtam daṇḍa māna nīvram tu madhyame
kṛtvā prāsāda tuṃgam tu dvi bhāgena śata dvayam

original: p. 153) dharātalaṃ tu saptāṃśaṃ caraṇoccaṃ trayodaśa |
analyzed: dharā talam tu sapta aṃśam caraṇa uccam trayodaśa
sārdha ṣaṭkam tu maṃca uccam pāda uccam bhānu saṃkhyayā
prastara uccam tu ṣaṣ bhāgam rudra aṃśam caraṇa udayam
sārdha bhūta aṃśam aṃcam syāt daśa aṃśam caraṇa udayam
sārdha veda aṃśa maṃca uccam kalpayet kalpa vittamaḥ
pāda uccam sārdha vasu aṃśam maṃca mānam yuga aṃśakam

original: vasvaṃśaṃ caraṇoccaṃ tu maṃcaṃ pādonakaṃ yugam |
analyzed: vasu aṃśam caraṇa uccam tu maṃcam pāda ūnakam yugam
caraṇam sārdha sapta aṃśam prastaram sārdha tri bhāgikam
sapta aṃśam pāda dīrgham vā pāda adhika agni maṃcakam
ardha adhika ṣaṣ aṃśam tu pāda uccam agni maṃcakam
ṣaṣ aṃśam pāda mānam tu tri aṃśa maṃcakam
ardha adhikam tu bhūtāṃśam pāda dīrgham udāhṛtam
ardha adhika dvi bhāgam tu prastarasya udayam bhavet
sa pādam paṃca bhāgam tu pāda dīrgham udāhṛtam
bhūta aṃśam caraṇa udayam
sa pādam pakṣa bhāgam tu maṃca dīrgham udīritam
pāda ūna pakṣa bhāgam tu caraṇa udayam īritam
maṃcamānam dvi bhāgam syāt sārdha veda aṃśam aṃghrikam
sa tri pāda śiva aṃśam tu prastarasya samucchrayam
śaśi aṃśam vedikā mānam kaṇṭha uccam tu dvi bhāgayā
ardha adhika yuga aṃśam tu śikhara udayam īritam
sa pāda aṃśam śikhā mānam kalpayet tu krameṇa tu
homa ādi sthūpi paryantam yuga āśram parikalpayet
śikhare tu catur dikṣu mahānāsī samanvitam
pādam brahmakāntam udāhṛtam

original: tadeva sāntaraṃ maṃcaṃ sauṣṭikaṃ nata koṣṭhakam || 57 ||
analyzed: tat eva sa antaram sauṣṭikam
sārasvatam idam khyātam śiva priya karam gṛham

original: tadeva natakūṭaṃ ca koṣṭhonnata sa maṃcakāḥ || 58 ||
analyzed: tat eva nata kūṭam ca koṣṭha unnata
prādeśam iti vikhyātam sarveṣām ṛddhi kāraṇam
tat eva śikharam kaṇṭham vasvaśram parikalpayet  /
śikhara iṣṭa mahā nāsī yuktam tat śrīkaram bhavet
tat eva madhya bhadra āḍhyam kūṭa koṣṭha samanvitam

original: samaṃco vā vimaṃco vā kūṭaśālā dvijottama ! |
analyzed: samaṃcaḥ vā vimaṃcaḥ vā kūṭaśālāḥ dvijottama
pārvatīkam idam khyātam upapratikaram bhavet
tat eva śikharam kaṇṭham vṛttam vā aṣṭa aśra vedikā
vedikā ūrdhve vṛtta ākāra samanvitam
suśāṃbhavam idam khyātam śaṃkarasya priyam hitam

original: paṃjaraṃ kūṭakoṣṭhaṃ ca śikharaṃ ca ghaṭaṃ tathā || 53 ||
analyzed: paṃjaram kūṭa koṣṭham ca śikharam ca ghaṭam tathā
evamādīni sarvāṇi nāgara ādi ucitam kuru
anena eva athavā kuryāt eka ādya aneka bhūmikam

original: p. 155) * * tha talaṃ hyeṣa kartavyaṃ tasyādimaṃcakam |
analyzed: talam hi eṣa kartavyam tasya ādi maṃcakam
tat tat yucita vistāram tuṃga kuḍyam ca garbhakam
kartavyam vidhinā anena gam ca laṃkāra saṃyutam
sālinda sadanānām tu sopāna ārohaṇam yathā
tatra tatra ucitam kuryāt śilābhiḥ vā iṣṭakā drumaiḥ

original: tasyāgraṃ maṇḍalaṃ kuryāt ekānekatalaṃ tu vā || 57 ||
analyzed: tasya agram maṇḍalam kuryāt eka aneka talam tu vā
prāc ukta vidhinā kuryāt sarva alaṃkāra saṃyutam
nānā varṇaiḥ vicitram tu kartavyam vidhi coditam

original: evaṃ yaḥ kurute harmyaṃ aśakyāpekṣitaṃ tu vā || 59 ||
analyzed: evam yaḥ kurute harmyam aśakya apekṣitam tu vā
iha eva dhanavān śrīmān putra pautra kalatravān
dāsī dāsa ādibhiḥ ca anyaiḥ sva chā vaśa mudā svabhiḥ
kula ekaviṃśatī ca dhāvayet tu
iti aṃśumān kāśyape ṣoḍaśa bhūmi vidhi paṭalaḥ catvāriṃśaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa mūdhnā iṣṭakā vidhim param
śikharasya udaya ūrdhve vā mahānāsya avasānake  /
śakti dhvaja avasāne vā mūdhnā iṣṭakām tu vinyaset

original: p. 156) taddhidyāvasamāpte tu tadā mūdhneṣṭakāṃ nyaset || 2 ||
analyzed: tad hi dyāvā samāpte tu tadā mūdhnā iṣṭakām nyaset
māsa pakṣa ṛkṣa vāra ādau su lagne ca samācaret
śilābhiḥ tu śilā harmye tu iṣṭakā iṣṭakayā tadā
dārubhiḥ dāru harmye tu kartavyā śubham icchatā
miśra dravya kṛte harmye yad dravyeṇa kṛtam śiraḥ
tad dravyeṇa prakartavyā mūrdhnā iṣṭakāḥ dvijottama
eka ādi aneka bhūmīnām harmyāṇām tu viśeṣataḥ
iṣṭakā vyāsam āyāmam ghanam ca adya iṣṭakām iva
prakuryāt iṣṭakām vipra tatas sthāpanam ārabhet
prāsādasya agratas tu īśe saumye vā harmya gocare
nava aṣṭa sapta ṣaṣ paṃca hastam vā maṇṭapam
tad vistāra samāyāmam caturaśra samam guruḥ
maṇṭapam vā prapām vā atha ṣoḍaśa stambha saṃyutam
catur dvāra samāyuktam catur toraṇa bhūṣitam
taraṃghram aṃghri veṣṭam ca vitāna dhvaja saṃyutam
muktā sraj darbha mālābhiḥ alaṃkṛtya viśeṣataḥ
maṇṭapasya madhye kṛtvā upavedikām

original: vedāṃgulānte taṃ veśaṃ upade ca yugāśrakam |
analyzed: veda aṃgula ante tam veśam upade ca yuga aśrakam
śeṣam vedi viśālam tu bhānu mātra samanvitam
bhanu dvaya aṃgulam ca uccam darpaṇa udara saṃnibham
athavā vālukaiḥ sthūlaiḥ sthaṇḍilam parikalpayet
gomaya ālepanam kṛtvā śilpinam tu visarjayet
brāhmaṇān bhojayet tatra tatas ucchiṣṭam visarjayet
punar ca gomayaiḥ lipya puṇyāham vācayet tadā
sthaṇḍilam kārayet dhīmān aṣṭa droṇaiḥ ca śālibhiḥ
tad ardhaiḥ taṇḍulaiḥ bhūṣya tad ardhaiḥ ca tilaiḥ api
lājaiḥ ca eva paristīrya śveta abjam parikalpayet
nānā puṣpaiḥ kuśaiḥ darbhaiḥ paristīrya vicakṣaṇaḥ
manonmanīm karṇikāyām vāma ādīḥ ca daleṣu api
gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ pūjya sva sva mantraiḥ viśeṣataḥ

original: lohajaṃ dārujaṃ vātha sthūpidaṇḍaṃ tu kārayet |
analyzed: loha jam dāru jam vā atha sthūpi daṇḍam tu kārayet
panasam khadiram sālam tiṃtriṇī sāram eva vā
madhūkam stavakam ca eva ṣaṭ ete sāra dāravaḥ

original: hemajaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ ayasā miśrameva vā || 19 ||
analyzed: hema jam rajatam tāmram ayasā miśram eva vā
ūrdhva bhūmi aṃghri tuṃgam tu sthūpi daṇḍa āyatam bhavet
mūrdhni śaila upariṣṭāt tu sthūpī antam vā tat āyatam
ūrdhva bhūmi aṃghri vistāram sthūpi dāru viśālakam
tasya agram aṃgulam vyāsam mūlāt agram kramāt kṛśam

original: tuṃge guṇāṃśe tveśaṃ tu mūle vedāśramācaret |
analyzed: tuṃge guṇa aṃśe tu īśam tu mūle veda āśramam ācaret

original: p. 158) vasvaṃśaṃ madhyame tvagre vṛttākāraṃ prakalpayet || 22 ||
analyzed: vasu aṃśam madhyame tu agre vṛtta ākāram prakalpayet
pariṣṭāt tu sarvam vṛttam atha api vā

original: kartavyaṃ tasya mūle tu śikhipādaṃ suyojayet || 23 ||
analyzed: kartavyam tasya mūle tu śikhi pādam
daṇḍa mūla samam vyāsam triguṇam triguṇa āyatam
tad vyāsa ardha ghana upetam pūrva agram ca uttara agrakam
badhvā antar madhyame chidre daṇḍa mūlam
śikhi pāda ghanam tasya dīrghāyām yojayet dṛḍham
daṇḍa mūla agrayoḥ paṭṭam yojayet loha jam budhaḥ
prakṣālya paṃcagavyena daṇḍam ca eva iṣṭakām api
karṇikāyām nyaset daṇḍam śakra ādiṣu yathākramam
catvāraḥ tu iṣṭakāḥ sthāpya śāli piṣṭa mayaiḥ jalaiḥ
pṛthivī ādīni bījāni daṇḍa ante vilikhet budhaḥ
prāc diśi iṣṭakam ārabhya daṇḍam puṣpa ādibhiḥ yajet
suvarṇa rajataiḥ tāmraiḥ sūtraiḥ kārpāsa jaiḥ tu vā
kautukam bandhayet vidvān sva sva bījam udāharan

original: brahmaviṣṇū ca rudraṃ ca īśānaṃ ca sadāśivam || 30 ||
analyzed: brahma viṣṇū ca rudram ca īśānam ca sadāśivam
śakra iṣṭakā ādi daṇḍa antam adhidevān kramāt yajet
naivedyam dāpayet teṣām tāmbulam tu nivedayet
pratyekam ca eva vastreṇa chādayet kūrca saṃyutam
abhitas kalaśān aṣṭau sa kūrcān sa apidhānakān   /
gandha ambu pūritān vastra hema puṣpa samanvitān
sa sūtrān pallava upetān aṣṭa vidyeśvara adhipān
sthāpya sva mūlamaṃtreṇa naivedya antam samarcayet
tatas homam prakartavyam agnyādhāna ādikam kuru
samidh ājya carum lājān yavam savya ādibhiḥ budhaḥ
śatam ardham tad ardham vā pratyekam juhuyāt kramāt
paṃca brahma ṣaṣ aṃgaiḥ ca kṣurikāḥ bījam uccaran
ājyena juhuyāt dhīmān pratyekam paṃcaviṃśatiḥ
jaya ādiḥ abhyātānaiḥ ca rāṣṭrabhṛt ca eva homayet
brahma ādi bīja mantraiḥ tu pṛthak spṛṣṭvā daśa āhutiḥ

original: evaṃ jāgaraṇaṃ rātrau prabhāte vimale śubhe |
analyzed: evam jāgaraṇam rātrau prabhāte vimale śubhe
ācāryaḥ mūrtipaiḥ sārdham snānam kṛtvā vidhānataḥ
hema aṃgulīya kaṭaka kuṇḍala ādyaiḥ alaṃkṛtaḥ
yajñasūtreṇa sahita bhūṣaṇaiḥ bhūṣya śilpinam
ācāryaḥ maṇṭapam gatvā daṇḍeṣṭaka gha analān
gandha puṣpa ādibhiḥ yaṣṭvā homam kṛtvā jaya ādibhiḥ
su iṣṭam agnā iti mantreṇa pūrṇāhutim samācaret
sthira rāśi udaye vipra ubhaya rāśi udaye pi vā

original: jīvo vā śukrasaṃyukto tayordṛṣṭena vā'tha vā |
analyzed: jīvaḥ vā tayoḥ dṛṣṭena vā atha vā
ācāryaḥ śilpibhiḥ ca eva yogyatā ūśma gṛha upari
vīkṣya mūdhnā iṣṭakā sthānam hīna ādhikyam tu na āśrite
mārjanyā maṇḍayitvā tu paṃcagavya kuśa udakaiḥ
prokṣayet śiva mantreṇa tatas sthāpanam ārabhet
sthapateḥ tarjanī veśa mātrā eva śikhare suṣim

original: kartavyaṃ tu tato vipra mūdhneṣṭakāṃ nidhāpayet |
analyzed: kartavyam tu tatas vipra mūdhnā iṣṭakām nidhāpayet
iṣṭakāḥ sthūpi kuṃbhān ca vahni dhāma pradakṣiṇam
nānā alaṃkāra saṃyuktam kṛtvā harmye tu ropayet
uttara abhimukhaḥ bhūtvā tu ācāryaḥ mantra vid tatas

original: brahmaviṣṇū ca rudraṃ ca īśānaṃ ca sadāśivam |
analyzed: brahma viṣṇū ca rudram ca īśānam ca sadāśivam
vicintya sva sva maṃtreṇa catur aśra iṣṭakāḥ nyaset
pṛthivī ātmakam aśmānam saumya agram śāṃkare sudhīḥ
suṣesvāṃgeyam āśritya sa ātmakam
nairṛtya soma agram      śala ātmakam
vāyum samāśritya prāc udagram marut ātmakam
evam kramāt nyaset aśma suṣim niścchidram ācaret
māṇikyam marakatam ca eva vaiḍūryam ca indranīlakam
mauktikam sphaṭikam ca eva padmarāgam pravālakam
vajram madhya ādiṣu sthāpya śakti bījam anusmaran   /
tad ūrdhve sthāpayet sthūpi daṇḍam īśānam āśritam
kalaśa stha udakaiḥ prokṣya daṇḍam aśmānam eva ca

original: garte mūrtiṃ samabhyarcya gandhaiḥ puṣpaiśca dhūpakaiḥ |
analyzed: garte mūrtim samabhyarcya gandhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ ca dhūpakaiḥ

original: gulāṃbhasā ca sudhayā sthūpiṃ badhvā tu niścalam || 54 ||
analyzed: gula aṃbhasā ca sudhayā sthūpim badhvā tu niścalam

original: tato (paṃca ca) śeṣaṃ tu kartavyaṃ syoditaṃ yathā |
analyzed: ca śeṣam tu kartavyam yathā
śikhara stha upariṣṭāt tu sthūpim prāc ukta vartmanā
kasala ādyaiḥ tatam kuryāt niścalam su dṛḍham yathā
svarṇaiḥ ca rajataiḥ vā atha tāmraiḥ ca chādayet gṛham
kāṃcana alam kṛtam dhenum ācāryāya pradāpayet
dakṣiṇām dāpayet tasmai daśa niṣkam hiraṇyakam
yāga upakaraṇam sarvam ācāryāya pradāpayet
śilpinam pūjayet paścāt go bhūmī kāṃcana ādibhiḥ

original: evaṃ yaḥ kurute martyaḥ sa yātyabhyudayaṃ phalam |
analyzed: evam yaḥ kurute martyaḥ sa yāti abhyudayam phalam
iti aṃśumān kāśyape mūdhneṣṭakā vidhi paṭalaḥ ekacatvāriṃśaḥ

original: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa prākārāṇāṃ tu lakṣaṇam |
analyzed: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa prākārāṇām tu lakṣaṇam

original: rakṣārthaṃ śobhanārthaṃ ca śālā yasyodayasya tu || 1 ||
analyzed: rakṣā artham śobhana artham ca śālā yasya udayasya tu
prāsādasya viśāla ardham guṇa bhāga vibhājite
catur bhāga eka bhāgam vā antar maṇḍala vistṛtam

original: antarhāraviśālaṃ tu tadbāhye dviguṇaṃ hi tat |
analyzed: antarhāra viśālam tu tad bāhye dviguṇam hi tat
tu bāhye tat maṇḍala trayam

original: maryādestu viśālaṃ tu bāhye tvādi caturguṇam |
analyzed: maryādeḥ tu viśālam tu bāhye tu ādi caturguṇam
mahāmarya ādi vistāram ādeḥ paṃcaguṇam bhavet
