original: athavā veśahīnaṃ tu maṇṭapasya samam bhavet || 28 ||
analyzed: athavā veśa hīnam tu maṇṭapasya samam bhavet
antarālam samākhyātam śṛṇu maṇṭapa mānakam
tri hastam tu samārabhya dvi dvi hasta vivardhanāt
yāvat ekona viṃśam tu navadhā
ābhāsa sadanānām tu ābhāsam maṇṭapaḥ tu ime  /
saptatriṃśati hasta antam vikalpam navadhā bhavet
ābhāsānām tu tad yogyam sva sva yogyam atha api vā
navatriṃśat kara ārabhya dvi dvi hasta vivardhanāt
paṃca adhikam tu paṃcāśat kara antam chandam ucyate
saptapaṃcāśat ārabhya dvi dvi hasta vivardhanāt
sa agni saptati hasta antam vistṛtam jātiḥ ucyate
tad vistāra samam dīrgham samaśram maṇṭapam bhavet  /
adhyardha hastam ārabhya ṣaṣ ṣaṣ aṃgula vardhanāt
paṃca hasta avadhiḥ yāvat bhakti vyāsam tri paṃcadhā
ardha hastam samārabhya yāvat paṃca kara avadhi
guṇa aṃgula vivṛddhyā tu bhakti vyāsam prakalpayet
sārdha dvi hastam ārabhya ṣaṣ ṣaṣ aṃgula vardhanāt
aṣṭa hasta avadhiḥ yāvat trayoviṃśa aṃghri bhedakam
stambhānām udayam hi evam stambha vyāsam atha ucyate
vasu aṃgulam samārabhya ardha aṃgula vivardhanāt
ekonaviṃśa mātrā antam trayoviṃśa aṃghri vistaram
pāda uccam bhānu rudra aṃśe vā bhajet

original: talipoccaṃ tu bhūtāṃśe dvibhāgaṃ vā talodayam || 41 ||
analyzed: talipa uccam tu bhūta aṃśe dvi bhāgam vā tala udayam
aṃghri tuṃga agniveda eka bhāgam vā api masūrakam
sa upapīṭham adhiṣṭhānam kevalam vā masūrakam

original: dharātala samoccaṃ vā dviguṇaṃ triguṇaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: sama uccam vā dviguṇam triguṇam tu vā
upa pīṭha udayam khyātam upa pīṭha ucchrayam tu vā
upa pīṭham adhiṣṭhānam caraṇam prastaram tathā
nīvra veśam alaṃkāram gaṇyam prāk iva vidyate
bhakti traya samāyuktam ṣoḍaśa stambha saṃyutam

original: kalālpanāsikopetaṃ madhye kūṭaṃ tu eva vā || 45 ||
analyzed: kalā alpa nāsikā upetam madhye kūṭam tu eva vā

original: maṇḍitaṃ vātha sarvatra caturdvāra yutaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: maṇḍitam vā atha sarvatra catur dvāra yutam tu vā
iṣṭa diś dvāram evam vā dvaya jālaka koṣṭha diś
bāhye sopāna saṃyuktam citram tat toraṇa ādibhiḥ

original: toraṇādi vihīnaṃ vā kalpyevaṃ prathamaṃ bhavet || 47 ||
analyzed: toraṇa ādi vihīnam vā kalpya ivam prathamam bhavet
catur bhaktyā viśālam tu iṣṭa diś dvāra saṃyutam

original: pūrve pare dvibhaktyaikaṃ bhaktyā vistṛta nīvrakam || 48 ||
analyzed: pūrve pare dvi bhaktyā ekam bhaktyā
madhyastha aṃghrim parityajya ūrdhve kūṭa dvi bhaktikam
yuktam viṃśati nāsikā

original: dvārāśāsu ca sopānaṃ karṇe lāṃgala bhittikam |
analyzed: dvāra āśāsu ca sopānam karṇe lāṃgala bhittikam
vasu paṃjara saṃyuktam dvitīyam maṇṭapam bhavet

original: p. 177) paṃcabhaktyā yugāśraṃ tu madhye kūṭaṃ tribhāgayā |
analyzed: pañca bhaktyā tu madhye kūṭam tri bhāgayā
maṇṭapam paritas ṛṃśena dvātriṃśat caraṇa anvitam
bhānu dviguṇa nāsā āḍhyam paṃjara aṣṭaka saṃyutam
iṣṭa diś dvāra saṃyuktam dvāra anyatra eva kuḍyakam
dvāra sthāne tu sopānam sarva alaṃkāra saṃyutam
kuḍyam kuṃbha latā ādyaiḥ tu bhūṣitam tu tṛtīyakam

original: caturaśraṃ tu ṣaḍbhaktyā madhye kūṭaṃ dvibhāgayā |
analyzed: caturaśram tu ṣaṣ bhaktyā madhye kūṭam dvi bhāgayā
tat kūṭam aṣṭa pāda āḍhyam madhye raṃga samāyutam
catur dvāra samāyuktam iṣṭa diś dvāram eva vā
dvi bhakti vistṛtam ca eva bhaktyā nīvram samāyutam
iṣṭa diś bhadra saṃyuktam catur diś bhadram eva vā

original: catvāriṃśati cāṣṭāṃghri yuktaṃ vā tatra yojayet || 56 ||
analyzed: catvāriṃśati ca aṣṭa aṃghri yuktam vā tatra yojayet  /
caturviṃśa alpa nāsā āḍhyam kuḍyam kuṃbha latā anvitam
toraṇa aṣṭaka saṃyuktam caturtham maṇṭapa anvitam
caturaśram tu sapta aṃśam ṣaṣṭhī aṃghrika samāyutam

original: navabhāgena tanmadhye kūṭaṃ vā maṇditāṃ kaṇam || 58 ||
analyzed: nava bhāgena tad madhye kūṭam vā maṇditām kaṇam
dvātriṃśat alpa nāsā āḍhyam catur diś bhadra saṃyutam
tri bhāga eka aṃśa vistāram nirgamam mukhabhadrakam
madhye raṃga samopetam iṣṭa diś kuḍya saṃyutam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam paṃcamam parikīrtitam
yuga āśrama aṣṭa bhaktyā tu aśīti caraṇa anvitam
catur bhāgena tad madhye hi ūrdhva kūṭam prakalpayet
catur diś dvāra saṃyuktam madhya eka aṃśena kūṭakam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam ṣaṣṭhamam maṇṭapam bhavet
nava bhaktyā tu śatam pāda samanvitam
catur dvāra samāyuktam iṣṭa diś dvāram eva vā
mukhe sopānam agni aṃśaiḥ vyāsa dīrgha samanvitam
madhya raṃga samāyuktam ṣaṣ aṣṭau nāsikā anvitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam saptamam maṇṭapam bhavet
caturaśram daśa aṃśam tu bhānva adhika daśa aṃśakam
madhye ca eva aṣṭa diśi ca nava kūṭa samāyutam
prakalpayet
prāgvat mukhena sopānam diśi bhadra samanvitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam aṣṭamam maṇṭapam bhavet
rudra bhaktyā tu madhyegni aṃśena kūṭakam
mukhe sopāna saṃyuktam iṣṭa diś bhadra saṃyutam
dvārā anyatra eva kuḍyam vā iṣṭa bhāga avasānakam  /
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam navamam maṇṭapam bhavet

original: dvādaśāṃśe yugāśraṃ tu madhye dvyaṃśena kūṭakam || 70 ||
analyzed: dvādaśa aṃśe tu madhye dvi aṃśena kūṭakam  /

original: p. 179) maṇṭapasya tu bāhye tu aṃśenālindamiṣyate |
analyzed: maṇṭapasya tu bāhye tu aṃśena alindam iṣyate
catur dvi aṃśena vistāram niṣkrāntam syāt catur diśi
sa aṣṭaṣaṣṭi śatam pādam madhya raṃge tu kalpayet
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam daśamam maṇṭapam bhavet
trayodaśa aṃśena madhyegni aṃśena kūṭakam
iṣṭa diś kuḍya saṃyuktam catur diś bhadra saṃyutam
prāc mukhe nanda bhāgena mukhabhadram prakalpayet
sa dvayam navatī yuktam ca samanvitam
toraṇaiḥ jālakaiḥ ca anyaiḥ alaṃkāra samanvitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam rudra aṃśam maṇṭapam bhavet
tu madhye dvi aṃśena kūṭakam
veda ādhikyam tu viṃśa aṃśam dviśatam caraṇa anvitam
maṇṭapam kuḍya saṃyuktam catur diś bhadra saṃyutam
nanda ādi bhadra saṃyuktam iṣṭa bhaktyā viśeṣataḥ
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam dvādaśam maṇṭapam bhavet
tri paṃca bhitti vistāram āyatam caturaśrakam
madhye kūṭam guṇa aṃśena ūrdhva kūṭa samanvitam
guṇa aṃśam vistṛta āyāmam mukha bhadra samanvitam
iṣṭa diś kuḍya saṃyuktam anyatra aṃghri samanvitam
toraṇaiḥ jālakaiḥ ca anyaiḥ alaṃkṛtya samanvitam
pañcāśat dvayava ādhikyam dviśatam caraṇa anvitam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam maṇṭapam tu trayodaśa

original: evaṃ hi mānabhedena yugāśraṃ maṇṭapaṃ viduḥ |
analyzed: evam hi māna bhedena yugāśram maṇṭapam viduḥ
itas ūrdhvam catustriṃśat daśa sīmāvasānakam
caturaśram maṇṭapam kuryāt sarva alaṃkāra saṃyutam
bhitti stambham ca paritas kartuḥ icchā vaśāt nayet
kuryāt āyata āśram atha ucyate

original: vistārabhittitulyaṃ vā yātaṃ vā yatabhitti yaḥ || 84 ||
analyzed: vistāra bhitti tulyam vā yātam vā yata bhitti yaḥ
vistāram bhakti mānam tu guṇa aṃgula vivardhanāt
saptaviṃśa aṃgulam yāvat tāvat pādena vā uditam

original: vṛddhyā kṣīṇaṃ tu yāvā'tha maṇṭapānāṃ karoditam |
analyzed: vṛddhyā kṣīṇam tu yāvā atha maṇṭapānām kara uditam

original: nāśraye tu karaṃ pūrya maṇṭapaṃ tu samācaret || 86 ||
analyzed: na āśraye tu karam pūrya maṇṭapam tu samācaret  /
aṃśa iṣṭa pāda saṃkhyā tu prāgvat āyādim ācaret
āyādīṣṭa śubha aupetam maṇṭapasya tat āyatam

original: tasyocita vibhāgaṃ tu kṛtvā vā maṇṭapaṃ kuru |
analyzed: vibhāgam tu kṛtvā vā maṇṭapam kuru
bhakti traya viśālam tu paṃca bhakti āyata anvitam
eka pārśve pure vā atha dvāram aṃśena kalpayet
pārśve vāra yutam ced tu triṃśat aṃghri samanvitam
tat eva paritas oṃśena maṇṭapa abhyantarasya ca
lūpārohaṇakam kuryāt aṣṭaviṃśa aṅghri saṃyutam

original: p. 181) pure vārayutaṃ cettu caraṇaṃ cāṣṭaviṃśatiḥ |
analyzed: pure vāra yutam ced tu caraṇam ca aṣṭaviṃśatiḥ
athavā vāra hīnam tu tris aṣṭa caraṇa anvitam
pādam vedi jālaka toraṇam
nānā kuṃbha latā ādyaiḥ tu kalpitam prathamam bhavet

original: caturbhakti viśālaṃ tu āyāme tu ṣaḍaṃśakam |
analyzed: catur bhakti viśālam tu āyāme tu ṣaṣ aṃśakam
maṇṭapam paritas ṛṃśena kūṭam abhyantaretaram
vistṛtam mukha bhadrakam
dvātriṃśat caraṇa upetam maṇṭapasya dvitīyakam

original: viśāle paṃcabhaktiḥ syā āyāme saptabhakti yaḥ |
analyzed: viśāle paṃca bhaktiḥ syāḥ āyāme sapta bhakti yaḥ
tri paṃca bhakti vistāram dīrgha madhye sabhā bhavet
maṇṭapam iṣṭa diś bhadra saṃyutam
catvāriṃśati pāḍyam vā sarva alaṃkāra saṃyutam
vedikā ādyaiḥ samāyuktam tṛtīyam maṇṭapam bhavet
rasa bhakti viśālam tu vasu bhaktyā yata aśrakam
dvi catur bhakti vistāram dīrgham madhye sabhā udayam
maṇṭapam iṣṭa diṅmukha bhadrakam
ṣaṣṭi saṃkhyā aṃghri saṃyuktam nāsikā ādi vibhūṣitam
nānā alaṃkāra saṃyuktam caturtham maṇṭapam bhavet
tāre sapta vibhāge tu nava bhakti āyata anvitam
tri bhakti vistṛtam paṃca bhaktyāyāmam sa bhāṃkaṇam
tri bhakti vistṛtam bhakti āyāma mukha bhadrakam
saptatiḥ syāt dvaya ādhikyam pādam iti abhidhīyate
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam paṃcamam maṇṭapam bhavet
vasu bhakti viśālam tu daśa bhakti āyata anvitam
dvi catur bhāga vistāram dīrgha madhye sabhā udayam
paritas maṇṭapa ugni aṃśa madhya stambha vivarjitam
iṣṭa diṅmukha bhadra aṃśam catur dvi aṃśe ca suvrata
ṣaṇṇavati aṃghri saṃyuktam sarva alaṃkāra saṃyutam

original: ṣaṣṭhamaṃ maṇṭapaṃ hyevaṃ procyate tu śivārhakam || 105 ||
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhamam maṇṭapam hi evam procyate tu śiva arhakam
nava bhaktyā viśālam tu rudra bhakti āyata anvitam

original: ekāṃśaṃ bhakti vistāraṃ dīrghamadhye sabhā bhavet || 106 ||
analyzed: eka aṃśam vistāram dīrgha madhye sabhā bhavet
paritas veda bhāgam tu maṇṭapam parikalpayet
tri catur bhāga vistāram dīrgham syāt mukhamaṇṭapam
sarva alaṃkāra saṃyuktam saptamam maṇṭapam bhavet
tu dvi bhaktyā adhikam āyatam
dvi catur bhāga āyatam tāram tayoḥ madhye sa bhāṃkaṇam
paritas lindam eka aṃśam maṇṭapāt dvi aṃśa bāhyatas
tad bāhyelindam eka aṃśam yuktyā anta stambha saṃyutam
iṣṭa diś bhadra saṃyuktam aṣṭamam maṇṭapam bhavet  /

original: p. 183) tadeva śivāṃśādhikaṃ vistṛtāyāme tripaṃcāṃśena sabhāṃkaṇam |
analyzed: tat eva śiva aṃśa adhikam vistṛta āyāme tri pañca aṃśena sa bhāṃkaṇam
paritas lindam eka aṃśam maṇṭapam dvi aṃśa bāhyatas
tad bāhyelindam eka aṃśam navamam maṇṭapam bhavet
āditya aṃśa viśāle tu dvi bhāga adhikam āyatam

original: catuṣṣaḍaṃśamdhye tu sabhāyāraṃ kaṇaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: tu kaṇam tu vā
daśamam maṇṭapam bhavet
vistṛte tu jagatyā aṃśe tad dvi aṃśa adhikam māyatam
tri paṃca aṃśe sabhā madhye tasmāt alinda aṃśam āvṛtam
vimānam tu

original: ālindaṃ tu vinā vāpi maṇṭapaṃ tu yugāṃśakam |
analyzed: ālindam tu vinā vā api maṇṭapam tu yuga aṃśakam
bhadramaṇṭapam ākhyātam iṣṭa diś bhadra saṃyutam
manvaṃśe tu ca vistāre dvi bhāga adhikam āyatam
tad bāhyelindam eka aṃśam maṇṭapam caturaśrakam
bhāgam evam vidhīyate
caturdaśam maṇṭapam khyātam iṣṭa diś bhadra saṃyutam
tri paṃca aṃśe viśālam tu dvi bhāga adhikam āyatam
tithi aṃśa maṇṭapam madhye sabhām kaṇam iti smṛtam
aṃkaṇa āvṛtam eka aṃśam alindam tu vidhīyate

original: p. 184) tadbāhye caturaśraṃ syāt maṇṭapaṃ pravidhīyate |
analyzed: tad bāhye catur aśram syāt maṇṭapam pravidhīyate
tasya āvṛta aṃśataḥ ulindam trayodaśam maṇṭapam bhavet  /
ṣoḍaśa aṃśe viśālam tu dvi bhāga adhikam āyatam
caturviṃśa aṃkaṇa upetam mānataḥ
tad bāhye catur aṃśena maṇṭapam syāt viśeṣataḥ
tasyāḥ vṛta aṃśatā ulindam caturdaśam maṇṭapam bhavet  /
jāti ādi āyatam vidyāt tad tad vinyāsam ucyate

original: jālakaṃ ca kavāṭaṃ ca grāhyaṃ yuktyā viśeṣataḥ || 124 ||
analyzed: jālakam ca kavāṭam ca grāhyam yuktyā viśeṣataḥ
iṣṭa diś caraṇam kuḍyam kalpayet paritas budhaḥ

original: evaṃ hi manubhedaṃ ca sāyataṃ maṇṭapaṃ viduḥ || 125 ||
analyzed: evam hi manu bhedam ca sa āyatam maṇṭapam viduḥ
tri catuṣpaṃca ṣaṣ sapta caraṇa vyāsaḥ eva vā

original: sarveṣāṃ maṇṭapānāṃ tu bhittivyāsaṃ tu paṃcadhā || 126 ||
analyzed: sarveṣām maṇṭapānām tu bhitti vyāsam tu paṃcadhā
pāda āyāma viśāle na dāru pādena vā api ayam
sarveṣām mukha bhadrāṇām aṃkaṇam maṇṭapa ākṛtiḥ
pārśve sopāna saṃyuktam hasti hasta vibhūṣitam
paṃca ṣaṣ sapta nanda aṣṭa daṇḍam vā tasya vistṛtam

original: sa pādaṃ sārdhadaṇḍaṃ vā hasti hastodayaṃ tathā |
analyzed: sa pādam sārdha daṇḍam vā hasti hasta udayam tathā
yaṣṭinā abhyutakalpya ivam gajahastakam
mūlāt aṣṭa aṃśa hīnam tat agra vyāsam kramāt kṛśam

original: p. 185) hastihastāntaraṃ vipra ! yugmaṃ vā yugmayaṣṭayaḥ |
analyzed: hasti hasta antaram vipra yugmam vā yugma yaṣṭayaḥ
daṇḍam sa pāda daṇḍam vā sārdha tri pāda pādakam

original: dvidaṇḍaṃ vātha yaṣṭiśca vistāraṃ syāttadeva hi |
analyzed: dvi daṇḍam vā atha yaṣṭiḥ ca vistāram syāt tat eva hi

original: tena dviguṇa nīvraṃ tu adhastānmaṇṭapaṃ bhavet || 132 ||
analyzed: tena dviguṇa nīvram tu adhastāt maṇṭapam bhavet  /
yathā iṣṭa rucāṃganī bhāga ekam bhāgam
ādau tasmin sthale sthitvā savya pāda purassaram
sopāna ārohaṇam vidyāt martyānām tu vidhīyate
maṇṭapam hi evam ākhyātam gopuram śṛṇu suvrata
iti aṃśumān kāśyape maṇṭapa lakṣaṇa vidhi paṭalaḥ tricatvāriṃśaḥ

original: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa gopurāṇāṃ tu lakṣaṇam |
analyzed: atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa gopurāṇām tu lakṣaṇam
antar maṇḍala sāla ādiḥ tu adhunā procyate kramāt
dvāra śobhā dvāra śālā dvāra prāsāda harmyake
dvāra gopure iti ete kramāt nāmnā prakīrtitāḥ
eka dvi tri talam vā api dvāra śobhām tu kalpayet
dvi bhūmiḥ vā tri bhūmiḥ vā catur bhūmiḥ atha api vā

original: dvāraśālā tu kartavyā sāle syāttu dvitīyakam |
analyzed: dvāra śālā tu kartavyā sāle syāt tu dvitīyakam
tri catur paṃca bhūmiḥ vā dvāra prāsādam ārabhet

original: p. 186) catuṣpaṃcatalaṃ vātha ṣaṭtalaṃ vātha harmyakam |
analyzed: catuṣpaṃcatalam vā atha ṣaṣ talam vā atha harmyakam
paṃca ṣaṣ sapta bhūmiḥ vā dvāra gopuram iṣyate  /
athavā sarva sāleṣu eka dvi tri talam tu vā
sa upapīṭham adhiṣṭhānam vinā
tayoḥ ucca ādayāḥ sarve nava paṃca avadāmi aham
mūlaprāsāda vistāram sapta aṣṭa nava bhājite
daśa ekādaśa bhāge ca eka aṃśa rahitam kramāt
śobhā ādi gopura antānām vipulam kīrtitam kramāt
vikalpa ābhāsa harmyāṇām gopurāṇām tatiḥ tu ime
mūla ālayaviśālam tu catuṣpaṃca ṣaṣ aṃśake   /
sapta aṣṭa aṃśena hīnam tu chanda śobhāt ayam bhavet
mūla geha tri bhāga ekam bhāgam ardha aṃśam eva vā

original: tridvyaṃśacaturaṃśe tu guṇāṃśaṃ ca tathaiva ca |
analyzed: tri dvi aṃśa catur aṃśe tu guṇa aṃśam ca tathā eva ca
paṃca bhāge tu veda aṃśam sāleṣu prathama ādiṣu
śobhā ādi gopura antānām tatiḥ jāti ālayam kramāt
kalpya evam harmya mānam syāt hasta māna vaśāt tatas
dvi hasta ādi dvis aṣṭa antam eka hasta vivardhanāt
śobhā ādi gopura antānām pratyekam tri tri bhedakam
vikalpa ābhāsayoḥ evam vakṣyate
guṇa hastam samārabhya saptādaśa kara avadhi

original: p. 187) ekahasta vivṛddhyā tu śobhādīnāṃ trayaṃ trayam |
analyzed: eka hasta vivṛddhyā tu śobhā ādīnām trayam trayam
catur hastam samārabhya yāvat aṣṭadaśaiḥ karaiḥ  /

original: śobhādīnāṃ tu vistāraṃ jātiharmye tu vidyate |
analyzed: śobhā ādīnām tu vistāram jāti harmye tu vidyate

original: pratyekaṃ tritridhā mānaṃ chandaṃ paṃcavidhaṃ bhavet || 16 ||
analyzed: pratyekam tri tridhā mānam chandam paṃcavidham bhavet
hasta mānena vistāram kṣudrāṇām mahatīm kramāt
sva sva uditaḥ prakartavyam viparītam vipad karam
athavā ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭa nava aṃśakam
daśa ekādaśa hastam tu adhama ādi trayam trayam
sarva sāleṣu kartavyam tasmāt te sārvadeśikam
athavā anya prakāreṇa śobhā ādīnām tu vistaram
paṃca hastam samārabhya dvi dvi hasta vivardhanāt
trayodaśa kara antam tu śobhāvyāsam tu paṃcadhā
tri paṃca hastam ārabhya dvi dvi hasta vivardhanāt
trayoviṃśat kara antam tu dvāraśālā tu paṃcadhā
paṃcaviṃśat kara ārabhya trayoviṃśat kara antakam
dvāra prāsāda vistāram paṃcadhā parikīrtitam
paṃcatriṃśat kara ārabhya catvāriṃśat traya avadhi
paṃcadhā dvāra harmyasya vistāram parikīrtitam
sa paṃca catvāriṃśat tu paṃcāśat tri kara antakam
dvi dvi hasta vivṛddhyā tu paṃcadhā
dvāra āyatana vyāsāḥ te nataḥ tat āyatam śṛṇu

original: sa pādaṃ sārdhapādona dviguṇaṃ dviguṇaṃ tu vā || 25 ||
analyzed: sa pādam dviguṇam dviguṇam tu vā
sa tri bhāga eka bhāgam tu dvi bhāgaḥ tu āyatam bhavet
śobhā ādi gopura antānām evam hi evam pragṛhyatām
teṣu kiṃcid viśeṣaḥ usti tad viśeṣam
hasta mānena vistāram gṛhīte tu viśeṣataḥ
āyāmam pūrvavat kalpya anekeṣu iṣṭam āyatam

original: hastacchedaṃ pravṛddhyā vā hanyā vā pūrvamācaret || 28 ||
analyzed: hasta chedam pravṛddhyā vā hanyā vā pūrvam ācaret
āya ādi śobhana upetam hasta mānena kalpitam

original: tau vinā harmyamūlasya vaśaṃ saṃkalpitasya tu || 29 ||
analyzed: tau vinā harmya mūlasya vaśam saṃkalpitasya tu
vyāsa āyāmam samākhyātam teṣām tuṃgam atha ucyate
vistāram saptadhā bhajya śobha uccam rudrabhāgayā
tārāt ardha adhikam tuṃgam dvāra śālā ucchrayam bhavet
saptābhāgena rudra aṃśam bhānvaṃśam vā tṛtīyake

original: vistāre tu navāṃśe tu manvaṃśoccaṃ caturthake |
analyzed: vistāre tu nava aṃśe tu manu aṃśa uccam caturthake
vistāra dviguṇa utsedham mahā gopuram iṣyate

original: homādi sthūpi paryantaṃ proktoccaṃ tu pragṛhyatām |
analyzed: homa ādi sthūpi paryantam prokta uccam tu
vistāra āyāmayoḥ mānam sūtram pād bāhyam ucyate  /
tad bāhye kūṭa koṣṭha ādi nīvram prāsāda vat bhavet
vistārasya tri bhāga ekam catur bhāga ekam eva vā

original: p. 189) paṃcabhāge dvibhāgaṃ vā sālādbāhye tu nirgatiḥ |
analyzed: pañca bhāge dvi bhāgam vā sālāt bāhye tu nirgatiḥ
sa ardha hastam samārabhya ṣaṣ ṣaṣ aṃgula vardhanāt
paṃca hasta avadhiḥ yāvat kṣudrāṇām dvāra vistṛtam

original: alpānāṃ ca tridhā proktaṃ dvyantarāṇāṃ tataḥ śṛṇu || 36 ||
analyzed: alpānām ca tridhā proktam dvi antarāṇām tatas śṛṇu
tri hastam tu samārabhya yāvat sapta kara avadhi
ṣaṣ aṃgula vivṛddhyā tu dvāra vyāsam prakīrtitam
catur hastam samārabhya yāvat nava kara antakam
rasa matra vivṛddhyā tu mahate dvāra vistṛtam

original: tāre paṃcāṃśa saptāṃśaṃ saptāṃśe tu daśāyatam |
analyzed: tāre sapta aṃśam sapta aṃśe tu daśa āyatam
adhyardham pāda hīnam tu dviguṇam dviguṇa unnatam

original: sārdhapādaṃ tu pādaṃ vā dvārotsedhaṃ tu saptadhā |
analyzed: sārdha pādam tu pādam vā dvāra utsedham tu saptadhā

original: liṃgasya madhyamaṃ dvāraṃ madhyamaṃ tu vadāmyaham || 40 ||
analyzed: liṃgasya madhyamam dvāram madhyamam tu vadāmi aham
śiva agni bhūtadhā kṛtvā nava aṃgulam viśeṣataḥ
liṃga madhyāt tu vāme vā dvāra madhyam prakalpayet
śobhā ādi gopura antānām dvāra madhyam kramāt viduḥ
tad madhyāt gopura āyāmam ubhayoḥ pārśvayoḥ samam
dvara yogam kavāṭam ca dvāra lakṣaṇa vat kuru
guṇa bhakti samārabhya yāvat ekona viṃśatiḥ
tāat paṃktiḥ tu vistāre evam evam prakalpayet
yāvat dvi paṃktayoḥ vyāse tāvat eva āya paṃktayaḥ

original: p. 190) vistāre paṃcabhāge tu guṇāṃśe garbhagehakam |
analyzed: vistāre pañca bhāge tu guṇa aṃśe garbha gehakam
śeṣam kuḍya viśālam tāra ardham vā agra hastakam
śeṣam viśālam syāt eka bhūmau dvijottamau
paritas kuḍya vistāram anena eva prakalpayet

original: evaṃ ekatalaṃ khyātaṃ dvitalaṃ tu tathocyate |
analyzed: evam eka talam khyātam dvi talam tu tathā ucyate

original: vistāre paṃcabhāgaṃ syāt āyāme'pi tathaiva ca || 47 ||
analyzed: vistāre paṃca bhāgam syāt āyāme api tathā eva ca
dvi aṃśa aṃśam garbha geham tu sārdha aṃśam kuḍya vistṛtam
eka aṃśam karṇakūṭam syāt guṇa aṃśam koṣṭha dīrghakam
hāra antaram śiva aṃśam syāt kalpayet evam eva vā
vistāram sapta bhāgam syāt nava bhāgam tad āyatam
yuga aṃśam garbha geham tu sārdha aṃśam kuḍya vistṛtam
karṇakūṭam tu tāra iṃśam śālā dīrgham guṇa aṃśakam
hāra antaram tad aṃśena vistāre ca evam eva vā

original: śālādīrghaṃ tu paṃcāṃśaṃ āyāmaṃ tu prakalpayet || 51 ||
analyzed: śālā dīrgham tu paṃca aṃśam āyāmam tu prakalpayet

original: hārāntaraṃ ca kūṭaṃ ca ekaikāṃśena kalpayet |
analyzed: hāra antaram ca kūṭam ca ekaika aṃśena kalpayet
kūṭa antara samāyāmam śeṣam hāra anvitam bhavet
hāra antara ardha mānena bhadram vā bhadra paṃjaram
dvi talam hi evam ākhyātam tri talam tu adhunā ucyate

original: navāṃśaṃ vibhajed vyāsaṃ āyāmaṃ ca tathā bhavet |
analyzed: nava aṃśam vibhajet vyāsam āyāmam ca tathā bhavet
garbha geham guṇa aṃśam syāt aṃśena gṛha piṇḍikā
ālindam ca eka bhāgena hāra vyāsam śiva aṃśakam
eka aṃśam paṃjara vyāsam ardha aṃśam
kalpya evamādi bhūmam tu dvi talam pūrvavat viduḥ
athavā anya prakāreṇa tri talam śṛṇu suvrata

original: dvāraśobhaṃ tu vistāraṃ rudrāṃśaṃ tu tadāyatam || 57 ||
analyzed: dvāra śobham tu vistāram rudra aṃśam tu tat āyatam
guṇa aṃśam garbha geham tu gṛha piṇḍī aṃśam ucyate

original: alindaṃ tatsamaṃ khyātaṃ hāraṃ bhāgena kalpayet || 58 ||
analyzed: alindam tad samam khyātam hāram bhāgena kalpayet

original: alindāṃśaṃ tu kuḍyaṃ vā garbhagehānvitaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: alinda aṃśam tu kuḍyam vā garbha geha anvitam tu vā
āyāme paṃca bhāgena koṣṭha dīrgham prakalpayet
śeṣam pūrvavat uddiṣṭam dvitīyam dvi tala ukta vat
tri talam hi evam ākhyātam catur bhūmim idam param
vistāre tu daśa aṃśe tu tadvat āyāma paṃktayaḥ
garbha geham tri bhāga ādi sārdha aṃśam kuḍya vistṛtam
alindam śiva bhāgena hāravyāsam tathā eva ca
paṃjaram karṇakūṭam ca tu ekaika aṃśena kalpayet  /
kūṭa tāra samāyāmam śeṣam hāra antara anvitam
śālā āyāme tu veda aṃśam ardha aṃśam
ādi bhūmi evam ākhyātam ūrdhvam pūrva vat ācaret

original: vistāre tu daśāṃśe tu bhānvaṃśaṃ tu tadāyatam || 64 ||
analyzed: vistāre tu daśa aṃśe tu bhānvaṃśam tu tat āyatam  /

original: p. 192) pūrve pare ca śālāyāṃ paṃcabhāgena kalpayet |
analyzed: pūrve pare ca śālāyām pañca bhāgena kalpayet
śeṣam pūrvavat uddiṣṭam catu bhūmim idam param

original: tāramekādaśāṃśaṃ tu āyāmaṃ ca tathaiva ca |
analyzed: tāram ekādaśa aṃśam tu āyāmam ca tathā eva ca

original: pūrve pare ca pārśve ca śālā paṃcāṃśamāyatam || 66 ||
analyzed: pūrve pare ca pārśve ca śālā paṃca aṃśam āyatam
eka aṃśam paṃjara vyāsam kūṭa vyāsam śiva aṃśakam

original: hārāntaraṃ tathāṃśaṃ ca kalpyevaṃ prathamaṃ talam || 67 ||
analyzed: hāra antaram tathā aṃśam ca kalpya ivam prathamam talam
tasya ūrdhva bhūmayaḥ sarvāḥ pūrvavat parikalpayet
tāram ekādaśa aṃśe tu tad dīrgham tu trayodaśa  /
guṇa aṃśam garbha geham tu dvi bhāgam bhitti vistṛtam
alindam ca eka bhāgena hārā bhāgena kalpayet  /
kūṭa koṣṭha ādi sarva aṃgam prāk iva eva prakalpeyt
paṃca bhūmeḥ samākhyātam ṣaṭtalam tu adhunā śṛṇu

original: tāre tu dvādaśāṃśe tu maṃcaṃśe tu tadāyatam |
analyzed: tāre tu dvādaśa aṃśe tu maṃca aṃśe tu tat āyatam

original: yugāṃśaṃ garbhagehaṃ tu dvibhāgaṃ bhakti vistṛtam || 71 ||
analyzed: yuga aṃśam garbha geham tu dvi bhāgam vistṛtam

original: alindaṃ bhāgayā kalpya hārā bhāgena kalpayet |
analyzed: alindam bhāgayā kalpya hārāḥ bhāgena kalpayet
pārśvaśālā tu veda aṃśam ṣaṣ aṃśam mukha pṛṣṭhayoḥ
śeṣam pūrvavat uddiṣṭam rasa bhūmyā evam eva tu

original: trayodaśāṃśe viṣkaṃbhe āyāme ca tathaiva hi |
analyzed: trayodaśa aṃśe viṣkaṃbhe āyāme ca tathā eva hi
bhūta aṃśam garbha geham tu gṛha piṇḍī dvi bhāgayā

original: p. 193) alindaṃ tu śivāṃśena khaṇḍaharmyaṃ śivāṃśakam |

analyzed: koṣṭha āyāmam tu bhūta aṃśam sarvatra aṃśena paṃjaram
kūṭam aṃśena kartavyam hāra antaram tathā eva hi
athavā āyāmam tu tri paṃcakam
mukhe mukhe mahāśālā sapta aṃśena prakalpayet
paṃca bhāgena kartavyam kartavyam pārśva dīrghakam
śeṣam pūrvavat uddiṣṭam sarva alaṃkāra saṃyutam
sapta bhūmiḥ samākhyātā tat mahā gopuram bhavet
sa alindam vā vinā alindam kalpayet kalpa vittamaḥ

original: vinālindaṃ kṛtaṃ cettu kuḍyagarbhagṛhaṃ tu vā || 79 ||
analyzed: vinā alindam kṛtam ced tu kuḍya garbhagṛham tu vā
alinda aṃśam tu saṃyojya kārayet tu dvijottama
ādi bhūmyā evam ākhyātam ūrdhvam ṣaṣ tala vat bhavet  /
sapta bhūmim samākhyātam teṣām gaṇyam atha ucyate
pāda adhiṣṭhānayoḥ tuṃgam mūla prāsāda mūlakam

original: catuḥpaṃcaṣaḍaṃśaṃ vā saptāṣṭa nava eva vā |
analyzed: catur paṃca ṣaṣ aṃśam vā sapta aṣṭa nava eva vā

original: daśaikādaśabhāgaṃ vā saptāṣṭa nava eva vā || 82 ||
analyzed: daśa ekādaśa bhāgam vā sapta aṣṭa nava eva vā
daśa ekādaśa bhāgam vā kṛtvā eka aṃśa upapīṭhakam
śeṣam ca anala bhāgam tu kṛtvā eka aṃśam dharā talam
dvi bhāgam caraṇa uttuṃgam kalpayet kalpa vittamaḥ
tuṃgam ca eva upapīṭhakam
athavā hasta mānena dvāra mānam yathocitam

original: taduccaṃ tu catuṣpaṃca ṣaṭsaptāṣṭau tu vā bhavet || 85 ||
analyzed: tat uccam tu ṣaṣ sapta aṣṭau tu vā bhavet
nava rudra vibhāgam vā kṛtvā eka aṃśa upapīṭhakam
upa pīṭha unnatam khyātam śeṣam tu guṇa bhājite
adhiṣṭhānam tad eka aṃśam dvi bhāgam caraṇāyatam
homāt uttara sīmāntam dvāra mānam vidhīyate
pāda bandham adhiṣṭhānam dvāra śobhā ādinā kuru
sthūpī antam uttara ādyam ca rasa bhāgam vibhājite
prastaraḥ tu sa pāda aṃśam śaśi aṃśam galamānakam
tu śiraḥ śeṣam śikhā udayam
evam eka talam proktam dvi talam śṛṇu suvrata
uttara ādi śikhā antam ca nava bhāgam vibhājite
prastara uccam sa pāda aṃśam dvi bhāgam caraṇa udayam
maṃcamānam śivāṃśam syāt tad samam kandhara udayam  /
śikharam sārdha pakṣa aṃśam sa pāda aṃśam śikhā udayam
dvi talam hi evam ākhyātam tri talam tu adhunā śṛṇu
uttara ādi śikhā antam ca dvādaśa aṃśam vibhājite
sa pādam prastara utsedham sārdha dvi aṃśa aṃghriṇā udayam
prastaram śaśi bhāgena dvi bhāgam caraṇa udayam

original: maṃcamānaṃ śivāṃśaṃ syād aṃśaṃ grīvodayaṃ bhavet || 94 ||
analyzed: bhavet

original: p. 195) sapādākṣāṃśena śikharaṃ ekāṃśaṃ sthūpi mānakam |
analyzed: sa pāda akṣa aṃśena śikharam eka aṃśam sthūpi mānakam
tri talam hi evam ākhyātam catur bhūmi mathā ucyate
uttara ādi śikhā antam ca dvi nava aṃśam vibhājite
pāda ūna dvi aṃśam aṃca uccam guṇa aṃśam caraṇa udayam
tad ardham prastara utsedham sārdha dvi aṃśa aṃghriṇā udayam
tad ardham prastara utsedham dvi bhāgam caraṇa udayam
tad ardham maṃca mānam tu tad samam galam ucyate
catur hūmim samākhyātam paṃca bhūmi mataḥ śṛṇu
śikhā antam uttara ādyam ca trayoviṃśati bhājite
dvi bhāgam prastara utsedham sārdha agni aṃśa aṃghri tuṃgakam
tad ardham syāt pāda āyāmam guṇa aṃśakam
tasya ardham prastara utsedham sārdha dvi aṃśa aṃghri tuṃgakam
tad ardham tu dvi bhāgam caraṇa udayam
prastara uccam śiva aṃśena kandhara uccam tathā eva ca
sārdha dvi aṃśam śira uttuṃgam ekādaśam sthūpi mānakam
paṃcabhūmim samākhyātam ṣaṭtalam ca adhunā śṛṇu
uttara ādi śikhā antam ca ekona triṃśat aṃśake  /
dvi bhāgam prastara utsedham pāda uccam catur aṃsakam
sa tri pāda śiva aṃśam tu prastara udayam īritam  /

original: p. 196) sārdhāgnyaṃśāṃghri tuṃgaṃ tu tadardhaṃ prastarodayam |

analyzed: sārdha dvi aṃśa aṃghri tuṃgam tu tasya ardham prastara udayam
dvi bhāgam caraṇa utsedham tasya ardham maṃca mānakam
sa pāda aṃśam śikhā mānam sapta bhaumam atha ucyate
uttara ādi śikhā antam ca mānam ṣaṭtriṃśat aṃśake  /
sa pādi bhāgam aṃca uccam sārdha veda aṃśam aṃghrikam
dvi bhāgam prastara uccam tu veda aṃśam caraṇa udayam
pādonam dvi bhāgam aṃcam syāt sārdha agni aṃśa aṃghri tuṃgakam
sārdha aṃśam prastara utsedham sārdha akṣa aṃśa aṃghri tuṃgakam
tad ardham tu dvi bhāgam
pāda hīna agni bhāgam tu śiraḥ śeṣam śikhā udayam
evam sapta talam khyātam alaṃkāram atha ucyate
yathā dvāra śālām kuryāt dvijottama

original: daṇḍaṃ vā dvāraśālā syād prāsādaṃ sadanākṛtiḥ |
analyzed: daṇḍam vā dvāra śālā syāt prāsādam sadana ākṛtiḥ
mālikā ākṛti kartavyam dvāra harmyam dvijottama
śālākāram prakartavyam dvāra gopuram ucyate
sarve vai gopura ābham vā kalpayet kalpa vittamaḥ

original: p. 197) teṣvādau dvāraśobhaṃ tu vakṣye'haṃ dvijasattama ! |
analyzed: teṣu ādau dvāra śobham tu vakṣye iham dvijasattama
eka dvi tri talam vā api sarva alaṃkāra saṃyutam
mukhe mukhe mahā nāsī pārśvayoḥ vaṃśa nāsikā
vasu akṛtyā alpa nāsā āḍhyam prāk ukta vidhinā dvija
yugma sthūpi samāyuktam lūpa āroha śiraḥ tu vā
maṇṭapa ākṛtikam vā api śrī kāntam tat udāhṛtam
śālākāra śiraḥ tasmin ṣaṇṇāsī mukha pṛṣṭhayoḥ
ayugma sthūpa samanvitam
antar pāda uttaraiḥ yuktam iti kāntam idam param
mukhe mukhe ca pārśvayoḥ vaṃśa nāsikā
sabhākāram śira skandham kāntam vijayam eva hi
evam trividha nītyā tu dvāra śobhāḥ prakalpayet

original: mukhe mukhe mahānāsī pārśvayośca tathaiva ca |
analyzed: mukhe mukhe mahā nāsī pārśvayoḥ ca tathā eva ca
catasra āḍhyam paṃjaram ca tad ākṛtiḥ
śālā ākāram śira upetam ayugmam sthūpi saṃcitam
vijayam viśālam etat hi viśālā yāmam ucyate  /
ardha koṭi sabhdrāgam bhadranāsī mukhe mukhe
pārśvayoḥ vaṃśa nāsā āḍhyam śiraḥ bhadra samanvitam
pādam prati alpa nāsā āḍhyam sarva avayava saṃyutam
vipratīkān talaṃkāram vakṣyate tu viśeṣataḥ
pūrvavat bhūmi bhāgam ca catur diś bhadra saṃyutam
mahā nāsī catasra āḍhyam śiraḥ bhadra samanvitam
antar pāda uttaraiḥ yuktam ayugma sthūpikā anvitam
trividhā dvāra śālā āsyāt dvāra prāsādam ucyate

original: pūrve pare ca śālāyāṃ sabhadraṃ bhadranāsikā |

ūru dīrgham tu tasmāt vai ṣaṣ mātram parikīrtitam

original: ghanaṃ ca tatsamaṃ khyātaṃ netrāyāmaṃ dvayāṃgulam |

original: śūlaṃ cābhayaṃhastaṃ ca dakṣiṇe tu karadvayam |
analyzed: śūlam ca abhayaṃhastam ca dakṣiṇe tu kara dvayam

pūjā bhāgam tridhā kṛtvā ūrdhva bhāge mukham bhavet
paṃca mūrdhni catur vaktram grīvā ca eka samāyutam
karṇa aṣṭau dvādaśa akṣam ca sarva lakṣaṇa saṃyutam
liṃga ākāram adhas tasya tasya adhas piṇḍikā anvitam

original: p. 245) ata ūrdhvasya bhāgaṃ tu caturviṃśacchatāṃśakaiḥ || 141 ||
analyzed: atas ūrdhvasya bhāgam tu caturviṃśat śata aṃśakaiḥ
tra yava adhika candra aṃśam uṣṇīṣa uccam udāhṛtam
sūtra antam yuga aṃśam traya ba adhikam
netra sūtrāt puṭa antam ca puṭa antāt hanu mānakam
pratyekam tri aya bādhikyam yuga aṃśam parikīrtitam
hanu ādi gala mānam tu catur yavam udāhṛtam
yava eka ūna yuga aṃśam tu karṇa uccam iti vidyate
śeṣam liṃga ākṛti khyātam kalpayet lakṣaṇa anvitam
catur vaktram ca eka vaktram vā catur bāhu dvi bāhukaḥ
stana sūtra uparī bimbam lakṣaṇena samanvitam
hikkā sūtra upariṣṭāt vā śeṣam liṃga ākṛtiḥ bhavet
mukha liṃgam idam khyātam nṛpāṇām abhivṛddhaye
viṣkambham aṣṭadhā kṛtvā mūle madhye tad agrake
bhāga hīnam tu saṃkalpya sthūla mūlam udāhṛtam
hrāsayet śiva bhāga ādi śiraḥsthūlam tat ucyate
evam ārṣakam ākhyātam ṛṣibhiḥ pūjitam varam
paṃcakoṇam ca ṣaṣ sapta dvādaśa aśrakam
daśa navāśrakam ca eva agre tāra manaḥ upamam
phalakāḥ darpaṇa ākāram eka rekham arekhakam
śirasā udvartanam hīna māna unmānena anvitam  /

original: divyaṃ svāyaṃbhuvaṃ ceti khyātaṃ devaiḥ supūjitam |
analyzed: divyam svāyaṃbhuvam ca iti khyātam devaiḥ su pūjitam
bāṇena pūjitam bhoge bāṇaliṃgam udāhṛtam
sthūlam sūkṣmam śiraḥ mūlam krameṇa paripaṭhyate

original: unnataṃ tu mukhaṃ khyātaṃ sparśane tvatiśītalam || 153 ||
analyzed: unnatam tu mukham khyātam sparśane tu ati śītalam
bāṇaliṃgam idam khyātam madhu varṇa samāna vat
viṣṭhare tu praveśa aṃśam sārvadeśika liṃga vat
loha jam rajatam ca eva sārvadeśika vat kuru
liṃga bhedam samākhyātam śirasā udvartanam śṛṇu
liṃga mūrta ādi keśa antam śirasā udvartanam bhavet
tasmāt liṅga udaye ca ūrdhve śirasā udvartanam dvija
chatra ākāram bhavet pūrvam kukkuṭa aṇḍam dvitīyakam
tṛtīyam tripuṣa ākāram ardhacandram caturthakam
yasya liṃgasya viṣkaṃbham aṣṭadhā bhājayet budhaḥ
ūrdhvāt ardha aṃśam ālambya prathamam chatra śīrṣakam
dvātriṃśa dvi bhajet tāram ūrdhva bhūta aṃśam lambitam

original: chatrābhaṃ tu dvitīyaṃ syāt saptāṃśaṃ tu tṛtīyakam || 159 ||
analyzed: chatra ābham tu dvitīyam syāt sapta aṃśam tu tṛtīyakam

original: caturthaṃ tu navāṃśaṃ tu chatrābhaṃ tu caturvidham |
analyzed: caturtham tu nava aṃśam tu chatra ābham tu caturvidham

original: dvijānāṃ ca nṛpāṇāṃ ca chatrābhaṃ sarvakāmadam || 160 ||
analyzed: dvijānām ca nṛpāṇām ca chatra ābham sarva kāma dam
sarveṣām api liṃgānām praśastam chatra śīrṣakam
vyāse dvātriṃśat aṃśe tu manu pakṣa kalā aṃśakaiḥ   /
saptādaśa aṃśakam ca eva kukkuṭa aṇḍam caturvidham

original: vardhamāne tu liṃge tu praśastaṃ kṣatriyārhakam || 162 ||
analyzed: vardhamāne tu liṃge tu praśastam kṣatriya arhakam
dvāviṃśa aṃśe śiraḥ tāre dharmarudra aṃśakaiḥ tathā
bhānu trayodaśa aṃśaiḥ tu tripuṣa ābham caturvidham
śiva adhike praśastam vā vaiśya arham sarva kāma dam
triṃśati aṃśe viśāle smin dvāviṃśati eka viṃśatiḥ
viṃśat ekonaviṃśa aṃśam ardhacandram caturvidham
svastika ākhyeṣu liṃgeṣu kartavyam śūdra vṛddhi dam
sārvadeśika liṃgānām anyeṣām ca viśeṣataḥ
kartṛ jāti vaśāt nayet
daivika ārṣaka liṃgānām aṣṭa aṃśam śīrṣakam bhavet
śirasā udvartana utsedham guṇe eka vibhājite
yuṃjyā daṃśam tu liṃga uccāt śirasaḥ vartana anvitam
uṣṇīṣa manam ākhyātam śiromānam tat ucyate
mūrdhni madhyāt tad aṃśa aṃtam paritas udvartayet kramāt
yāvat lamba aṃśa sīmāntam mūrdhni madhyāt natam  /
chatra śīrṣa kaliṃgānām mūrdhni madhyāt natam yavam
vaktra traya samāyuktam kartavyam chatra śīrṣakam
śīrṣakāt śīrṣakāt sarvam evam krameṇa ucyate

original: p. 248) śīrṣake liṃgatāroccaṃ uktādanyaṃ na kārayet || 171 ||
analyzed: śīrṣake liṅga tāra uccam uktāt anyam na kārayet  /
uktāt anyam kṛtam ced tu rāja rāṣṭra bhaya āvaham
tasmāt sarva prayatnena ukta mārgeṇa kārayet
liṃga lakṣaṇam ākhyātam piṇḍikā lakṣaṇam śṛṇu
iti aṃśumān kāśyape liṃga lakṣaṇa paṭalaḥ ekapaṃcāśaḥ
atha atas nāgara ādīnām liṃgānām pīṭha lakṣaṇam

original: ādau tu vakṣyate vipra sakalānāṃ tato viduḥ || 1 ||
analyzed: ādau tu vakṣyate vipra sakalānām tatas viduḥ
śailaje tu śilā pīṭham sudhayā iṣṭakayā api vā
dāru je dāru jam vā atha iṣṭakā mayam eva vā

original: ratnalohādi liṃgānāṃ svayoniṃ lohajaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: ratna loha ādi liṃgānām sva yonim loha jam tu vā
liṃga utsedha samam pīṭha vistāram ca uttamam bhavet
pūjā aṃśa ucca samam pīṭham tāram kanyasam ucyate
tayoḥ madhya iṣṭa bhāge tu uttama ādi trayam trayam
pīṭha vyāsam tridhā ābhajya dvi bhāgam ca uttama unnatam
vyāsa ardham adhama uttuṃgam tayoḥ madhya iṣṭa bhājite  /
navadhā pīṭha tuṃgam tu uttama ādi trayam trayam

original: krameṇa kathitā vipra nāgarā hyeva mucyate || 6 ||
analyzed: krameṇa kathitā vipra nāgarā hi eva mucyate

original: p. 249) liṃgasyocca samaṃ vyāsaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tannavabhājite |
analyzed: liṅgasya ucca samam vyāsam śreṣṭham tat nava bhājite
sapta aṃśam kanyasam vyāsam tayoḥ madhya iṣṭa bhājite  /
navadhā vistṛtam khyātam brahma viṣṇu aṃśayoḥ api
udayam vasudhā bhajya dvi bhāgam vā anala aṃśake

original: ekāṃśaṃ vā viśeṣeṇa sthalāṃśe tu niveśayet |
analyzed: eka aṃśam vā viśeṣeṇa sthala aṃśe tu niveśayet
śeṣam pīṭhodayam khyātam evam drāviḍam ācaret
pūjā aṃśa pariṇāhena samam śreṣṭha viśālakam
pariṇāhe kalā aṃśe tu bhānvaṃśa madhamaṃtatīḥ
tayoḥ madhya iṣṭa bhāge tu navadhā pīṭha vistṛtam
viṣṇu bhāga sama uccam tu pīṭham kanyasam ucyate
sa pādam śreṣṭham ākhyātam tayoḥ madhya iṣṭa bhājite
navadhā piṇḍikā uttuṃgam vesare hi evam ācaret
athavā liṃga viṣkaṃbham triguṇam pīṭha vistṛtam
athavā liṃga viṣkaṃbham catur aśrīkṛte satī
tad karṇa dviguṇam vā atha sārdha dviguṇam eva vā

original: triguṇaṃ vā viśālaṃ tu pīṭhānāṃ tu viśeṣataḥ || 14 ||
analyzed: triguṇam vā viśālam tu pīṭhānām tu viśeṣataḥ
garbha gā iha tri bhāga ekam catur bhāga ekam eva vā
pīṭhavyāsam samākhyātam viṣṇu bhāga sama unnatam
sāmānyam nāgara ādīnām liṃgānām piṇḍikāḥ imāḥ
upānah bāhya vistāram sarveṣām tu viśeṣataḥ
tad aṣṭā navadaśa aṃśena hīnam agra viśālakam
viṣṇu bhāga sama uttuṃgam sa pādam sa ardham eva vā
sāmānya piṇḍikānām tu nāgara ādi samunnatam
liṃgānām sakalānām ca sāmānyam pīṭha lakṣaṇam
sakala udaye nava aṃśe tu vyoma aṃśam kanyasā udayam
guṇa aṃśam śreṣṭha mānam tu tayoḥ madhya iṣṭa bhājite  /
navadhā pīṭha tuṃgam tu tasya vistāram ucyate
pīṭha tuṅga sama vyāsam adhamam pīṭham ucyate
dviguṇa aṃśa uttama vyāsam tayoḥ madhya iṣṭa bhājite
navadhā vistṛtam khyātam sakalānām viśeṣataḥ
piṇḍikā gomukha upetā liṃgānām tu vidhīyate

original: samāśraṃ samavṛttaṃ vā liṃgānāṃ tu vidhīyate |
analyzed: vā liṃgānām tu vidhīyate

original: sāyatāśrāya vṛttaṃ vā pratimānāsanaṃ tu vā || 23 ||
analyzed: sa āyata āśrāya vṛttam vā pratimāna āsanam tu vā
padma pīṭham bhadra pīṭham vedikā parimaṇḍalam
pīṭham caturvidham khyātam alaṃkāram dvijottama
kalā aṃśam vibhajet tuṃgam upānah uccam dvi bhāgayā
bhūta aṃśa uccam adhas padmam kaṇṭham pāduka sādṛśam
ūrdhva padmam tu veda aṃśam dvi bhāgam paṭṭikā udayam

original: p. 251) kṣudraṃ dalaṃ tayormadhye'pyaṣṭau vātha mahādalam |
analyzed: kṣudram dalam tayoḥ madhye pi aṣṭau vā atha mahādalam
ardha aṃgulam dala agra uccam māna aṃgulena suvrata
liṃga bheda aṃgula ardham vā dala agrasya samucchrayam
tat dīrgha sadṛśam tasya mūlavyāsam udāhṛtam
mūla tāra tri bhāga ekam tasya agram vistṛtam bhavet
mūlāt agram kramāt kṣīṇam tat ghanam vyāsa sādṛśam
tri pādam vā ardhavāḥ nīvra tri bhāga eka aṃśam eva vā
vyāsa tri bhāga bhāgam tu jalamārga viśālakam

original: paṭṭikordhvasamaṃ nimnaṃ tasyādīṣaṃ tataṃ tu vā || 31 ||
analyzed: paṭṭikā ūrdhva samam nimnam tasyāt īṣam tatam tu vā
upānādi aṃga veśam ca nīvram saundaryam ācaret
adhiṣṭhāna aṃga vat veśa nīvram vā parikalpayet
padma pīṭham samākhyātam bhadrapīṭham atha ucyate
kṛtvā tu ṣoḍaśa utsedham bhāgena upānam ucyate
jagatī uccam tu veda aṃśam guṇa aṃśam kumuda udayam
tad ūrdhva kaṃpam eka aṃśam dvi bhāgā paṭṭikā bhavet
śaśyaṃśam ghṛta vāri syāt etat tu bhadram ucyate  /

original: pīṭhocce tu kalāṃśe tu dvibhāgaṃ pādukodayam |
analyzed: pīṭha ucce tu kalā aṃśe tu dvi bhāgam pādukā udayam

original: guṇāṃśaṃ jagatī mānaṃ kumudoccaṃ tu tatsamam || 36 ||
analyzed: guṇa aṃśam jagatī mānam kumuda uccam tu tad samam

original: p. 252) vyomāṃśaṃ kaṃpamānaṃ tu kaṇṭhamānaṃ dvibhāgayā |

analyzed: tasya ūrdhva kaṃpam eka aṃśam guṇa aṃśā paṭṭikā bhavet
eka aṃśam ghṛta vāri syāt etat bhadrakam ucyate
bhadram eva tathā khyātam vedi pīṭham atha upari
trayodaśa aṃśe pīṭha uccam dvi bhāgam pādukā udayam
tad ūrdhva padma tad tulyam kaṃpam aṃśena kārayet
tad ūrdhve padmam akṣa aṃśam paṭṭikā ca eva tad samam
athavā udayam tu vasu aṃśe upānah uccam śiva aṃśakam
eka aṃśam ghṛta vāri syāt śeṣam vedī yuga āśrakam
vedikā pīṭham ākhyātam tat eva akṣa aṃśa paṭṭikā

original: kartavyaṃ ca tridhaikaṃ hi vedikā pīṭhamucyate |
analyzed: kartavyam ca tridhā ekam hi vedikā pīṭham ucyate

original: padmaṃ vā bhadrapīṭhaṃ vā vṛttaṃ tatparimaṇḍalam || 43 ||
analyzed: padmam vā bhadrapīṭham vā vṛttam tad parimaṇḍalam
adhiṣṭhāna aṃga vat vā atha pīṭha aṃgam parikalpayet
upa pīṭha aṃga vat vā atha tad tad nāmnā prakīrtitāḥ
jaya dam catur aśram syāt yoni ākāram prakalpayet
śāntiḥ syāt dhanuṣā ākāram ripu nāśanam

original: vardhanāhe tu vṛttaṃ syāt paṃcāśraṃ puṣṭidaṃ bhavet |
analyzed: vardhana ahe tu vṛttam syāt paṃcāśram puṣṭi dam bhavet
roga nāśa karam ca aṣṭakoṇam evam kramāt viduḥ

original: p. 253) eṣvākāreṣu pīṭhāṃgān prāgukta vidhinā kuru |
analyzed: eṣu ākāreṣu pīṭha aṅgān prāñc ukta vidhinā kuru
dravya utkṛṣṭaiḥ navāḥ vā atha jīrṇa uddhāre dvijottama
pūrva ākṛtiḥ yathā kāryam tathā kuryāt punar punar
paścāt anyā kṛtiḥ vipra guṇam vā gadāyatam
ārjavam mukha bhadram vā bhadram ced samabhadra vat

original: liṃgānāṃ sāyataṃ pīṭhaṃ na kuryāttu kadācana || 49 ||
analyzed: liṃgānām sa āyatam pīṭham na kuryāt tu kadācana
samāśram sama vṛttam vā sa āyatāśram tathā anyakam

original: sarvaṃ ca sakalānāṃ tu kartavyaṃ saṃpadāṃ padam || 50 ||
analyzed: sarvam ca sakalānām tu kartavyam saṃpadām padam
piṇḍikā lakṣaṇam proktam pāda śaila ādikam śṛṇu
iti aṃśumānkāśyape piṇḍikā lakṣaṇa paṭalaḥ dvipaṃcāśaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa pāda śaila ādi lakṣaṇam
liṃga tāra trayam vyāsam tat tri pāda samunnatam
śreṣṭha madhya kaniṣṭha uccam tayoḥ madhya iṣṭa bhājite
vyāsam tu nava bhāgam tu tat tri pāda uktam unnatam
tad ardham adhama uttuṃgam tayoḥ madhya iṣṭa bhājite

original: tuṃgaṃ tu navadhā proktaṃ pādāśma nāgare viduḥ || 3 ||
analyzed: tuṃgam tu navadhā proktam pādāśma nāgare viduḥ  /
garbha geha viśāla akṣam śreṣṭham vyāsam udāhṛtam
tad ardham kanyasam proktam tayoḥ madhya iṣṭa bhājite
navadhā ca śilā vyāsam tat tri pāda uttama udayam
tad ardham adhamam khyātam tayoḥ madhya iṣṭa bhājite

original: navadhā tasya tuṃgaṃ tu drāviḍaṃ hyevamucyate |
analyzed: navadhā tasya tuṃgam tu drāviḍam hi evam ucyate
nālī gṛha tri bhāga eka bhāgam uttama vistṛtam
tad ardham adhamam khyātam tayoḥ madhya iṣṭa bhājite
vyāsam tu navadhā tuṃgam tat tri bhāga uttama unnatam
tad ardham adhamam tuṃgam tayoḥ madhya iṣṭa bhājite

original: tuṃgaṃ tu navadhā proktaṃ pādāśma veśarānvitam || 8 ||
analyzed: tuṃgam tu navadhā proktam pāda aśma veśara anvitam
liṃgavyāsa ardham ādhikyam vyāsam tad vasu bhājite
eka aṃśam avaṭe nimnam liṃga mūla vat ākṛtiḥ
ratnima anāmaprāṇa nava koṣṭham bile kuru

original: anyatra samatāṃ kuryāt ādhārākhya śilā smṛtā || 10 ||
analyzed: anyatra samatām kuryāt ādhāra ākhya śilā smṛtā
tad aśma pīṭha sīmāntam nandyāvarta śilā ādayaḥ
liṃgāt pīṭha avasānam vā eka dvi tri aṃgula adhikam
nandyāvarta śilā vyāsam nāgare tu vidhīyate
pīṭha vyasā ādi ava ekam vā drāviḍa akṣa antikā ādikam
liṃga vyāsa nava aṃśe tu pīṭhāt ekaika vardhanāt
nandyāvarta śilā vyāsam navadhā vesaram hi tat
liṃgasya paritas kalpyam catvāram caturaśrakam
catur aśra ucita āyāme teṣām dīrgham udāhṛtam

original: p. 255) uttarāgraṃ tu prāgbhāge prāgagraṃ dakṣiṇe nyaset |
analyzed: uttara agram tu prāgbhāge prāc agram dakṣiṇe nyaset

original: paścime cottarāgraṃ tu prāgagraṃ cottare nyaset || 15 ||
analyzed: paścime ca uttara agram tu prāc agram ca uttare nyaset
śāṃkare prathamasya agram anala agram dvitīyake
tṛtīya mūlam nirṛtau vāyu mūlam caturthakam
nandyāvarta śilāḥ tu evam yojya kalka gula udakaiḥ
ūrdhveṣṭa bandhanam lipya sthāpayet piṇḍikām budhaiḥ

original: sudhā vā vajrabandhaṃ vā lipya pīṭhaṃ prayojayet |
analyzed: sudhā vā vajra bandham vā lipya pīṭham prayojayet

original: ekāśmaṃ cottamaṃ pīṭhaṃ dvābhyāṃ vai madhyaviṣṭharam || 18 ||
analyzed: eka aśmam ca uttamam pīṭham dvābhyām vai madhya viṣṭharam
tri catur paṃcabhiḥ vā atha kanyasam pīṭham ucyate
pīṭhānām tu galāt ūrdhvam kārayet
bahu vastu gala adhastāt pīṭhaṃdharam gale kuru

original: galādhastād dṛṣadvau ced pūrva vai cāpare nyaset || 20 ||
analyzed: gala adhastāt ced vai ca apare nyaset
trayaḥ ca uttaratas tu ekam vāme vāme para dvayam
catvāram ced catuṣkoṇe caturaśram prakalpayet
tu kartavyā piṇḍikā lakṣaṇa anvitā
athavā ca aṣṭa bandhaiḥ vā niśchidram su dṛḍham kuru
iṣṭakā ced tu bahubhiḥ kartavyā sudhayā anvitā

original: lohajaṃ ratnajaṃ caiva dārujaṃ caivameva tu || 23 ||
analyzed: loha jam ratna jam ca eva dāru jam ca evam eva tu
sarveṣām baṃdhanam ca aṣṭa
viṣṇu bhāga ardha sīmnā ca piṇḍikā ūrdhvam samunnayet

original: p. 256) natonnataṃ na kartavyaṃ kartavye kartṛnāśanam |
analyzed: nata unnatam na kartavyam kartavye kartṛ nāśanam
napuṃsaka śilābhiḥ tu pīṭha adhastāt śilām nayet
evam brahmaśilā ādīni proktam tat aviśeṣataḥ
iti aṃśumān kāśyape pāda śilā ādi lakṣaṇa paṭalaḥ tripaṃcāśaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa lakṣaṇa uddhāra lakṣaṇam
liṃgasya mukha nirmāṇam lakṣaṇa uddhāram iṣyate  /
prāsādasya agratas vā api śāṃkare dakṣiṇe api vā
nava aṣṭa sapta hastam vā maṇṭapam caturaśrakam
ṣoḍaśa staṃbha saṃyuktam sarva alaṃkāra saṃyutam

original: muṣkāyāmaṃ tu vedāṃśaṃ vistāraṃ caiva tatsamam |
analyzed: muṣka āyāmam tu veda aṃśam vistāram ca eva tad samam
liṃgam paṃca aṃgulam dairghyam utpalam mukula upamam
kaṭi pradeśa vistāram ṣaṣ yava aṣṭa daśa aṃgulam
ūru mūla viśālam tu sārdha dvādaśa mātrakam
jānu madhya viśālam tu sārdha vasu aṃgulam bhavet
jaṃghā mūla viśālam tu sārdha ṣaṣ mātram ucyate
nalakāyāḥ tu vistāram sārdha veda aṃgulam bhavet
aṃghri tala agra vistāram kauśika aṃgulam ucyate
tala madhya viśālam tu bhūtāṃgulam udāhṛtam
pādāṃguṣṭha samāyāmam catur mātram udāhṛtam
tasya agrāt gulpha madhya antam sārdha dvādaśa mātrakam
anāmikāyāḥ dīrgham tu trayastriṃśat yavam bhavet
madhyā aṃgulyam ca tad tulyam veda aṃśam tad anāmikā
kaniṣṭhikāyāḥ dīrgham tu sārdha vahni aṃgulam bhavet
sapta aṣṭa nava dharmam tu trayodaśa yavam kramāt
kaniṣṭhā ādi aṃgulīnām tu vistāram pravidhīyate
agra mūla samam proktam vistāram tat tri bhājite
dvi bhāgam nakha vistāram tad tulya āyata vartulam
talāgra aṃguṣṭha mūle tu sārdha vahni aṃgulam bhavet

original: kaniṣṭhikāyā mūle tu ghanaṃ tattriyavaṃ bhavet || 46 ||
analyzed: kaniṣṭhikāyāḥ mūle tu ghanam tat tri yavam bhavet
akṣāt pārṣṇi antaram bhāgam pārṣṇi utsedham ca tad samam
pṛṣṭha maṇḍala vistāram nava mātrakam
vakṣasthale pare vyāsam paṃcaviṃśati mātrakam
kakṣayoḥ antaram pṛṣṭhe caturviṃśati mātrakam
atra anuktam tu yat sarvam uttamam daśa tāla vat
evam lakṣaṇam ākhyātam teṣām ākṛti pūrva vat
iti aṃśumān kāśyape adhama daśa tāla vidhi paṭalaḥ aṣṭapaṃcāśaḥ
nava tāla uttamam vakṣye śṛṇutu ekāgra mānasaḥ
vasavaḥ ca aṣṭamūrtiḥ ca vidyeśāḥ lokapālakāḥ
anyāḥ ca devatāḥ ca eva nava tāla uttamena tu
sa dvādaśa śata aṃśam tu bera māna vibhājite
uṣṇīṣam eka bhāgena keśāntam tu guṇa aṅgulam
keśāntā dakṣi sūtra antam veda mātram vidhīyate
tasmāt netrāt puṭa antam ca veda mātram udīritam
puṭa ādyāt hanu paryantam veda aṃśam pravidhīyate
karṇa mānam tu veda aṃśam bhānu aṃśam hṛdaya avadhi
hṛdayāt nābhi sīmāntam tāvat vādaśa mātrakam
nābhi ādi meḍhra mūla antam bhānu mātram vidhīyate
ūru dīrgham caturviṃśatī daśa jānu yuga aṃśakam
jaṃghā dīrgha ūru tulyam syāt veda aṃśam caraṇa udayam
hikkā adhas bāhu dīrgham tu caturviṃśati bhāgayā

original: dvirnavāṃśaṃ tu koṣṭhaṃ syādrudrāṃśaṃ tu talāyatam |
analyzed: dvis nava aṃśam tu koṣṭham syāt rudra aṃśam tu tala āyatam
tad madhya aṃgulam āyāmam ṣaṣ aṃgulam udāhṛtam
kanyasam daśa tāla ukta mārge śeṣam samācaret
tasmāt yā iva yava ardham hi aṃgam prati enam ācaret
mānam evam samākhyātam lakṣaṇam kathitam purā
iti aṃśumān kāśyape uttama nava tāla vidhi paṭalaḥ ekonaṣaṣṭhitamaḥ

original: p. 295) madhyamaṃ navatālaṃ tu vakṣye saṃkṣepataḥ kramāt |
analyzed: madhyamam nava tālam tu vakṣye saṃkṣepataḥ kramāt
yakṣa apsaraḥ gaṇāḥ ca eva astra mūrti marut gaṇāḥ
madhyamam nava tālena kartavyam dvijasattama
aṣṭottaraśata aṃgulyam patima uccam vibhājite
uṣṇīṣam vyoma bhāgena keśam pāda ūnakam trikam
keśāntāt netra sūtra antam yuga aṃśam tat yavonakam  /

original: puṭāntaṃ caiva tattulyaṃ hanvantaṃ tathā bhavet |
analyzed: puṭa antam ca eva tat tulyam hanu antam tathā bhavet
pāda ūna catur aṃśam tu grīva mānam udāhṛtam
bhānvaṃśāni yava ūnam tu hikkāt hṛdaya avadhi
ca eva tad tulyam meḍhra mūla antakam tathā
pāda adhika guṇa upetam viṃśa aṃśam ca ūru dīrghakam
jānu grīva samam tuṃgam jaṃghā ca ūru samam bhavet
jānu tulyam tala utsedham bāhu ca ūru samam bhavet
saptadaśa aṃgulam proktam prakoṣṭhasya tu dairghyakam
ṣaṣ aṃśa agni yava ūnam tu tala āyāmam karasya tu
tad samam madhyama āyāmam śeṣam yuktyā samācaret
iti aṃśumān kāśyape madhyama nava tālavidhi paṭalaḥ ṣaṣṭhitamaḥ
adhamam nava tālasya lakṣaṇam vakṣyate idhunā
vidyādhara gaṇāḥ ca eva tu asurāḥ ca tathā eva ca
pitaraḥ siddha gandharvāḥ nava tāla adhamena tu
sa veda śata bhāgam tu kautuka uccam vibhājite
uṣṇīṣa uccam tri pādam syāt keśam sārdha tri bhāgayā
tasmāt nābhi antakam tadvat meḍhra mūla antakam tathā
ūru dīrgham trayoviṃśat yava ūnam tu vidhīyate
grīvam pāda talam jānu tulyam jaṃghā ūru sādṛśam
bāhu ca ūru samam dīrgham prakoṣṭham ṣoḍaśa aṃgulam
tala dīrgham tu bhūta aṃśam tad samam madhyama aṃgulam

original: śeṣaṃ yuktyā tu kartavyaṃ sarvāṃgaṃ tu vidhīyate || 6 ||
analyzed: śeṣam yuktyā tu kartavyam sarva aṃgam tu vidhīyate
iti aṃśumān kāśyape adhama nava tāla vidhi paṭalaḥ ekaṣaṣṭitamaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa aṣṭa tāla vidhim param
sārdha dvāṃśam tu keśāntam keśāntāt dhanu sīmakam
pādona rudra bhāgam syāt tat tri bhāgam vibhājite

original: p. 297) śivāṃśaṃ vyakṣisūtrāntaṃ puṭāntaṃ caiva tatsamam |
hikkādi hṛdayāntaṃ tu rudrāṃśaṃ tu dvyavonakam |
analyzed: hikkā ādi hṛdaya antam tu rudra aṃśam tu dvi avonakam
nābhi antam ca eva tad tulyam meḍhra mūla antakam tathā
ca ūru dīrgham udāhṛtam
jānu karṇa samam tuṃgam jaṃghā ca ūru samā bhavet
jānu kūla tala utsedham bāhu coru samāyatam

original: prakoṣṭhaṃ tu kalāṃśaṃ syāt sārdhabhūtāṃgulaṃ talam || 6 ||
analyzed: prakoṣṭham tu kalā aṃśam syāt sārdha bhūta aṃgulam talam
tad samam madhyamāṃgulyam śeṣam prāk iva coditam
tri paṃca mātram iti uktam pādasya tu tala āyatam
atrā anuktam tu yat sarvam kanyasam daśa tāla vat
iti aṃśumān kāśyape aṣṭatālavidhi paṭalaḥ dvāṣaṣṭhitamaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa sapta tāla vidhim param
piśāca pratimā utsedham aṣṭāśīti aṃśakam bhavet
uṣṇīṣam ardha bhāgena keśāntam śaśibhāgayā

original: cibukāntaṃ ca tattulyaṃ vedāṃśaṃ tu galodayam |
analyzed: cibuka antam ca tad tulyam veda aṃśam tu gala udayam
stana antam sapta bhāgam tu rudra aṃśam nābhi sīmakam

original: p. 298) tathā vai yonimūlāntaṃ viṃśāṃśaṃ corudīrghakam |
analyzed: tathā vai yoni mūla antam viṃśa aṃśam ca ūru dīrghakam
jānu mānam dvi bhāgena jaṃghā ca ūru samā bhavet
caraṇa uccam dvi bhāgena manvaṃśam tu tala āyatam
ūru dīrgha samam bāhu prakoṣṭha dīrgham tri paṃcakam

original: talāyāmaṃ tu vedāṃśaṃ bhūtāṃśaṃ tasya vistṛtam |
analyzed: tala āyāmam tu veda aṃśam bhūta aṃśam tasya vistṛtam
tala āyāma sadṛśam madhyama aṃguli dīrghakam
śeṣam prāc udita uktena vyāsam kuryāt dhī kṛtam
sapta tālam samākhyātam śeṣam prāk apara uditam
iti aṃśumān kāśyape saptatālavidhi paṭalaḥ triṣaṣṭhitamaḥ
atha vakṣye viśeṣeṇa sukha āsana vidhim param
ārjavam rājasam bhāvam bhadrapīṭhe sukha āsanam
vāma aṃghrim śāyayet pīṭhe dakṣiṇa aṃghrim tu lambayet
ūrdhvakāya upariṣṭāt tu sārdha veda aṃgula adhikam
sphic piṇḍa mānam etat hi āsana ūrdhve viśeṣataḥ
āsanāt pūrva keśāntam jānvā ūrdhve bāhya avasānakam
jānvoḥ tu pūrva keśa antam bāhyakam
para hasta dvayoḥ madhye bāhyam abhyantaram bhavet  /
āsane nava sūtraḥ asti pūrva sūtra adhunā śṛṇu
mauli madhye tu nāsā agre stana ante nābhi madhyame  /
vāma aṃghri gulpha madhye tu brahmasūtram pralambayet
sūtrāt dakṣiṇa jānu antam ekatriṃśa aṃgulam bhavet
athavā triṃśat aṃgulyam ekonatriṃśam eva vā
antaram dvādaśa aṃgulam
trayodaśa aṃgulam vā api manu aṃgulam atha api vā
pīṭhāt tad aṃghri pārṣṇyoḥ tu nīvram dvi tri aṃgulam tu vā
tad sūtrāt abhaye haste madhya rekhā avasānakam
caturdaśa aṃgulam proktam tu antaram tu dvijottama
abhaye madhyamāṃgulyā agra antam samam bhavet
tad sūtrāt kaṭake haste maṇibandhasya madhyamāt
paṃcādaśa aṃgulam proktam tu antaram tu dvijottama

original: ūrostu maṇi bandhāntaṃ ekadvitryaṃgulaṃ tu vā || 11 ||
analyzed: ūroḥ tu maṇi bandha antam eka dvi tri aṃgulam tu vā
kaṭakam siṃhakarṇam vā tad hastam pravidhīyate
tarjanī ādi kaniṣṭhā antam tad tad mūla anta varji kritā
īṣat vakra evam syāt kaṭaka ākṛtiḥ
madhyāt madhya tala antam tu ardham ardhānta nāmikā
śeṣa aṃgulā prāgvat siṃhakarṇam idam param
hikkā sūtra samam kuryāt kartari āgre karau parau
vakre vā anāmikā aṅguṣṭhau talam ardha avasānakau

original: kiṃcidvakraṃ kaniṣṭhaṃ tu śeṣo dvau tadṛju kriyā || 15 ||
analyzed: kiṃcid vakram kaniṣṭham tu śeṣaḥ dvau tat ṛju kriyā

original: kartaryā kṛtirevaṃ syāt lakṣaṇaṃ cāti sundaram |
analyzed: kartaryā kṛtiḥ evam syāt lakṣaṇam ca ati sundaram
korparam śroṇi pārśvāt tu paṃca ṣaṣ sapta mātrakam

original: kukṣimadhye ca nāsāgre pūrvasūtraṃ tu saṃspṛśet |
analyzed: kukṣi madhye ca nāsā agre pūrva sūtram tu saṃspṛśet
meḍhra mūlāt tu vāma aṃghri gulpha madhyam rasa aṃgulam
athavā sapta mātram tu paṃca mātram atha api vā
nābhi madhyāt tu vāma aṃghri nalakāḥ madhyam caturdaśa
trayodaśa aṃgulam vā atha bhānu aṃgulam atha api vā
mauli agram madhyamāt sūtrāt du antaram manu mātrakam
sārdha trayodaśa antam vā trayodaśa aṃgulam eva vā
ṛju āgatam sukha āsīnam pravāla sadṛśam prabhum

original: triṇetraṃ prasanna vadanaṃ saṃpannaṃ rājasaṃ guṇam |
analyzed: trinetram vadanam saṃpannam rājasam guṇam
vyāghra ajina ambara dharam dukūla vasana anvitam
kartarī para hastau dvau bāhyā iva abhyantara ānanam

original: dakṣiṇe paraśuṃ vāme kṛṣṇaṃ nyasya karadvaye || 22 ||
analyzed: dakṣiṇe paraśum vāme kṛṣṇam nyasya kara dvaye
abhayam dakṣiṇe vāme kaṭakam siṃha karṇa vat
vāma karṇe viśeṣeṇa śaṃkha patram nidhāpayet
tri catuḥ paṃca mātram vā ṣaṣ sapta maṇḍala statī
karṇanāla ghanam hi evam triguṇam patra vistṛtam

original: p. 301) yavaṃ patraghanaṃ proktaṃ śvetābhaṃ cātimārdavam |
dakṣiṇe makarākhyaṃ tu kuṇḍalaṃ siṃhameva vā || 25 ||
analyzed: dakṣiṇe makara ākhyam tu kuṇḍalam siṃham eva vā

original: kuṇḍala vyāsa tuṃgaṃ tu tricatuḥ paṃcamātrakam |
analyzed: tuṃgam tu tri catuḥ paṃca mātrakam

original: yuktaṃ vai kuṇḍalaṃ kṛtvā karṇe skandhoparinyaset || 26 ||
analyzed: yuktam vai kuṇḍalam kṛtvā karṇe skandha upari nyaset
athavā karṇayoḥ vipra vṛtta kuṇḍalakam nyaset
vṛtta kuṇḍala vistāram aṣṭādaśa yavam bhavet
veda aṃgulam tu tat tuṃgam kumbha abja mukula utpalam
anyam vā sundara upetam kalpayet vṛtta kuṇḍalam
jaṭā makuṭa saṃyuktam yugma saṃkhyā jaṭā anvitam
makuṭasya udayam vipra caturviṃśa aṃgulam bhavet
tris sapta aṃgula tuṃgam vā dvis nava aṃgulam eva vā
keśāntāt makuṭa uccam tu lalāṭa paṭṭa saṃyutam
mukha anta sadṛśam vipra makuṭam mūla viśālakam
tat sapta aṣṭa nava aṃśa ekam hīnam agra viśālakam
catuṣpūrima saṃyuktam kṛttima ānana saṃyutam
kaṭisūtram tri saṃkhyābhiḥ sūtram pratiyavam ghanam
kaṭi sandhā upariṣṭāt tu kaṭi sūtram prabandhayet
paṃca ṣaṣ sapta mātram vā kṛtti mānana vistṛtam
tad vistāra samam tuṃgam meḍhrasya upari kalpayet
kaṭi sūtrāt ūru mānam madhya triṃśa avasānakam
muktā dāma ūru dāmasya abhyantare ratna saṃyutam
kaṭisūtram samākhyātam kaṭakam valayam śṛṇu
kaṭake valaya upetam prakoṣṭham dvijasattama
kaniṣṭhā aṃguli parīṇāham valayam tu ārdavā hi tat

original: athavā valayasyaiva ghanaṃ dvitriyavaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: athavā valayasya eva ghanam dvi tri yavam tu vā
racitam ratna kāṇḍaiḥ tu prakoṣṭhe tu nidhāpayet

original: mārdavaṃ ratnabandhaṃ vā kṛtvā tu valayaṃ dvija ! |
analyzed: mārdavam ratna bandham vā kṛtvā tu valayam dvija
keyūram korpare nyastvā valayasya ghana anvitam
eka ākāram tu keyūram aṣṭa mātra abja saṃyutam
nānā ratna samāyuktam śaivāla ābham atha api vā
patra pūrima saṃyuktam bāhu madhye dvijottama
tu keyūra sadṛśam ghanam
bāhyam tri dvi āvṛtam tu vā
tri catur paṃca mātram vā patra pūrim avistṛtam

original: tadvyāsādhyardhatuṃgaṃ vā pādona dviguṇaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: tad vyāsa adhyardha tuṃgam vā dviguṇam tu vā
dviguṇam vā api tat tuṃgam tat bāhu valayam bhavet
madhyāṃgulam vinā śeṣāḥ tu aṃgulāḥ mudrikā anvitāḥ
udarabandha viśālam tu eka dvi tri aṃgulam tu vā
yavam dvi yavam vā atha udarabandha ghanam bhavet
nānā alaṃkāra saṃyuktam nānā ratnaiḥ vicitritam
nābheḥ ūrdhva guṇa aṃśam tu tyakta udaram tu bandhayet
pādayoḥ madhyamāt anyā su aṃgulā mudrikā anvitāḥ
yava dvayena sarve vyaṃgulānām tu madhyakā
pādau jālaka saṃyuktau gulpha adhastāt dvijottama
jālaka ābandha sūtram tu yava dvaya ghana anvitam
tad sūtrāt jālaka ālaṃbam tri paṃca yava mātrakam
tri yavam jālakāt nālam śeṣam vai jālaka udayam

original: tadunnata samaṃ vyāsaṃ yavamānaṃ tu tadghanam |
analyzed: samam vyāsam yava mānam tu tat ghanam

original: śeṣaṃ tadghrāsagāḍhaṃ vā gāḍhahīnaṃ ghanaṃ tu vā || 49 ||
analyzed: śeṣam tat ghrāsa gāḍham vā gāḍha hīnam ghanam tu vā
gāḍha yuktam tu vṛttam syāt dantapāṣāṇa saṃyutam
ghana pāṣāṇa rahitam tuṃga ardham nīvram ucyate  /
paraśoḥ hariṇī dīrgham bhānu aṃgulam udāhṛtam
paraśum hariṇīm ca eva yuktyā saundaryam ācaret
upavītam tri tri sūtram udara sūtra samanvitam
evam eva ūru sūtram syāt upavīta ghanam samam
vāma skandha upari nyastvā nābhi adhastāt aṅgula antaram
yajñopavīta dīrgham syāt nābheḥ dakṣiṇa pārśvakam
apare vaṃśam āśritya yajña sūtram nidhāpayet
uraḥ sūtram samālambyam stanāt aṣṭa aṅgula antaram
yajñopavītam evam syāt channa vīram atha śṛṇu
yajñopavīta vat prāgvat skandhayoḥ ubhayoḥ api
pārśvayoḥ ca eva śroṇī ūrdhve nyastvā stanāntara eka vat
grīve hāra vijānīyāt hikkā adhastāt ṣaṣ aṃgulam
lambya veda aṃgulam tāram yava traya ghana anvitam
nānā ratnaiḥ hiraṇyaiḥ ca hāram kṛtvā ati sundaram
hikkā sūtra upariṣṭāt tu upagrīvam tu bandhayet

original: rudrākṣaṃ vātha ratnaṃ vā hemavṛttamaṇiṃ tu vā |
analyzed: rudrākṣam vā atha ratnam vā hema vṛtta maṇim tu vā
upagrīvam idam khyātam hṛnmālā tu adhunā ucyate
karṇāt udara bandha antam akṣamālām tu bandhayet
etat hṛdaya mālā syāt skandha mālā tathā ucyate
skandhe tu skandha mālā āsyāt nānā puṣpaiḥ virājitam
sarva aṃga sundaram devam śeṣam yuktyā samācaret
evam sukha āsanam proktam umā skanda sahitam tathā
iti aṃśumān kāśyape sukha āsana mūrti lakṣaṇa paṭalaḥ catuḥṣaṭitamaḥ

original: sukhāsanaṃ yathā proktaṃ tathā devo vidhīyate || 1 ||
analyzed: sukha āsanam yathā proktam tathā devaḥ vidhīyate

original: p. 305) devasya vāmapārśve tu pārvatī tatsukhāsane |
analyzed: devasya vāma pārśve tu pārvatī tad sukha āsane

original: varadaṃ vāmahastaṃ tu utpalaṃ dakṣiṇe kare || 4 ||
analyzed: vara dam vāma hastam tu utpalam dakṣiṇe kare

lalāṭam madhya nāsā agram pādayoḥ pārṣṇi madhyame  /
lambayet pūrva sūtram tu antaram tu vadāmi aham
tad sūtrāt vāma pārśve tu hikkāmadhyam śiva aṅgulam
ardha aṃgulam tu tad sūtrāt vāme hṛdaya madhyamam
tad sūtrāt dakṣiṇe nābhi madhyamam tu dviyaṃgulam
tad sūtrāt dakṣiṇe ca evam agram ca eva yuga aṃgulam
tad sūtrāt vāma go jānoḥ antaram dvādaśam yavam
sama bhaṃgam iti khyātam ati bhaṃgam atha śṛṇu
uṣṇīṣāt vāma pārśve tu netra ante tad puṭa antake

original: dakṣiṇastana madhye tu tatsūtraṃ tu guṇāṃgulam |
analyzed: dakṣiṇa stana madhye tu tad sūtram tu guṇa aṃgulam

sparśanam veśanam nīvram ca

original: evaṃ tribhaṃgasūtreṣu saṃmiśraṃ tu na kārayet || 14 ||

original: dakṣiṇaṃ susthitaṃ pādaṃ vāmapādaṃ tu kuṃcitam |
analyzed: dakṣiṇam susthitam pādam vāma pādam tu kuṃcitam

original: ekadvitryaṃgulaṃ vāpi tasya netroddhṛtaṃ tu vā |
analyzed: eka dvi tri aṃgulam vā api tasya netra uddhṛtam tu vā

hīnam vā api adhikam vā api navadhā dhanuṣā āyudham

agra madhya aṃgulam vyāsam vṛttam varṇaiḥ vicitritam
bāṇa nāham tri bhāga ekam rajju nāham tu tantunā
tu sapta aṃśam rajju dairghyakam
tat dīrghasya ānukūlyam tu dhanoḥ vakram udāhṛtam

original: ṭaṃkaṃ dakṣiṇa haste tu vāmahaste mṛgaṃ dhṛtam || 25 ||

tat eva vāma pādam tu apasmāra upari sthitam

original: śeṣaṃ prāgiva kartavyaṃ dvitīyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ bhavet |

original: tṛtīyaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ proktaṃ caturthaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ śṛṇu || 29 ||
analyzed: tṛtīyam lakṣaṇam proktam caturtham lakṣaṇam śṛṇu

original: bāṇaṃ cakraṃ tathā śūlaṃ ṭaṃkaṃ vajraṃ ca dakṣiṇe || 4 ||

original: tatpūrve vāmapādaṃ tu talaṃ nyastvā raṃthopari || 43 ||

tripurāntakam ākhyātam aṣṭa bhedam dvijottama
pravāla sadṛśam varṇam sattva rāja samāśritam

original: susthitaṃ vāmapādaṃ tu dakṣiṇaṃ kuṃcitaṃ bhavet |

jaṭā makuṭa saṃyuktam sarva ābharaṇa bhūṣitam

evam kalyāṇamūrteḥ tu ardhanārīśvaram tathā

original: susthitaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ vāmapādaṃ tu kuṃcitam || 2 ||

aṃkurāṇi arpayet paścāt pūrva ukta vidhinā saha

original: taddinasya tu pūrve tu maṇḍapaṃ śodhayettataḥ |
analyzed: tad dinasya tu pūrve tu maṇḍapam śodhayet tatas
paṃcagavyena saṃpūjya kautukam bandhayet tatas
bilva patram tu saṃpūjya sarva gandha samanvitam
vastreṇa veṣṭayet dhīmān bila patra adhivāsanam
prabhāte vimale dhīmān deśikaḥ snānam ācaret

original: pūrvāhne tarpaṇaṃ caiva madhyāhne tu pradakṣiṇam || 115 ||
analyzed: pūrvāhne tarpaṇam ca eva madhyāhne tu pradakṣiṇam
sāyāhne pūjanam kṛtvā api evam evam vratam caret
brahma kṣattriya upavāsa samanvitāḥ
dvijānām śiva bhaktānām sarveṣām prāṇinām api

original: sarvāsāṃ caiva nārīṇāṃ upavāsaṃ tathaiva ca || 117 ||
analyzed: sarvāsām ca eva nārīṇām upavāsam tathā eva ca
na prayatnena sarva kāryāṇi sādhayet

original: yatphalaṃ sarvasiddhiṃ ca iṣṭakāmyaṃ tathaiva ca || 118 ||
analyzed: yat phalam sarva siddhim ca iṣṭa kāmyam tathā eva ca

original: āyuṣyakaṃ ca siddhiṃ ca sarvamokṣaṃ tathaiva ca |
analyzed: āyuṣyakam ca siddhim ca sarva mokṣam tathā eva ca
amaṃgalya upavāsī ca punarjanma su maṃgalī
apatnīka upavāsī ca punar patnī samanvitaḥ
iṣṭa kāmya phalam kāmyam śiva rātri upavāsake

original: nidrāyāṃ tu phalaṃ hīnaṃ nidrāhīnaṃ tu tatphalam |
analyzed: nidrāyām tu phalam hīnam nidrā hīnam tu tad phalam
tasmāt sarva prayatnena upavāsam anidrakam
ṛk yajuḥ sāma vedānām caturbhiḥ pratiyāmake
brāhmaṇaiḥ munibhiḥ sārdham deśikaḥ saṃprapūjayet
vighneśam pūjayet pūrvam saura pūjām atas param
śālibhiḥ sthaṇḍilam kṛtvā puṇyāham vācayet tatas

original: pūrve tu paṃcagavyaṃ syāt paṃcāmṛtaṃ dvitīyake |
analyzed: pūrve tu paṃcagavyam syāt paṃcāmṛtam dvitīyake
tṛtīye snānam āpyam tu ikṣu sāram caturthake
yāmam prativiśeṣeṇa pūjayet deśika uttamaḥ

original: pūrve tu snapanaṃ proktaṃ aṣṭottaraśataṃ bhavet || 125 ||
analyzed: pūrve tu snapanam proktam aṣṭottaraśatam bhavet  /
dvitīye snapanam proktam paṃcāśat kalaśam bhavet
tṛtīye snapanam ca eva paṃcaviṃśati saṃkhyayā
caturthe snapanam ca eva nava kumbhena pūjayet
yāmam prati viśeṣeṇa snapanam kārayet budhaḥ
pūrva yāme tu saṃsthāpya bilva patraiḥ samarcayet
dvitīye padma puṣpaiḥ ca tṛtīye jāti puṣpakaiḥ
nandyāvartaiḥ ca saṃpūjya catur yāmam tu pūjayet
catur saṃdhyā arcanam kuryāt bilva patraiḥ samanvitam
mudga annam prathame ca eva dvitīye pāyasa annakam
tṛtīye kṛsara annam syāt śuddha annam syāt caturthake
yāmam prativiśeṣeṇa kṣetrapālam samarcayet
yāmam prati viśeṣeṇa bali homam samācaret
deśikam pūjayet tatra vastra hema aṃgulīyakaiḥ
evam saṃpūjya vidhivat śiva loke mahīyate
sūrya indu vahni maya bhāsvara dīpya pīṭhām
sva icchā gṛhīta sṛṇi pāśa śara ikṣu cāpām
bāla indu maulim alaka ābharaṇām trinetrām
nityam namāmi manasā mahanīya kīrtitam
pṛthvī gṛham sura dala ambujam aṣṭa patram
loka aśrakam dvidaśa koṇam atha aṣṭa koṇam
antar trikoṇam adi madhyamam ādi pīṭham
tat sarvam amba tava rūpam anusmarāmi
bāla arka maṇḍala ābhāsam catur bāhum tri locanām
pāśa aṃkuśa dhanuḥ bāṇān dhārayantīm śiva aṃbhaje
śubham astu
